translated: ‚ÄúIf it is said that all are the referents of the word,üîΩthen the word ‚Äòall‚Äô would not be a referent.‚Äù

original: gal te sgra las gzhan pa rnams thams cad kyi sgra'i brjod par bya ba ste /üîΩsgra gcig pu kho na thams cad ma yin na de'i tshe sgra dang thams cad ma yin pa zhes pa 'di dag rnam grangs kyi sgra ste rnam grangs nyid la yang skyon gang yin pa de ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: gal te sgra las gzhan pa rnams thams cad kyi sgra'i brjod par bya ba ste / sgra gcig pu kho na thams cad ma yin na de'i tshe sgra dang thams cad ma yin pa zhes pa 'di dag rnam grangs kyi sgra ste rnam grangs nyid la yang skyon gang yin pa de ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: If all that are other than the word are the referents of the word,üîΩthen if only the word is not all, then at that time, these, the word and not all, are words that are synonyms. With respect to synonyms themselves, whatever faults there are, he explains that they are shown:üîΩ‚ÄúIf it is said that all are the referents of the word,

original: de yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: then the word ‚Äòall‚Äô would not be a referent.‚Äù

original: der ra na zhes pa la sogs pa'i dpes de kho na gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: der ra na zhes pa la sogs pa'i dpes de kho na gsal bar byed do //
translated: In that, the example of ‚Äúthe man with the stick‚Äù and so on clarifies that.

original: 'o na sgra mngon sum kho na las grub pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na sgra mngon sum kho na las grub pa ma yin nam /
translated: Well, isn‚Äôt the word established only by direct perception?

original: des na de yang ma grub ces brjod pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: des na de yang ma grub ces brjod pa ci zhe na /
translated: So why is it said that it is not established?

original: rang gi ngo bo kho nar ma grub par brjod par bya ba ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang rang nyid ni bdag nyid bsgrub par bya ba la gtan tshigs nyid du ste /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo kho nar ma grub par brjod par bya ba ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang rang nyid ni bdag nyid bsgrub par bya ba la gtan tshigs nyid du ste /
translated: It is not that the probandum is not established in its own nature, but rather that it is the very probandum that is the logical reason for establishing itself.

original: bsgrub par bya ba kho na sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba ni ma yin zhing /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba kho na sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba ni ma yin zhing /
translated: It is not that the probandum alone is the proof.

original: sgra yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can no //
analyzed: sgra yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can no //
translated: Sound is the subject of the probandum.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni bdag nyid sgrub par byed pa la shes par byed pa nyid du ma grub ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni bdag nyid sgrub par byed pa la shes par byed pa nyid du ma grub ste /
translated: Therefore, this is not established as the very thing that proves itself,

original: de shes par bya ba yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de shes par bya ba yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is what is to be known.

original: sgra gcig yin la /
analyzed: sgra gcig yin la /
translated: Sound is one thing,

original: de yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du nye bar blangs shing /
analyzed: de yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du nye bar blangs shing /
translated: and that is taken as the very probandum.

original: gang gi sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'gyur ba sgra gzhan yod pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'gyur ba sgra gzhan yod pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: And there is no other sound that would be the very proof.

original: des na de rang gi ngo bo grub kyang bdag nyid la gtan tshigs nyid du ma grub bo zhes pa 'di 'dir don yin no //
analyzed: des na de rang gi ngo bo grub kyang bdag nyid la gtan tshigs nyid du ma grub bo zhes pa 'di 'dir don yin no //
translated: Therefore, even though its own nature is established, it is not established as the very logical reason for itself. This is the meaning here.

original: dngos po thams cad la chos can dang chos kyi rnam par dbye ba ma grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad la chos can dang chos kyi rnam par dbye ba ma grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the distinction of subject and object is not established for all things.

original: thams cad du dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid kyis ma grub pa'i skyon mtshungs so zhe na /
analyzed: thams cad du dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid kyis ma grub pa'i skyon mtshungs so zhe na /
translated: In all cases, the fault of nonestablishment of just one part of the meaning of the thesis is the same.

original: ma yin te /üîΩkun rdzob pa'i ldog pa tha dad pa la brten pas bsgrub @153a * //
analyzed: ma yin te / kun rdzob pa'i ldog pa tha dad pa la brten pas bsgrub @153a * //
translated: No, it is not so.

original: bar bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag gi khyad par grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bar bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag gi khyad par grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the distinction of the probandum and the probans is established, based on the different aspects of the conventional.

original: de ltar ni thams cad las log pa'i dngos po gcig la gang dang gang las tha dad pa de la ltos pas chos rnams rnam par gzhag par bya bas so //
analyzed: de ltar ni thams cad las log pa'i dngos po gcig la gang dang gang las tha dad pa de la ltos pas chos rnams rnam par gzhag par bya bas so //
translated: In this way, all things are posited as phenomena based on one thing that is the opposite of everything else, and based on that which is different from that.

original: don dam pa sems pa na kun rdzob pa'i dngos bo rnams la /
analyzed: don dam pa sems pa na kun rdzob pa'i dngos bo rnams la /
translated: When contemplating the ultimate, in regard to conventional things,

original: dngos por gyur pa'i chos gzhan de nyid dang gzhan nyid 'gog pa 'ba' zhig ste /
analyzed: dngos por gyur pa'i chos gzhan de nyid dang gzhan nyid 'gog pa 'ba' zhig ste /
translated: only the negation of the otherness and sameness of things that are real is made,

original: de dag dngos po'i rten can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag dngos po'i rten can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because those are based on real things.

original: gang 'di rjes su dpag pa dang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i tha snyad gnas pa de ni /
analyzed: gang 'di rjes su dpag pa dang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i tha snyad gnas pa de ni /
translated: The convention of the inferential mark and the inferred is based on the distinction of the exclusion.

original: ldog pa la brten pa'i dbye ba rtogs pas grub pa gang yin pa de la brten nas bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: ldog pa la brten pa'i dbye ba rtogs pas grub pa gang yin pa de la brten nas bstan par bya'o //
translated: It is established by the understanding of the distinction based on the exclusion.

original: de ltar ni sgra zhes brjod pa dang byas pa nyid ces brjod pa la rtogs pa tha dad pa kho nar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni sgra zhes brjod pa dang byas pa nyid ces brjod pa la rtogs pa tha dad pa kho nar 'gyur gyi /
translated: In this way, the expression ‚Äúsound‚Äù and the expression ‚Äúbecause of being produced‚Äù are different only in the understanding.

original: dngos por na tha dad pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos por na tha dad pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: But in reality, they are not different.

original: de lta na'ang ldog pa la brten pa'i gang rtogs pa tha dad pa'i chos can dang chos so sor snang ba skye la /
analyzed: de lta na'ang ldog pa la brten pa'i gang rtogs pa tha dad pa'i chos can dang chos so sor snang ba skye la /
translated: Even so, the distinction of the understanding based on the exclusion produces the appearance of the subject and the predicate as separate things.

original: des bstan pa'i chos can dang chos tha dad pa la brten pas sgrub par byed pa'i tha snyad 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: des bstan pa'i chos can dang chos tha dad pa la brten pas sgrub par byed pa'i tha snyad 'gal ba med do //
translated: And because it is based on the subject and the predicate that are different as indicated by that, there is no contradiction in the convention of the proof.

original: don la mi slu ba ni 'brel pa las so zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: don la mi slu ba ni 'brel pa las so zhes bshad zin to //
translated: That it is nondeceptive with regard to the object is explained as being due to the relation.

original: 'dir ni sgra rtag ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni sgra rtag ste /
translated: Here, sound is permanent.

original: thams cad ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa la gang gis dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig tu mi 'gyur ba ldog pa tha dad pa yang med do //
analyzed: thams cad ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa la gang gis dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig tu mi 'gyur ba ldog pa tha dad pa yang med do //
translated: And there is no difference in the exclusion that is not one part of the meaning of the proposition.

original: de ltar ni gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba nyid du nye bar bkod pa de bsgrub par bya ba nyid du nye bar gzhag pa'i rnam pa las gzhan pa'i ngo bor shes pa gzhan la nye bar mi gnas pa sgrub par byed pa nyid du byas pa ste
analyzed: de ltar ni gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba nyid du nye bar bkod pa de bsgrub par bya ba nyid du nye bar gzhag pa'i rnam pa las gzhan pa'i ngo bor shes pa gzhan la nye bar mi gnas pa sgrub par byed pa nyid du byas pa ste
translated: This is because whatever is posited as the probandum is not cognized as a different entity from the form in which it is posited as the probandum.

original: / so sor rnam par gcad par bya ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: / so sor rnam par gcad par bya ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: And because there is no exclusion of each individual,

original: shes pa la grub pa'i tha dad pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: shes pa la grub pa'i tha dad pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: there is no difference established in the cognition.

original: de'i phyir ma grub pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma grub pa zhes bshad do //
translated: Therefore, it is explained as unestablished.

original: de 'di skad brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de 'di skad brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He would say this:

original: gang dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin pa de gtan tshigs ma yin te /
analyzed: gang dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin pa de gtan tshigs ma yin te /
translated: That which is one part of the meaning of the proposition is not the reason,

original: dper na sgra mi rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la mi rtag pa nyid bzhin /
analyzed: dper na sgra mi rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la mi rtag pa nyid bzhin /
translated: just as impermanence is not a reason for proving the impermanence of sound.

original: sgra rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la thams cad ma yin pa nyid kyang dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin no zhes pas khyab byed dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: sgra rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la thams cad ma yin pa nyid kyang dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin no zhes pas khyab byed dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: In the proof of sound as permanent, not being everything is also one part of the meaning of the thesis.

original: 'o na yang zhes pa la sogs pas ma nges par smras shing /
analyzed: 'o na yang zhes pa la sogs pas ma nges par smras shing /
translated: ‚Äú Well then, ‚Äù and so on, states the inconclusiveness of the reason.

original: 'dir zhes pa la sogs pas lan 'debs bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dir zhes pa la sogs pas lan 'debs bar byed do //
translated: ‚Äú Here, ‚Äù and so on, responds to that.

original: shes pa tha mi dad @153b pa'i yul bsgrub par bya ba nyid du nya bar drangs ba ni /
analyzed: shes pa tha mi dad @153b pa'i yul bsgrub par bya ba nyid du nya bar drangs ba ni /
translated: The object of non-different consciousness is drawn as the predicate of the probandum.

original: dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin te /
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin te /
translated: It is one part of the meaning of the thesis.

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'dir ni khyad par bsgrub par bya ba yin zhing /
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro // 'dir ni khyad par bsgrub par bya ba yin zhing /
translated: Because there is no difference.üîΩHere, the difference is the predicate of the probandum.

original: spyi sgrub par byed pa'o zhes pas khyad par yod do //
analyzed: spyi sgrub par byed pa'o zhes pas khyad par yod do //
translated: The generality is the proof. Thus, there is a difference.

original: dpe med par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes pa 'di nyid kyi 'thad pa ste /
analyzed: dpe med par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes pa 'di nyid kyi 'thad pa ste /
translated: The reason is that it would follow that there would be no example.

original: dper yod par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir 'dir thams cad ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: dper yod par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir 'dir thams cad ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Because the example would be just that. Here, everything is not the predicate of the probandum.

original: grub pa dper 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: grub pa dper 'gyur zhing /
translated: The established is the example.

original: ma grub pa ni bsgrub par bya bar 'dod la /
analyzed: ma grub pa ni bsgrub par bya bar 'dod la /
translated: The unestablished is asserted as the probandum.

original: 'dir thams cad phyogs su byas pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir thams cad phyogs su byas pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But here, not everything is taken as the position.

original: mig la sogs pa rnams ni zhes pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa rnams ni zhes pa la sogs pas /
translated: As for the eye, etc., etc.

original: khyad par dang spyi'i bdag nyid bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa tha dad pa nyid de ston par byed do //
analyzed: khyad par dang spyi'i bdag nyid bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa tha dad pa nyid de ston par byed do //
translated: He shows that the particular and the universal are the probandum and the probans, respectively.

original: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: If, etc.

original: sgra nyid ni sgra gcig pu kho na la yod pa'i phyir mnyam bya nyid dang 'dra bar thun mong ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur gyi ma grub pa nyid ma yin no zhes pa pha rol po'o //
analyzed: sgra nyid ni sgra gcig pu kho na la yod pa'i phyir mnyam bya nyid dang 'dra bar thun mong ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur gyi ma grub pa nyid ma yin no zhes pa pha rol po'o //
translated: The opponent says: Soundness exists only in sound alone, so it is not like the probandum, but is a unique property.

original: dam bca' ba'i don gyi ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩchos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can ni dam bca' ba'i don no //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i don gyi ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste / chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can ni dam bca' ba'i don no //
translated: As for the meaning of the thesis, etc.üîΩThe subject qualified by the property is the meaning of the thesis.

original: de'i chos mnyan par bya ba nyid thun mong ma yin pa nyid du rigs te /
analyzed: de'i chos mnyan par bya ba nyid thun mong ma yin pa nyid du rigs te /
translated: It is reasonable that its property, the property to be proven, is a unique property.

original: chos can dang chos tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can dang chos tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the subject and the property are different.

original: de ltar ni sgra'i sgras ni sgra ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa brjod cing /
analyzed: de ltar ni sgra'i sgras ni sgra ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa brjod cing /
translated: In that way, the word ‚Äúsound‚Äù expresses the exclusion of what is not sound.

original: mnyan par bya ba'i sgras ni rna ba'i dbang po'i yul ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba'i sgras ni rna ba'i dbang po'i yul ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And the word ‚Äúaudible‚Äù expresses the exclusion of what is not an object of the auditory sense faculty.

original: sgra'i chos su mnyan par bya ba nyid yod la /
analyzed: sgra'i chos su mnyan par bya ba nyid yod la /
translated: The property of sound is audibility.

original: de ni thun mong ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni thun mong ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: That is not shared.

original: 'dir ni gtan tshigs dang chos can brjod pa'i sgra dag la rnam par gcod pa tha dad pa med do zhes pas sgra la sgra nyid gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni gtan tshigs dang chos can brjod pa'i sgra dag la rnam par gcod pa tha dad pa med do zhes pas sgra la sgra nyid gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Here, the words expressing the reason and the subject do not have a different exclusion, so sound does not have another sound.

original: bsgrub par bya ba de kho na sgrub par byed pa nyid du brjod do zhes bas ma grub pa kho na'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba de kho na sgrub par byed pa nyid du brjod do zhes bas ma grub pa kho na'o //
translated: It is said that the probandum itself is the proof, so it is not established.

original: rtsod pa bsgrub par ni 'di zhes pa thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir zhes gang bshad pa'o //üîΩder ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rtsod pa bsgrub par ni 'di zhes pa thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir zhes gang bshad pa'o // der ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: In proving the thesis, it is said that everything is impermanent because it is produced.

original: de la grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba ni /
analyzed: de la grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba ni /
translated: Here, the contradiction with the tenets is as follows.

original: bye brag pa'i dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir sgra mi rtag pa'o zhes te /
analyzed: bye brag pa'i dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir sgra mi rtag pa'o zhes te /
translated: The Vai≈õe·π£ika says, ‚ÄúSound is impermanent because it is perceptible by the sense faculty.‚Äù

original: des ni dngos po dang yon tan la sogs pa dbang pos gzung bar bya ba rnams rtag pa nyid du khas blangs pa rnams kyi mi rtag pa nyid 'ongs pa na grub pa'i mtha' 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: des ni dngos po dang yon tan la sogs pa dbang pos gzung bar bya ba rnams rtag pa nyid du khas blangs pa rnams kyi mi rtag pa nyid 'ongs pa na grub pa'i mtha' 'gal ba'o //
translated: Thus, for those who assert that things, qualities, and so on, which are perceptible by the sense faculties, are permanent, when impermanence is proven, the tenets are contradicted.

original: @154a * // dam bca' ba'i don dang 'gal ba ni grangs can pa'i rgyu la 'bras bu yod de /
analyzed: @154a * // dam bca' ba'i don dang 'gal ba ni grangs can pa'i rgyu la 'bras bu yod de /
translated: Contradiction of the meaning of the thesis is, for example, the SƒÅ·πÉkhya‚Äôs statement, ‚ÄúThe effect exists in the cause

original: yang dag par 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag par 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes pa ste /
translated: because it arises.‚Äù

original: yang dag par 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes pa 'di dang yod pa nyid du dam bcas pa 'gal ba ste /
analyzed: yang dag par 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes pa 'di dang yod pa nyid du dam bcas pa 'gal ba ste /
translated: This statement ‚Äúbecause it arises‚Äù contradicts the thesis that it exists.

original: yod pa nyid ni yang dag par 'byung bar rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa nyid ni yang dag par 'byung bar rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not logical for something that exists to arise,

original: skyes bu bzhin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu bzhin no zhes pa'o //
translated: like a person.

original: 'di la de dag srid pa yang ma yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: 'di la de dag srid pa yang ma yin no zhes pa /
translated: They say, ‚ÄúThis is not possible.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir de la ni phyogs kyi chos kho na gtan tshigs nyid du brjod la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de la ni phyogs kyi chos kho na gtan tshigs nyid du brjod la /
translated: Because for them the property of the subject alone is stated as the reason.

original: 'di ni phyogs kyi chos su 'gyur pa ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni phyogs kyi chos su 'gyur pa ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pa'o //
translated: This is not a property of the subject at all.

original: bstan par bya ba'o zhes pa gtan tshigs ltar snang ba brtag pa'i skabs su'o //
analyzed: bstan par bya ba'o zhes pa gtan tshigs ltar snang ba brtag pa'i skabs su'o //
translated: The expression ‚Äúto be proven‚Äù occurs in the context of the analysis of fallacious reasons.

original: phyogs ltar snang dang bcas pa bshad zin to //
analyzed: phyogs ltar snang dang bcas pa bshad zin to //
translated: The apparent properties of the subject have been explained.

original: da ni gang gi rjod par byed pa gzhan don rjes su dpag pa yin pa gtan tshigs bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: da ni gang gi rjod par byed pa gzhan don rjes su dpag pa yin pa gtan tshigs bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, the reason will be explained, which is the expression of the other‚Äôs purpose, namely, inference for the sake of others.

original: 'o na de'i mtshan nyid sngar kho nar bshad zin pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de'i mtshan nyid sngar kho nar bshad zin pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But wasn‚Äôt its definition explained earlier?

original: bshad zin pa bden te /
analyzed: bshad zin pa bden te /
translated: It is true that it was explained,

original: de lta na 'ang rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i ched du gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbang du byed do //
analyzed: de lta na 'ang rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i ched du gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbang du byed do //
translated: but it is presented again here in terms of the definition of the reason in order to teach its classification.

original: de la'ang zhes pa gtan tshigs de la'o //
analyzed: de la'ang zhes pa gtan tshigs de la'o //
translated: ‚Äú In that regard‚Äù refers to that reason.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i de ma thag tu bshad par bya ba yin pa la de ma bshad pa kho nar phyogs kyi rab tu dbye ba skabs su ma bab pa sngon du rab tu ston pa la rgyu gsungs pa /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i de ma thag tu bshad par bya ba yin pa la de ma bshad pa kho nar phyogs kyi rab tu dbye ba skabs su ma bab pa sngon du rab tu ston pa la rgyu gsungs pa /
translated: The classification of the subject should be explained immediately after the probandum, but before explaining that, the author first presents the classification of the subject, since it is not the right time to explain the classification of the subject, and he states the reason for that:

original: gang phyir bsgrub bya'i chos gtan tshigs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang phyir bsgrub bya'i chos gtan tshigs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Because the predicate of the probandum is called the reason, etc.üîΩ

original: phal che bas zhes pa'i tshig ni ma grub pa phyogs chos med pa'ang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid du shes pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: phal che bas zhes pa'i tshig ni ma grub pa phyogs chos med pa'ang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid du shes pa'i don du'o //
translated: The point of the phrase ‚Äúfor the most part‚Äù is to understand that nonestablishment and the absence of the property of the subject are also just like a reason that is contradictory to the property of the subject.

original: 'di ni tshigs su bcad pa'i don yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni tshigs su bcad pa'i don yin te /
translated: This is the meaning of the verse.

original: gang gi phyir gtan tshigs dang der snang ba phal che ba ni phyogs kyi chos kho na yin pa de'i phyir gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba ma ngas pa nyid rnams las sngon du phyogs kyi chos rgyas par bstan par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gtan tshigs dang der snang ba phal che ba ni phyogs kyi chos kho na yin pa de'i phyir gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba ma ngas pa nyid rnams las sngon du phyogs kyi chos rgyas par bstan par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Because the property of the subject and that which appears to be it are for the most part reasons, therefore, before the reasons that are contradictory to the property of the subject, the property of the subject should be extensively taught.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: gang gi phyir phyogs kyi chos nyid 'di ni mang po rnams kyi spyi'i tshul yin pa de'i phyir phyogs kyi chos kyi rab tu dbye ba kho na gtan tshigs la sogs pa las sngon du bstan par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir phyogs kyi chos nyid 'di ni mang po rnams kyi spyi'i tshul yin pa de'i phyir phyogs kyi chos kyi rab tu dbye ba kho na gtan tshigs la sogs pa las sngon du bstan par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Because this property of the subject is the general mode of many reasons, therefore, before the reasons and so on, the divisions of the property of the subject should be taught.

original: de ni phyogs kyi chos rab tu dbye ba de bstan pa'i ched du bde blag tu gzung ba'i don du gtan tshigs kyi skabs kyi mdo bsdus pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ni phyogs kyi chos rab tu dbye ba de bstan pa'i ched du bde blag tu gzung ba'i don du gtan tshigs kyi skabs kyi mdo bsdus pa gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach the differentiation of the property of one part, he states the summary of the chapter on reasoning for the sake of easily grasping it:

original: mthun phyogs la yod med ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mthun phyogs la yod med ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe existence and non-existence in the similar class, etc.‚Äù

original: 'dir zhes pa @154b tshigs su bcad pa 'dir ro //
analyzed: 'dir zhes pa @154b tshigs su bcad pa 'dir ro //
translated: Here means in this verse.

original: gang gi phyir phyogs kyi chos rnam pa dgu bshad pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir phyogs kyi chos rnam pa dgu bshad pa ste /
translated: Because the property of one part is explained in nine ways,

original: gang gi phyir 'di mang po rnams kyi thun mong gi tshul yin pa de'i phyir de nyid thun mong las sngar brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di mang po rnams kyi thun mong gi tshul yin pa de'i phyir de nyid thun mong las sngar brtag par bya ste /
translated: because this is the common method for many, therefore, that common method should be examined first.

original: de nges par shes pa na gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rgyas pas bstan pa'i ched dang shes pa'i ched du bde blag tu 'gyur ro zhes pa'i phyir de de phyis nges par bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de nges par shes pa na gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rgyas pas bstan pa'i ched dang shes pa'i ched du bde blag tu 'gyur ro zhes pa'i phyir de de phyis nges par bstan par bya'o //
translated: When that is ascertained, for the sake of teaching and understanding the extensive characteristics of the reason, etc., it should be taught later for the sake of ease.

original: 'dir chos can kho na'i chos su 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'dir chos can kho na'i chos su 'gyur gyi /
translated: Here, it is a property of the subject alone,

original: tshogs pa'i ma yin zhing chos kyi yang ma yin no //
analyzed: tshogs pa'i ma yin zhing chos kyi yang ma yin no //
translated: not of the collection, nor of the property.

original: de'i phyir bsgrub bya chos zhes smras pa chos can kho na phyogs nyid du dam bcas te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgrub bya chos zhes smras pa chos can kho na phyogs nyid du dam bcas te /
translated: Therefore, the so-called probandum is only the subject itself that is posited as the thesis.

original: bsgrub bya'i sgra ni phyogs kyi rnam grangs yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i sgra ni phyogs kyi rnam grangs yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the word ‚Äúprobandum‚Äù is a synonym for ‚Äúthesis.‚ÄùüîΩAnd that is not reasonable.

original: de yang mi rigs so zhes sams  pas smras pa /
analyzed: de yang mi rigs so zhes sams  pas smras pa /
translated: Thinking that, he says,

original: re zhig ci ltar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: re zhig ci ltar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFirst, how?‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir zhes pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes pa la sogs pas /
translated: With ‚ÄúBecause . . . ,‚Äù

original: gang zhig bsgrub par 'dod pa ma yin pa de ni phyogs ma yin te gtan tshigs bzhin /
analyzed: gang zhig bsgrub par 'dod pa ma yin pa de ni phyogs ma yin te gtan tshigs bzhin /
translated: he says that whatever is not intended to be proven is not a thesis, like a reason.

original: chos can yang de lta bu'o zhes khyab par byed pa mad pa smras so //
analyzed: chos can yang de lta bu'o zhes khyab par byed pa mad pa smras so //
translated: The subject is also like that. He states a contradiction with the pervasion.

original: grub zin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa 'dis ni ma grub pa nyid du dogs pa sel bar byed do //
analyzed: grub zin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa 'dis ni ma grub pa nyid du dogs pa sel bar byed do //
translated: With ‚ÄúBecause it is already established,‚Äù he dispels the doubt that it is not established.

original: gang grub zin pa de ni bsgrub par 'dod pa ma yin te gtan tshigs bzhin /
analyzed: gang grub zin pa de ni bsgrub par 'dod pa ma yin te gtan tshigs bzhin /
translated: Whatever is already established is not intended to be proven, like a reason.

original: chos can yang de lta bu'o zhes pa khyab byed dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: chos can yang de lta bu'o zhes pa khyab byed dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: The subject is also like that. He states a contradiction with the pervasion.

original: de'i phyir de'i chos ni phyogs chos su bstan par 'os pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i chos ni phyogs chos su bstan par 'os pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, its property is not suitable to be taught as the property of the subject.

original: nyes pa 'di med de zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nyes pa 'di med de zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: There is no such fault.

original: gdon mi za bar dngos kyi sgra rnams kho nas tha snyad byed pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gdon mi za bar dngos kyi sgra rnams kho nas tha snyad byed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that one must make statements only with the words ‚Äúentity,‚Äù

original: 'o na ci zhe na nye bar btags pa rnams kyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na nye bar btags pa rnams kyis kyang ngo //
translated: but rather that one must also make statements with the term ‚Äúimputed.‚Äù

original: de la gal te phyogs dngos ma yin no zhes brjod pa yin na grub pa sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de la gal te phyogs dngos ma yin no zhes brjod pa yin na grub pa sgrub pa'o //
translated: If one says that the subject is not an entity, then one is proving what is already established.

original: ci ste chos can ni phyogs kyi phyogs gcig yin pa nyid kyi phyir na nye bar btags pas kyang de ltar bstan par 'os pa ma yin no zhes bsgrub par bya na de'i tshe ma nges pa ste /
analyzed: ci ste chos can ni phyogs kyi phyogs gcig yin pa nyid kyi phyir na nye bar btags pas kyang de ltar bstan par 'os pa ma yin no zhes bsgrub par bya na de'i tshe ma nges pa ste /
translated: But if one proves that the subject is not suitable to be taught as the property of the subject because it is only one part of the subject, then that is not established.

original: tshogs pa'i phyogs gcig la tshogs pa nye bar btags nas bstan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: tshogs pa'i phyogs gcig la tshogs pa nye bar btags nas bstan pa'i phyir te /
translated: This is because the collection is taught as if it were imputed to be one part of the subject.

original: ras yug gi phyogs gcig la ras yug tu nye bar 'dogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ras yug gi phyogs gcig la ras yug tu nye bar 'dogs pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like imputing a cloth to one part of a cloth.

original: chos smos pa ni zhar la byung ba ste /
analyzed: chos smos pa ni zhar la byung ba ste /
translated: The mention of the property is a digression.

original: bsgrub par bya bas gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba zhes pa 'dir yang rtsod pa 'di yongs su spang ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya bas gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba zhes pa 'dir yang rtsod pa 'di yongs su spang ba'i don du'o //
translated: The expression the probandum is pervaded by the probans is used here in order to completely avoid this dispute.

original: dngos min na yang zhes pa ste 'dir ni shes par 'dod cing phyis kyi dus su grub pa @155a * //üîΩbrten pa'i chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can bsgrub par bya ba'o zhes pas tshogs pa bsgrub byar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos min na yang zhes pa ste 'dir ni shes par 'dod cing phyis kyi dus su grub pa @155a * // brten pa'i chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can bsgrub par bya ba'o zhes pas tshogs pa bsgrub byar brjod par bya'o //
translated: Even if it is not an entity, the probandum is still an entity, because it is the basis of the probans. üîΩ The word even is used here in order to indicate that the probandum is a property-possessor qualified by a property that is dependent on the probans. üîΩ The word even is used here in order to indicate that the probandum is a property-possessor qualified by a property that is dependent on the probans. üîΩ The word even is used here in order to indicate that the probandum is a property-possessor qualified by a property that is dependent on the probans.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i chos can de yang bsgrub par bya ba dngos po kho na ste /üîΩde la byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos mi srid par 'gyur ro zhes pas 'di ni brtsad par bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i chos can de yang bsgrub par bya ba dngos po kho na ste / de la byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos mi srid par 'gyur ro zhes pas 'di ni brtsad par bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: The word even is used here in order to indicate that the probandum is a property-possessor qualified by a property that is dependent on the probans. üîΩ The word even is used here in order to indicate that the probandum is a property-possessor qualified by a property that is dependent on the probans.

original: khyod kyis yongs su brtags pa ni tshogs pa bsgrub par bya bar khas blangs nas ni kho bos 'di lan du brjod par bya'o zhes pa 'di yang gi sgras gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: khyod kyis yongs su brtags pa ni tshogs pa bsgrub par bya bar khas blangs nas ni kho bos 'di lan du brjod par bya'o zhes pa 'di yang gi sgras gsal bar byed do //
translated: The word even is used here in order to indicate that the probandum is a property-possessor qualified by a property that is dependent on the probans. üîΩ The word even is used here in order to indicate that the probandum is a property-possessor qualified by a property that is dependent on the probans. üîΩ The word even is used here in order to indicate that the probandum is a property-possessor qualified by a property that is dependent on the probans. üîΩ The word even is used here in order to indicate that the probandum is a property-possessor qualified by a property that is dependent on the probans. üîΩ The word even is used here in order to indicate that the probandum is a property-possessor qualified by a property that is dependent on the probans. üîΩ The word even is used here in order to indicate that the probandum is a property-possessor qualified by a property that is dependent on the probans. üîΩ The word even is used here in order to indicate that the probandum is a property-possessor

original: 'di skad bshad par gyur to //
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par gyur to //
translated: This is what is being said.

original: gal te yang dngos ma yin pa de lta na yang skyon med na dngos nyid la lta ci zhig ces pa'o //
analyzed: gal te yang dngos ma yin pa de lta na yang skyon med na dngos nyid la lta ci zhig ces pa'o //
translated: Even if it is not a thing, if there is no fault, then what to say of it being a thing itself?

original: yang dngos ma yin pa nyid la skyon med pa yin pa gang las de la bsgrub par bya ba nyid du nye bar gdags par bya ba ci ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang dngos ma yin pa nyid la skyon med pa yin pa gang las de la bsgrub par bya ba nyid du nye bar gdags par bya ba ci ltar yin zhe na /
translated: Moreover, if there is no fault in not being a thing, then how could it be designated as the very thing to be established?

original: nye bar 'dogs pa'i rgyu gsungs pa //
analyzed: nye bar 'dogs pa'i rgyu gsungs pa //
translated: The reason for the designation is stated:

original: phyogs gcig phyir zhes pa ste /
analyzed: phyogs gcig phyir zhes pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of being one part.‚Äù

original: de 'dis ni /
analyzed: de 'dis ni /
translated: This means that

original: gang zhig gang phyogs /
analyzed: gang zhig gang phyogs /
translated: whatever is one part of something

original: gcig yin pa de ni des tha snyad bstan par 'os pa yin te /
analyzed: gcig yin pa de ni des tha snyad bstan par 'os pa yin te /
translated: is suitable to be indicated by the term of that,

original: dper na snam bu'i phyogs gcig ni snam bur tha snyad bstan pa bzhin /
analyzed: dper na snam bu'i phyogs gcig ni snam bur tha snyad bstan pa bzhin /
translated: just as one part of a cloth is suitable to be indicated by the term ‚Äúcloth.‚Äù

original: chos can yang phyogs kyi phyogs gcig yin no zhes pa rang bzhin gsungs so //
analyzed: chos can yang phyogs kyi phyogs gcig yin no zhes pa rang bzhin gsungs so //
translated: The subject is also one part of the part, he says, stating the nature.

original: dgos pa med pa'i phyir nye bar gdags par mi bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: dgos pa med pa'i phyir nye bar gdags par mi bya'o zhe na /
translated: If it is said that it should not be designated because there is no purpose,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: de'i phyogs gcig yin pa nyid kyi phyir nye bar gdags su rung ba'i chos can gyi chos rtogs pa'i don can yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: de'i phyogs gcig yin pa nyid kyi phyir nye bar gdags su rung ba'i chos can gyi chos rtogs pa'i don can yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Because it is one part of that, it is suitable to be designated. It has the meaning of realizing the property of the subject.

original: nye bar btags ba ni'o //
analyzed: nye bar btags ba ni'o //
translated: The designation is

original: de lta na yang mig gis gzung bya nyid la sogs pa yang yongs su sbangs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na yang mig gis gzung bya nyid la sogs pa yang yongs su sbangs par 'gyur ro //
translated: in that way, the object of eye sense-faculty and so forth are also relinquished.üîΩThe mere is designated.

original: 'ba' zhig pa ni nye bar btags par 'gyur ro zhes pa 'dir bsgrub par bya ba zhes sbrel bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig pa ni nye bar btags par 'gyur ro zhes pa 'dir bsgrub par bya ba zhes sbrel bar bya'o //
translated: Here, the statement ‚Äúin that way‚Äù is connected to ‚Äúthe probandum.‚Äù

original: 'dir yang zhes pa gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag par ro //
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes pa gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag par ro //
translated: Here, ‚Äúalso‚Äù refers to the inference for the sake of others.

original: gnyis la grub pas zhes pa rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba dag la phyogs kyi chos nyid du nges par gyur ba gang yin pa des tha snyad yin no //
analyzed: gnyis la grub pas zhes pa rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba dag la phyogs kyi chos nyid du nges par gyur ba gang yin pa des tha snyad yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúEstablished for both‚Äù means that the mere property of the subject that is ascertained for the proponent and the opponent is the convention.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs kyi dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin te //
analyzed: 'di shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs kyi dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin te //
translated: Because it is in terms of the reason that makes that known, as was explained.

original: de'i phyir don gyis go bas /
analyzed: de'i phyir don gyis go bas /
translated: Therefore, by implication,

original: gnyis la bzlog pa na ste /
analyzed: gnyis la bzlog pa na ste /
translated: the reversal is for both.

original: ma nges pa na zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ma nges pa na zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúif it is not ascertained‚Äù is that.

original: gcig la yang bzlog pa na dang gnyis la'ang gcig la the tshom za na dang / gzhi ma grub na'ang 'dod ma yin //
analyzed: gcig la yang bzlog pa na dang gnyis la'ang gcig la the tshom za na dang / gzhi ma grub na'ang 'dod ma yin //
translated: If it is reversed in one, and if there is doubt in one of the two, and if the basis is not established, it is not accepted.

original: @155b gtan tshigs su zhes pa'o //
analyzed: @155b gtan tshigs su zhes pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúreason‚Äù is understood.

original: des na de bsal ba'i don du rtsol ma thag pa gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: des na de bsal ba'i don du rtsol ma thag pa gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, in order to eliminate that, the immediately preceding effort should be stated.

original: gal te rnam pa 'di lta bu sgrub par byed pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te rnam pa 'di lta bu sgrub par byed pa ma yin na /
translated: If it is not a proof in this way,

original: 'o na sun 'byin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na sun 'byin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then it is a refutation.üîΩIt is said:

original: gsungs pa / mi 'dod phyir kun sun 'byin min //
analyzed: gsungs pa / mi 'dod phyir kun sun 'byin min //
translated: Because it is not accepted, it is not a refutation.

original: zhes pa'o // ji ltar gnyis ka la grub pas bsgrub par bya ba nges par 'gyur gyi rnam pa gzhan du ma yin pa de ltar gnyis ka la grub pa kho nas skyon can nyid du nges par byed kyi rnam pa gzhan du mi 'dod pa tsam gyis ni ma yin
analyzed: zhes pa'o // ji ltar gnyis ka la grub pas bsgrub par bya ba nges par 'gyur gyi rnam pa gzhan du ma yin pa de ltar gnyis ka la grub pa kho nas skyon can nyid du nges par byed kyi rnam pa gzhan du mi 'dod pa tsam gyis ni ma yin
translated: Just as the probandum is ascertained by means of what is established for both, not in any other way, so too, one should ascertain the faultiness by means of what is established for both, not in any other way. It is not merely by the mere non-acceptance.

original: no // 'o na 'dis sun dbyung bar bya ba'o zhes pas na sun 'byin te skyob rjod par byed pa'i tshig ma yin nam /
analyzed: no // 'o na 'dis sun dbyung bar bya ba'o zhes pas na sun 'byin te skyob rjod par byed pa'i tshig ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it that which refutes what is to be refuted?

original: ci ltar na don sun 'byin pa'o zhes brjod ce na /üîΩyul dang yul can tha mi dad pa nye bar btags pa las sam /
analyzed: ci ltar na don sun 'byin pa'o zhes brjod ce na / yul dang yul can tha mi dad pa nye bar btags pa las sam /
translated: How can it be said that the meaning is refuted?üîΩIt is explained that way because it is a designation of the non-difference of object and subject,

original: sun 'byin gyi sgra las sgrub pa yin pa nyid kyi phyir de skad bshad do zhes pas skyon med do //
analyzed: sun 'byin gyi sgra las sgrub pa yin pa nyid kyi phyir de skad bshad do zhes pas skyon med do //
translated: or because the word ‚Äúrefute‚Äù is established from the word ‚Äúprove.‚Äù

original: yang 'di sun 'byin pa ma yin pa ci zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang 'di sun 'byin pa ma yin pa ci zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Again, what is it that is not a refutation? It is said:

original: 'di lta ste zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is like this‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: 'o na ci 'dra ba zhig sgrub par byed pa dang sun 'byin par byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci 'dra ba zhig sgrub par byed pa dang sun 'byin par byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it that proves and what is it that refutes?üîΩIt is said:

original: gsungs pa / gnyi ga la yang rab grub pa /
analyzed: gsungs pa / gnyi ga la yang rab grub pa /
translated: ‚ÄúIn both cases, it is well established‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so on.

original: gang zhig gnyi ga la yang phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa zhes par grub pa de ni sun 'byin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: gang zhig gnyi ga la yang phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa zhes par grub pa de ni sun 'byin pa kho na ste /
translated: That which is established as not being a property of the subject in both cases is only a refutation,

original: dper na mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid lta bu'o //
translated: like being perceptible by the eye.

original: sgrub par byed pa ni gnyis ka la phyogs kyi chos nyid du rab tu grub pa ste /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ni gnyis ka la phyogs kyi chos nyid du rab tu grub pa ste /
translated: The establishing factor is the property of the position that is well established for both parties.

original: dper na rkyen gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa nyid lta bu ste byas pa nyid la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba na'o //
analyzed: dper na rkyen gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa nyid lta bu ste byas pa nyid la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba na'o //
translated: For example, in the proof that sound is impermanent, the property of the position is producedness.

original: 'o na rkyen ni rgyu yin na sgra la ni rgyu ci yang med de /
analyzed: 'o na rkyen ni rgyu yin na sgra la ni rgyu ci yang med de /
translated: But if a condition is a cause, then sound has no cause at all,

original: de rtag pa nyid du rgol bas khas len pas so //
analyzed: de rtag pa nyid du rgol bas khas len pas so //
translated: because the opponent accepts that sound is permanent.

original: des na ci zhig las rkyen gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: des na ci zhig las rkyen gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa nyid yin zhe na /
translated: So what is the condition that is different due to a difference in conditions?

original: 'o na de rkan la sogs pa'i g-yo ba yod pa kho na la dmigs pa ci ltar yin /
analyzed: 'o na de rkan la sogs pa'i g-yo ba yod pa kho na la dmigs pa ci ltar yin /
translated: But how is it that sound is observed only when the palate and so on are active?

original: gal te rkan la sogs pa rnams de'i rgyu ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te rkan la sogs pa rnams de'i rgyu ma yin gyi /
translated: The palate and so on are not the cause of sound.

original: de rkan la sogs pa rnams kyis gsal bar byed de /
analyzed: de rkan la sogs pa rnams kyis gsal bar byed de /
translated: Sound is manifested by the palate and so on.

original: des na de'i bya ba yod pa kho na la de dmigs pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: des na de'i bya ba yod pa kho na la de dmigs pa'o zhe na /
translated: Therefore sound is observed only when its activity exists.

original: ma yin te rtag pa rnams la mngon par gsal ba mi rung ba'i phyir ta sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ma yin te rtag pa rnams la mngon par gsal ba mi rung ba'i phyir ta sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: That is not so, because manifestation is not possible for permanent phenomena, as was previously explained.

original: rkan la sogs pa'i byed pas sgrib pa sel bar byed do //
analyzed: rkan la sogs pa'i byed pas sgrib pa sel bar byed do //
translated: The palate, etc., remove the obstruction.

original: de'i phyir de'i de ma thag tu nye bar dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i de ma thag tu nye bar dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the sound is perceived immediately after the effort.

original: ma yin te /üîΩde'i bdag nyid nyams pa med pa las na 'ga' zhig gi yang sgrib pa nyid mi srid @156a * //
analyzed: ma yin te / de'i bdag nyid nyams pa med pa las na 'ga' zhig gi yang sgrib pa nyid mi srid @156a * //
translated: No, that is not so.

original: ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Since the nature of sound is not impaired, it is impossible for anything to obstruct it.

original: rang gi yul la shes pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi yul la shes pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir /
translated: Since it generates cognition of its object,

original: de la rkan la sogs pa'i g-yo ba lhan cig byed pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: de la rkan la sogs pa'i g-yo ba lhan cig byed pa'o zhe na /
translated: the palate, etc., are its cooperating conditions.

original: ma yin te phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa rnams lhan cig byed pa nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa rnams lhan cig byed pa nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, that is not so, because it is untenable that non-beneficial things are cooperating conditions.

original: mtha'i gnas skabs na ni gang sa bon la sogs pa phan chun phan 'dogs pa la mi ltos pa rnams lhan cig byed pa yin te /
analyzed: mtha'i gnas skabs na ni gang sa bon la sogs pa phan chun phan 'dogs pa la mi ltos pa rnams lhan cig byed pa yin te /
translated: In the final stage, those things that do not depend on mutual benefit, such as seeds, etc., are cooperating conditions.üîΩThey do not generate a special result.

original: de ni khyad bar skyed par byed pa ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: de ni khyad bar skyed par byed pa ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: 'bras bu gcig byed pa kho na yin na /
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig byed pa kho na yin na /
translated: They merely generate a single result.

original: 'di ni skar la srid pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni skar la srid pa yang ma yin te /
translated: But that is not possible.

original: de ni gal te nus pa yin na /
analyzed: de ni gal te nus pa yin na /
translated: If it is a potentiality,

original: 'ba' zhig pas kyang byed par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig pas kyang byed par 'gyur zhing /
translated: then it would produce even by itself alone.

original: gal te mi nus pa yin na lhan cig pa yang byed pa ma yin no zhes pas 'di ni the tshom med do //
analyzed: gal te mi nus pa yin na lhan cig pa yang byed pa ma yin no zhes pas 'di ni the tshom med do //
translated: If it is not a potentiality, then even when it is simultaneous, it does not produce. Thus there is no doubt about this.

original: phan 'dogs pa 'ga' zhig byed pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa 'ga' zhig byed pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: If it is an aid, it is only an aid.

original: de ci de las don gzhan nam 'on te cig shos yin /
analyzed: de ci de las don gzhan nam 'on te cig shos yin /
translated: What is that? Is it different from that or is it the other?

original: don gzhan nyid na sgra'i phan pa zhes pa'i 'brel pa ci zhig yin /
analyzed: don gzhan nyid na sgra'i phan pa zhes pa'i 'brel pa ci zhig yin /
translated: If it is different, what is the relation of the aid of sound?

original: don gzhan ma yin pa nyid na de kho na byed pa'o zhes pas rkyen gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa nyid grub bo //
analyzed: don gzhan ma yin pa nyid na de kho na byed pa'o zhes pas rkyen gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa nyid grub bo //
translated: If it is not different, it is just that which produces. Thus the difference is established by the difference of the conditions.

original: 'o na phyogs kyi chos kho na gtan tshigs nyid yin na chos can gyis chos can dang chos sam chos can gyis sam chos kyis chos can rjes su dpag par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pas mtshan nyid ma khyab pa can no zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na phyogs kyi chos kho na gtan tshigs nyid yin na chos can gyis chos can dang chos sam chos can gyis sam chos kyis chos can rjes su dpag par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pas mtshan nyid ma khyab pa can no zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If the property of the subject alone is the reason, then the subject is inferred by the property or the property is inferred by the subject. Thus the definition is not all-encompassing.

original: phyogs chos kyi sgrub bar byed pa nyid na zhes pa ste /
analyzed: phyogs chos kyi sgrub bar byed pa nyid na zhes pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúWhen the property of the subject is the proof itself‚Äù means

original: phyogs chos kho na gtan chi gas so zhes 'dir khas blangs par gyur na zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: phyogs chos kho na gtan chi gas so zhes 'dir khas blangs par gyur na zhes pa'i don to //
translated: that if one accepts that the property of the subject alone is the logical reason.

original: chos can chos can gyis bsgrub min //üîΩchos ni chos can gyis bsgrub bya ma yin no zhes pa dang / des te chos kyis chos can yang bsgrub bya ma yin no //
analyzed: chos can chos can gyis bsgrub min // chos ni chos can gyis bsgrub bya ma yin no zhes pa dang / des te chos kyis chos can yang bsgrub bya ma yin no //
translated: The subject is not established by the subject.üîΩThe property is not the object to be established by the subject, and the subject is not the object to be established by the property.

original: re zhig gang rnams rjod par byed pa zhes pa la /
analyzed: re zhig gang rnams rjod par byed pa zhes pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúThe subject is not established by the subject‚Äù means

original: de rnams ni 'di ltar sems par byed do //
analyzed: de rnams ni 'di ltar sems par byed do //
translated: that they think as follows.

original: tshogs pa'i don bsgrub par bya ba nyid na /
analyzed: tshogs pa'i don bsgrub par bya ba nyid na /
translated: When the object of the collection is the object to be established,

original: de'i phyogs gcig pa'i chos ni phyogs chos so zhes pas phyogs chos gtan tshigs su 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de'i phyogs gcig pa'i chos ni phyogs chos so zhes pas phyogs chos gtan tshigs su 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: then the property of one part of that is the property of the subject, and thus the property of the subject is indeed the logical reason.

original: gang gi tshe chos can me kho na bsgrub bya yin zhing tshogs pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe chos can me kho na bsgrub bya yin zhing tshogs pa ni ma yin la /
translated: But when the subject, fire, alone is the object to be established and not the collection,

original: de yang chos can gzhan du pas yin te /
analyzed: de yang chos can gzhan du pas yin te /
translated: and that is because of another subject,

original: de'i tshe ci ltar phyogs chos gtan tshigs su 'gyur zhes par ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe ci ltar phyogs chos gtan tshigs su 'gyur zhes par ro //
translated: then how could the property of the subject be the logical reason?

original: 'di la'o zhes brjod par bya'o zhes pas /
analyzed: 'di la'o zhes brjod par bya'o zhes pas /
translated: It should be said, It is in this.

original: me yod pa nyid bsgrub bar bya ba ma yin ba nyid la 'thad pa gzhan 'di'o //
analyzed: me yod pa nyid bsgrub bar bya ba ma yin ba nyid la 'thad pa gzhan 'di'o //
translated: This is the other logical possibility for the non-establishment of the existence of fire.

original: 'di la'i sgra dang du ba mngon par 'brel bar 'gyur @156b ram ;
analyzed: 'di la'i sgra dang du ba mngon par 'brel bar 'gyur @156b ram ;
translated: The word in this is connected with smoke.

original: 'on te yul phyogs sam mer 'gyur /
analyzed: 'on te yul phyogs sam mer 'gyur /
translated: Or, is it the place or the fire?

original: de la gal te du ba 'brel na dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid du 'gyur te sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: de la gal te du ba 'brel na dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid du 'gyur te sngar bzhin no //
translated: If it is connected with smoke, then it would be just one part of the meaning of the thesis, as before.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi me kho na 'di la zhes nges par bstan par bya ba'o zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi me kho na 'di la zhes nges par bstan par bya ba'o zhe na /
translated: Even if that is so, it should be demonstrated that it is in the fire.

original: gsungs pa me la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa me la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said:

original: yang gi sgra ni me de kho na bdag nyid kyi rten du rigs pa 'ang ma yin no zhes ba'i skyon bsdu ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni me de kho na bdag nyid kyi rten du rigs pa 'ang ma yin no zhes ba'i skyon bsdu ba'i don du'o //
translated: The word also is for the purpose of including the fault that it is not logical for that fire itself to be the basis.

original: yang ci'i phyir me la mthong ba rigs pa ma yin zhan gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir me la mthong ba rigs pa ma yin zhan gsungs pa /
translated: Why is it not logical to see fire? It is said:

original: rjes su dpag pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes pa ste /
translated: Because it would follow that there would be no inference.

original: mngon sum ma yin pa'i me la du ba mthong ba ni srid pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: mngon sum ma yin pa'i me la du ba mthong ba ni srid pa ma yin pas so //
translated: Because it is impossible to see smoke without fire.

original: de'i phyir rtags 'dzin pa'i dus kho na na me rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir rjes su dpag pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir rtags 'dzin pa'i dus kho na na me rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir rjes su dpag pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, because fire is understood at the very time of apprehending the evidence, there would be no inference.

original: de'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Therefore, etc.

original: rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir 'di la zhes pa ni yul phyogs la yin par gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir 'di la zhes pa ni yul phyogs la yin par gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: Because there is no other form, it must be accepted that this is the place.

original: de yang de dag gis chos can kho na'o zhes pa /
analyzed: de yang de dag gis chos can kho na'o zhes pa /
translated: And that is the property of the subject, he says.

original: me dang du ba dag yul phyogs kyi ngor chos nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: me dang du ba dag yul phyogs kyi ngor chos nyid du gsungs so //
translated: Fire and smoke are said to be the property of the place.

original: de las kyang mes khyad par du byas par sa phyogs de'i chos du bas bsgrub par bya'o zhes pas phyogs chos med pa'i gtan tshigs nyid med do //
analyzed: de las kyang mes khyad par du byas par sa phyogs de'i chos du bas bsgrub par bya'o zhes pas phyogs chos med pa'i gtan tshigs nyid med do //
translated: And from that, it is said that the place qualified by fire is to be established by smoke, so there is no reason for the absence of the property of the subject.

original: 'o na de lta na yang du ba ni 'phyur ba dang skya lo nyid la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyis yon tan can nyid kyi phyir chos can kho na ste /
analyzed: 'o na de lta na yang du ba ni 'phyur ba dang skya lo nyid la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyis yon tan can nyid kyi phyir chos can kho na ste /
translated: But in that case, since smoke is endowed with the qualities of billowing, grayness, and so on, it is the very property-possessor.

original: de bzhin du me yang dro pa nyid dang sreg bar byed pa nyid la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyis so zhes ci ltar de dag chos yin zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du me yang dro pa nyid dang sreg bar byed pa nyid la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyis so zhes ci ltar de dag chos yin zhe na /
translated: And likewise, fire is also so, since it is endowed with the qualities of heat, burning, and so on. So how can they be properties?

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /üîΩ'dir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa / 'dir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: To respond to that, he says:

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i tha snyad la yon tan dang yon tan can nyid kyis chos dang chos can nyid du mngon par dgongs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i tha snyad la yon tan dang yon tan can nyid kyis chos dang chos can nyid du mngon par dgongs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, the terms ‚Äúproperty‚Äù and ‚Äúproperty-possessor‚Äù are not intended to refer to the relation of quality and qualified in the context of the terms ‚Äúproperty‚Äù and ‚Äúproperty-possessor.‚Äù

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What, then, are they?

original: bsgrub pa'i bya ba nyid la ltos bas te /
analyzed: bsgrub pa'i bya ba nyid la ltos bas te /
translated: They are in terms of the relation of the act of proof.

original: gang zhig don gang gis khyad par du byas par gang zhig gis bsgrub bar bya ba de ni chos can yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig don gang gis khyad par du byas par gang zhig gis bsgrub bar bya ba de ni chos can yin te /
translated: That which is to be proven, qualified by some object, is the property-possessor.

original: phan gdags par bya ba nyid kyi phyir dang / cig shos dag ni phan 'dogs pa bo nyid kyi phyir chos yin pa nyid do zhes pas me dang du ba dag chos yin bar 'gyur ba kho na'o //
analyzed: phan gdags par bya ba nyid kyi phyir dang / cig shos dag ni phan 'dogs pa bo nyid kyi phyir chos yin pa nyid do zhes pas me dang du ba dag chos yin bar 'gyur ba kho na'o //
translated: Because the former is that which is to be benefited, and the latter is that which benefits, they are dharmas. Thus, fire and smoke would be dharmas.

original: de la gang rnams mes reg bya //
analyzed: de la gang rnams mes reg bya //
translated: In that case, ‚Äúthat which is touched by fire‚Äù

original: zhes pa 'di ni dro ba'i reg pa yod do //
analyzed: zhes pa 'di ni dro ba'i reg pa yod do //
translated: means that there is the contact of heat.

original: me'i phyir ro zhes @157a * //
analyzed: me'i phyir ro zhes @157a * //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of fire‚Äù

original: pa 'di la /
analyzed: pa 'di la /
translated: means

original: reg btsam bsgrub par bya ba yin zhing reg pa yang chos yin te /
analyzed: reg btsam bsgrub par bya ba yin zhing reg pa yang chos yin te /
translated: that the mere contact is to be established, and contact is a dharma,

original: lus dang ldan pa'i yon tan yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: lus dang ldan pa'i yon tan yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is a quality of the body.

original: snga ma bzhin du zhes pa ni /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du zhes pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúAs before‚Äù means

original: 'dir zhes pa gal te me dang sbrel ba yin na dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir zhes pa gal te me dang sbrel ba yin na dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: that if ‚Äúhere‚Äù is connected with ‚Äúfire,‚Äù then one part of the meaning of the thesis would be the reason.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba reg pa la me mthong ba rigs pa yang ma yin te rjes su dpag pa med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba reg pa la me mthong ba rigs pa yang ma yin te rjes su dpag pa med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is also not logical that fire is seen in the contact that is to be inferred, because it would follow that there would be no inference.

original: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar 'dir zhes pa la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar 'dir zhes pa la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it must be said: ‚ÄúHere, without doubt, . . .‚Äù

original: re zhig thams cad la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: re zhig thams cad la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: First, it is said:

original: gnas mal khang la sogs par gang du ba can der me dmigs pa ma yin no zhes pas yul phyogs bsgrub par bya ba nyid du rigs shing /
analyzed: gnas mal khang la sogs par gang du ba can der me dmigs pa ma yin no zhes pas yul phyogs bsgrub par bya ba nyid du rigs shing /
translated: It is not the case that fire is not observed in a place where there is smoke.

original: dro ba'i reg ba dang bral ba'i me ni nam yang dmigs pa ma yin te /üîΩdes na ji ltar du ba 'di ni me dang ldan pa ste de las gzhan pa'i du ba bzhin no zhes pa 'khrul pa yin pa de ltar me 'di ni dro ba'i reg pa can te /
analyzed: dro ba'i reg ba dang bral ba'i me ni nam yang dmigs pa ma yin te / des na ji ltar du ba 'di ni me dang ldan pa ste de las gzhan pa'i du ba bzhin no zhes pa 'khrul pa yin pa de ltar me 'di ni dro ba'i reg pa can te /
translated: It is never the case that fire is observed without the tactile sensation of heat.

original: me nyid kyi phyir de las gzhan pa'i me bzhin no zhes pa 'khrul pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: me nyid kyi phyir de las gzhan pa'i me bzhin no zhes pa 'khrul pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, just as it is erroneous to say, ‚ÄúThis smoke is associated with fire, like other smoke,‚Äù it is not erroneous to say, ‚ÄúThis fire has the tactile sensation of heat, because it is fire, like other fire.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir me'i khyad par la reg bya'i khyad par bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyi phyir yul phyogs brtags pa don med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir me'i khyad par la reg bya'i khyad par bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyi phyir yul phyogs brtags pa don med do //
translated: Therefore, since the tactile sensation of heat is to be established as a property of fire, it is pointless to examine the place where fire is located.

original: da ltar 'gyur mod kyi bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir na dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhe na smras pa /
analyzed: da ltar 'gyur mod kyi bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir na dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhe na smras pa /
translated: Now, although it is so, because the probandum and the probans are not different, one part of the meaning of the thesis becomes the logical reason.

original: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The reply to that is:

original: me'i khyad par bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yang zhes pa /
analyzed: me'i khyad par bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yang zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúNo, because of the difference of the fire.‚Äù

original: gal te'ang me'i khyad par bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de lta na yang yul phyogs bsgrub par bya ba nyid du gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: gal te'ang me'i khyad par bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de lta na yang yul phyogs bsgrub par bya ba nyid du gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya ste /
translated: Even if the difference of the fire is the probandum, still one must certainly accept that the place is the probandum.

original: gang gi phyir yul phyogs kyi khyad par kho na las me'i khyad par du 'gyur gyi rnam pa gzhan du ma yin pa der gdon mi za bar sa phyogs de me'o zhes phyogs su byas la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir yul phyogs kyi khyad par kho na las me'i khyad par du 'gyur gyi rnam pa gzhan du ma yin pa der gdon mi za bar sa phyogs de me'o zhes phyogs su byas la /
translated: Because the difference of the fire is only due to the difference of the place, and not otherwise.

original: de las kyang yul phyogs su de kho na dro ba'i reg pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de las kyang yul phyogs su de kho na dro ba'i reg pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: There one must certainly take the place as the fire, and also the place is to be established by the mere heat-touch there.

original: de la yul phyogs kyi khyad par la sdang ba dang me'i khyad par la rjes su chags pa 'di ci zhig chos can yang des zhes pa chos kyis so //
analyzed: de la yul phyogs kyi khyad par la sdang ba dang me'i khyad par la rjes su chags pa 'di ci zhig chos can yang des zhes pa chos kyis so //
translated: What is this, that you hate the particular of the place and love the particular of fire?

original: 'dir pha rol po'i bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir pha rol po'i bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The opponent's idea here is this:

original: gtso bo ni chos can te /
analyzed: gtso bo ni chos can te /
translated: The principal is the subject,

original: yongs su 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has the property of transformation, etc.

original: de yang 'dir /
analyzed: de yang 'dir /
translated: And here,

original: khyad @157b par rnams la rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi rang gi ngo bos bsgrub bar bya ste /
analyzed: khyad @157b par rnams la rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi rang gi ngo bos bsgrub bar bya ste /
translated: the property is to be established by the intrinsic nature of the property-possessor which is pervaded by the property.

original: chos gzhan brjod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos gzhan brjod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not another property that is stated.

original: ma grub pa ni grub pa'i chos yin pa srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ma grub pa ni grub pa'i chos yin pa srid pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not possible that what is not established is a property of what is established.

original: des na phyogs chos nyid gtan tshigs so zhes pa 'di mi rigs so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: des na phyogs chos nyid gtan tshigs so zhes pa 'di mi rigs so zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not correct to say that the property of the subject is the reason.

original: der ni khyad par rnams kho na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: der ni khyad par rnams kho na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: There, the particularities alone, etc.

original: khyad par rnams ni nang dang phyi'i rnam 'gyur rnams te /
analyzed: khyad par rnams ni nang dang phyi'i rnam 'gyur rnams te /
translated: The particularities are the internal and external transformations.

original: de rnams rgyu gcig pa nyid du bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams rgyu gcig pa nyid du bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Those are to be established as having the same cause.

original: ci'i phyir 'di yin zhe na /üîΩgsungs pa / de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di yin zhe na / gsungs pa / de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Why is this so?üîΩIt is said:üîΩ‚ÄúThus, etc.‚Äù

original: 'di skad bshad de /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad de /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: spyi sngon ma can gyi khyad par rnams ni 'jig rten na rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba can du mthong ste /
analyzed: spyi sngon ma can gyi khyad par rnams ni 'jig rten na rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba can du mthong ste /
translated: Particulars that possess a prior universal are seen in the world to be pervaded by a single class.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: gyo mo dang gser gyi rgyan la sogs pa bzhin zhes pa /
analyzed: gyo mo dang gser gyi rgyan la sogs pa bzhin zhes pa /
translated: like a shard and a golden ornament, etc.

original: 'di ltar dper brjod par bya ba na yang nye bar sbyor ba dang mjug sdud dag gis bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa gsal bar 'gyur ro //üîΩde ltar yang nang gi bdag nyid kyi khyad par rnams la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba de'i phyir de rnams spyi sngon ma can rnams so zhes sam /
analyzed: 'di ltar dper brjod par bya ba na yang nye bar sbyor ba dang mjug sdud dag gis bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa gsal bar 'gyur ro // de ltar yang nang gi bdag nyid kyi khyad par rnams la rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba de'i phyir de rnams spyi sngon ma can rnams so zhes sam /
translated: Thus, when an example is cited, the probandum and the probans are clarified by the application and the conclusion.

original: rgyu gcig pa rnams so zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rgyu gcig pa rnams so zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Thus, since the particulars that have an internal nature are pervaded by a single class, therefore they are said to possess a prior universal, or to have a single cause.

original: de ltar rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba'i gtan tshigs kyis khyad par rnams rgyu gcig pa nyid du bsgrub par bya'o zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba'i gtan tshigs kyis khyad par rnams rgyu gcig pa nyid du bsgrub par bya'o zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should understand that the reason that is the same type proves that the distinctions are the same cause.

original: khyad par rnams rgyu gcig pa can nyid du grub ba ni /
analyzed: khyad par rnams rgyu gcig pa can nyid du grub ba ni /
translated: The establishment of the distinctions as having the same cause

original: gang rgyu gcig pa de kho na gtso bo'o zhes sems pas smras pas /
analyzed: gang rgyu gcig pa de kho na gtso bo'o zhes sems pas smras pas /
translated: is stated by the opponent who thinks that whatever has the same cause is just the principal.

original: gtso bo yod do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gtso bo yod do zhes pa'o //
translated: Thus, the principal exists.

original: de ltar 'dir yang gtan tshigs phyogs chos med pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar 'dir yang gtan tshigs phyogs chos med pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: So too, here, the reason is not non-existent in the subject.

original: de'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Thus, the opponent says, ‚Äúbecause of that‚Äù and so on.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar chos dang chos can dag gi bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos po srid pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar chos dang chos can dag gi bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos po srid pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because in that way the probandum is not possible for the property and the subject,

original: bsgrub bya'i chos la gzhan nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos la gzhan nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because the probandum is different,

original: chos gzhan gtan tshigs zhes bya ba byas ba nyid la sogs pa /
analyzed: chos gzhan gtan tshigs zhes bya ba byas ba nyid la sogs pa /
translated: the property that is different from the reason is called ‚Äúproduced‚Äù and so on.

original: bsgrub bya'i chos mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa dang med na mi 'byung ba nyid du bsgrub par bya bar rtogs par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa dang med na mi 'byung ba nyid du bsgrub par bya bar rtogs par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The property to be established is impermanence, etc. and the invariable concomitance.

original: yang chos kyis chos ni bsgrub bar bya ba'o zhes pa ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: yang chos kyis chos ni bsgrub bar bya ba'o zhes pa ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it that a property establishes a property?

original: 'di tsam gyis khyad par 'di rnams thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di tsam gyis khyad par 'di rnams thob par 'gyur te /
translated: This distinction is obtained by this much.

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i dbang las so //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i dbang las so //
translated: From the power of the desire to express.

original: nus pa yod na sgra rnams brjod 'dod kyi rjes su sgrub bar byed de /
analyzed: nus pa yod na sgra rnams brjod 'dod kyi rjes su sgrub bar byed de /
translated: If there is the ability, the words are established in accordance with the desire to express.

original: dper na gang gis yan lag rnam par 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di lta bu'o //üîΩde ltar na chos kyis @158a * //
analyzed: dper na gang gis yan lag rnam par 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di lta bu'o // de ltar na chos kyis @158a * //
translated: For example, it is like this: ‚ÄúBy what is the limb transformed?‚Äù

original: chos zhes 'dir tha dad pa sbyor ba la gsum ba lta bar bya ste /üîΩchos can chos can gyis bsgrub min //
analyzed: chos zhes 'dir tha dad pa sbyor ba la gsum ba lta bar bya ste / chos can chos can gyis bsgrub min //
translated: Thus, here in ‚Äúa property establishes a property,‚Äù the third case should be understood as applied to a distinction.

original: zhes pa la sogs par ni byed pa kho na la'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs par ni byed pa kho na la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúA property is not established by a property-possessor,‚Äù etc. is in reference to the agent.

original: sngar chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can bsgrub bya'o zhes brjod cing /
analyzed: sngar chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can bsgrub bya'o zhes brjod cing /
translated: Previously, it was stated that a property-possessor qualified by a property is the object to be established.

original: da ltar ni /
analyzed: da ltar ni /
translated: But now,

original: chos kyis chos ni bsgrub bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyis chos ni bsgrub bya'o //
translated: Dharma is to be established by dharma.

original: zhes pa 'di'i phyir tshig 'gal ba dang / sgrub par byed pa skabs sum phab par sems bas smras pa /
analyzed: zhes pa 'di'i phyir tshig 'gal ba dang / sgrub par byed pa skabs sum phab par sems bas smras pa /
translated: For this reason, the opponent thinks that the words are contradictory and that the proof is out of place, and so he says,

original: ci'i phyir zhen zhes pa'o //üîΩchos can de ltar bsgrub bya'i phyir //üîΩzhes pas rgyu gsungs so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhen zhes pa'o // chos can de ltar bsgrub bya'i phyir // zhes pas rgyu gsungs so //
translated: ‚ÄúWhy?‚ÄùüîΩThe reason is stated in the line, ‚ÄúBecause the subject is to be established in that way.‚Äù

original: de ltar zhes pa ni zhes pa la sogs pas 'di kho na rnam par 'byed do //
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa ni zhes pa la sogs pas 'di kho na rnam par 'byed do //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that way‚Äù is analyzed by the words ‚Äúbecause the subject is qualified by the dharma.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can bsgrub par bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can bsgrub par bya ba ste /
translated: The subject is to be established as qualified by the dharma.

original: de'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'i chos ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos med na mi 'byung ba can du bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'i chos ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos med na mi 'byung ba can du bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the proving property must be established as invariably concomitant with the probandum property.

original: 'di kho na ni chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can 'grub pa'i thabs so zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di kho na ni chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can 'grub pa'i thabs so zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is the only way to establish the subject as qualified by the dharma. This is the intended meaning.

original: de ltar ni sngar gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar ni sngar gsungs pa /
translated: This is just as stated earlier:

original: rtags ni chos dang mi 'khrul bar //
analyzed: rtags ni chos dang mi 'khrul bar //
translated: The reason is taught to be nonerroneous with respect to the property

original: gzhan du bstan par bya ba ste //
analyzed: gzhan du bstan par bya ba ste //
translated: And to be different from the probandum.

original: de lta rab grub de ldan par //
analyzed: de lta rab grub de ldan par //
translated: Thus, having that kind of establishment,

original: chos can rtogs par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: chos can rtogs par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: one will understand the subject.

original: zhes so // de'i phyir tshig 'gal ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: zhes so // de'i phyir tshig 'gal ba ma yin zhing /
translated: Therefore, it is not contradictory,

original: skabs su ma bab pa sgrub par byed pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: skabs su ma bab pa sgrub par byed pa yang ma yin te /
translated: and it is not a proof that is not relevant,

original: 'di ni skabs su bab ba 'grub pa'i thabs 'chad pa lhur len pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni skabs su bab ba 'grub pa'i thabs 'chad pa lhur len pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is intent on explaining the means of establishing what is relevant.

original: 'dir sgra ni mi rtag pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir sgra ni mi rtag pa ste /
translated: Here, sound is impermanent,üîΩbecause of being produced, and because of being permanent, and not being produced.

original: byas pa mi rtag ba nyid kyi phyir dang / rtag pa ni ma byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dam bca'i de ma thag tu lnga pa'i mtha' can thob pa'i phyir phyogs chos med kyang 'di ni gtan tshigs yin no //
