analyzed: gtan la phebs pa yod na the tshom yod pa'i phyir zhes pa'o //
translated: Because when there is certainty, there is no doubt.

original: gtan la phebs kyang the tshom gyi zla po la ltos pa'i gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: gtan la phebs kyang the tshom gyi zla po la ltos pa'i gtan tshigs te /
translated: Even if one were to ascertain it, the reason would be dependent on the moon of doubt.

original: the tshom yod na gtan la phebs pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: the tshom yod na gtan la phebs pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Because of the existence of doubt, there is ascertainment.

original: bsdus pa dag ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan ba'i phyir nyes pa med do zhes 'brel bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsdus pa dag ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan ba'i phyir nyes pa med do zhes 'brel bar bya'o //
translated: The summary is connected by ‚Äúthere is no fault‚Äù because it possesses the characteristics of a reason.

original: gnyis ka sgrub par byed na zhes bya ba rgyu mtshan gyi don can gyi bdun pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka sgrub par byed na zhes bya ba rgyu mtshan gyi don can gyi bdun pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf both were established‚Äù is the seventh case, the meaning of cause.

original: re zhig rigs pa zhes pa /
analyzed: re zhig rigs pa zhes pa /
translated: First, ‚Äúreason‚Äù is

original: rnam pa bzhi po ni the tshom gyi rgyu nyid la byed rgyu gnyis ka la yod pa yod de /
analyzed: rnam pa bzhi po ni the tshom gyi rgyu nyid la byed rgyu gnyis ka la yod pa yod de /
translated: taken to be the cause of doubt. Both causes exist.

original: des na gzhal bya nyid la sogs pas the tshom skyed par byed cing /
analyzed: des na gzhal bya nyid la sogs pas the tshom skyed par byed cing /
translated: Therefore, the object of comprehension and so on generate doubt,

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid la ni de med do zhes smras pa /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid la ni de med do zhes smras pa /
translated: but that does not exist for the object of listening.

original: mnyan par bya ba ni ci ltar zhes pa rnam pa ci zhig gis zhes pa ste byed pa'i rgyu ma mthong bas dris pa'o //
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba ni ci ltar zhes pa rnam pa ci zhig gis zhes pa ste byed pa'i rgyu ma mthong bas dris pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHow?‚Äù means ‚Äúin what way?‚Äù It is an inquiry because the cause of the action is not seen.

original: thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pas byed rgyu gsungs so //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pas byed rgyu gsungs so //
translated: The causal process is stated by ‚Äúbecause of being uncommon.‚Äù

original: gal te thun mong ma yin pa the tshom gyi rgyu nyid yin pa cis she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gal te thun mong ma yin pa the tshom gyi rgyu nyid yin pa cis she na gsungs pa /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúWhy is uncommonness the cause of doubt?‚Äù it is said:

original: gang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩbsgrub par bya @170a * //
analyzed: gang zhes pa la sogs pa ste / bsgrub par bya @170a * //
translated: ‚ÄúThat which is the property of the subject‚Äù and so forth.

original: ba'i chos zhes pa phyogs chos so //
analyzed: ba'i chos zhes pa phyogs chos so //
translated: The property of the subject is the predicate of the probandum.

original: 'dis 'brel ba nyid gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dis 'brel ba nyid gsungs te /
translated: This states the connection.

original: ma 'brel ba la ni mig gis gzung bya nyid bzhin du dpyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma 'brel ba la ni mig gis gzung bya nyid bzhin du dpyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no analysis of that which is not connected, like that which is perceived by the eye.

original: khyad par ji srid kyis zhes pa /
analyzed: khyad par ji srid kyis zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúBy what distinction‚Äù means

original: rtag pa dang mi rtog pa'i dngos po'i khyad par gyis dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag nga med pa'i khyad par gyis sam /
analyzed: rtag pa dang mi rtog pa'i dngos po'i khyad par gyis dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag nga med pa'i khyad par gyis sam /
translated: by the distinction of permanent and impermanent things, or by the distinction of contaminated and uncontaminated,

original: mu stegs byed kyis rnam par gzhag pa'i dngos po'i khyad par gyis dngos po thams cad bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: mu stegs byed kyis rnam par gzhag pa'i dngos po'i khyad par gyis dngos po thams cad bsdus pa'o //
translated: or by the distinction of things posited by tƒ´rthikas, all things are included.

original: de la ste dngos po de rnams la the tshom gyi rgyu yin te /
analyzed: de la ste dngos po de rnams la the tshom gyi rgyu yin te /
translated: Doubt is the cause of those things,

original: de dang ldan pa rnams des bsdus pa'i phyir dang zhes pa thun mong ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa rnams de rnams kyis bsdus pa'i phyir ram de rnams su bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa rnams des bsdus pa'i phyir dang zhes pa thun mong ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa rnams de rnams kyis bsdus pa'i phyir ram de rnams su bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This means that those who possess the uncommon attributes are included by them, or are included in them.

original: 'dis ni gang la dngos po'i chos tshig gi don las phyi rol du gyur ba 'di gnas par 'gyur ba rnam pa'i khyad par las phyi rol pa med par gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni gang la dngos po'i chos tshig gi don las phyi rol du gyur ba 'di gnas par 'gyur ba rnam pa'i khyad par las phyi rol pa med par gsungs so //
translated: This states that there is no external aspect that is external to the meaning of the words of the attribute of the entity.

original: mtha' gcig pa ldog pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: mtha' gcig pa ldog pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: Because of the reversal of singularity.

original: mtha' gcig pa ni gtan la phebs pa yin zhing /
analyzed: mtha' gcig pa ni gtan la phebs pa yin zhing /
translated: Singularity is ascertainment.

original: de ldog pa ni med pa'o //
analyzed: de ldog pa ni med pa'o //
translated: Reversal of that is nonexistence.

original: 'dis gcig la yod pa la sgrub byed med pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis gcig la yod pa la sgrub byed med pa gsungs so //
translated: This states that there is no proof of existence in one.

original: gnyis po 'di gcig la bsdus pas ni rnam pa'i khyad par thams cad la thun mong ma yin pa the tshom gyi rgyu ste /
analyzed: gnyis po 'di gcig la bsdus pas ni rnam pa'i khyad par thams cad la thun mong ma yin pa the tshom gyi rgyu ste /
translated: Because of the inclusion of these two in one, all uncommon aspects are causes of doubt.

original: gzhan las ma byung bar nges shing yon tan mtshungs pa'i skyes bu la srid pa'i bud med kyi mngal ni skyes bu rnams la bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan las ma byung bar nges shing yon tan mtshungs pa'i skyes bu la srid pa'i bud med kyi mngal ni skyes bu rnams la bzhin no //
translated: It is certain that it does not arise from another, just as the womb of a woman in the world is for a man.

original: 'o na de yang thams cad the tshom gyi rgyur brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na de yang thams cad the tshom gyi rgyur brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: But that is not to be stated as the cause of doubt for everyone.

original: thun mong ma yin pa 'ga' zhig kyang nges pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa 'ga' zhig kyang nges pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Because even some uncommon [reason] is the cause of ascertainment.

original: dper na gson po'i lus ni bdag dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: dper na gson po'i lus ni bdag dang bcas pa ste /
translated: For example, the living body is with self,

original: srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa lta bu'o zhe na /
analyzed: srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa lta bu'o zhe na /
translated: because it has life and so on.

original: 'di mnyan par bya ba nyid las khyad par ci zhig yod gal te ldog pa mi 'khrul ba'o //
analyzed: 'di mnyan par bya ba nyid las khyad par ci zhig yod gal te ldog pa mi 'khrul ba'o //
translated: What is the difference between that and what is to be heard? If it is said that it is non-erroneous reversal,

original: 'di ni 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ni 'gyur te /
translated: that is possible.

original: srog la sogs pa mi mthun phyogs kho na las ldog gi mthun phyogs las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: srog la sogs pa mi mthun phyogs kho na las ldog gi mthun phyogs las ni ma yin te /
translated: Because life and so on are reversed only from the discordant side, not from the concordant side,

original: med pa las ldog pa mi rung ba'i phyir zhes pas /
analyzed: med pa las ldog pa mi rung ba'i phyir zhes pas /
translated: because reversal from non-existence is not suitable.

original: 'di'i ldog pa ni mi 'khrul ba'o //
analyzed: 'di'i ldog pa ni mi 'khrul ba'o //
translated: Therefore, its reversal is non-erroneous.

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: But what is to be heard is not like that.

original: mi mthun phyogs nyid las mnyan par bya ba nyid ldog pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs nyid las mnyan par bya ba nyid ldog pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: But it is not that the quality of being heard is absent from the discordant side.

original: 'on kyang mthun phyogs las kyang ngo zhe'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang mthun phyogs las kyang ngo zhe'o //
translated: But it is also present on the side that is in agreement.

original: de ltan mnyan par bya ba nyid mi mthun phyogs kho na las ldog pa ma yin no zhes smras pas @170b khyod kyis kyang mthun phyogs la rjes su 'gro ba med par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: de ltan mnyan par bya ba nyid mi mthun phyogs kho na las ldog pa ma yin no zhes smras pas @170b khyod kyis kyang mthun phyogs la rjes su 'gro ba med par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: If that is so, then the quality of being heard is not absent only from the discordant side. By your statement, it would follow that it is not present on the side that is in agreement.

original: de gzhan la yang mtshungs pa kho na ste /
analyzed: de gzhan la yang mtshungs pa kho na ste /
translated: This is exactly the same for the other party.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na 'di ldog pa can kho nar mi 'gyur ro zhes pas srog la sogs pa mnyan par bya ba nyid dang khyad par med do //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na 'di ldog pa can kho nar mi 'gyur ro zhes pas srog la sogs pa mnyan par bya ba nyid dang khyad par med do //
translated: Otherwise, it would not be a universal. Therefore, there is no difference between the quality of being heard and such things as life.

original: gang yang med pa las ldog pa mi rung ba'i phyir zhes brjod pa 'di yang lngar kho nar btags zin pa nyid de /
analyzed: gang yang med pa las ldog pa mi rung ba'i phyir zhes brjod pa 'di yang lngar kho nar btags zin pa nyid de /
translated: Also, the statement ‚ÄúBecause it is not possible for something to be absent from that which is nonexistent‚Äù is just a repetition of the previous argument.

original: dngos po'i ngo bo 'gugs pa'i dgag pa med pa la mi srid mod /
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bo 'gugs pa'i dgag pa med pa la mi srid mod /
translated: It is not possible for a negation that does not imply an affirmative object to be the nature of an existent thing.

original: ma yin par dgag pa gcig pu ni dgag pa'i yul ma yin gyi /
analyzed: ma yin par dgag pa gcig pu ni dgag pa'i yul ma yin gyi /
translated: But a negation that is a simple negation is not the object of negation.

original: 'on kyang med par dgag pa yang yin zhing /
analyzed: 'on kyang med par dgag pa yang yin zhing /
translated: However, it is also an external negation.

original: de med pa la yang 'gal pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: de med pa la yang 'gal pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: And it is not contradictory for that to be nonexistent.

original: thun mong ba dang thun mong ma yin pa dag the tshom gyi rgyu nyid du mtshungs pa la /
analyzed: thun mong ba dang thun mong ma yin pa dag the tshom gyi rgyu nyid du mtshungs pa la /
translated: The common and uncommon are the same in being the cause of doubt.

original: khyad par ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: khyad par ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: The distinction is stated:

original: thun mong ba ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thun mong ba ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The common is not a reason for exclusion.

original: rnam par mi gcod pa'i gtan tshigs ni the tshom gyi rgyu'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par mi gcod pa'i gtan tshigs ni the tshom gyi rgyu'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: a reason for non-exclusion is the cause of doubt.

original: de zhes pa'i thams cad pa'i ming gis skabs su bab pa'i the tshom gyi rgyu la snyegs so //
analyzed: de zhes pa'i thams cad pa'i ming gis skabs su bab pa'i the tshom gyi rgyu la snyegs so //
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to the cause of doubt that is appropriate in the context.

original: 'dir 'di ltar yang bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir 'di ltar yang bshad par bya ste /
translated: Here, this should be explained as follows.

original: thun mong ba ni gang rnams kyi the tshom gyi rgyur yod pa de kho na la rnam par gcod pa min pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur gyi gzhan la ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: thun mong ba ni gang rnams kyi the tshom gyi rgyur yod pa de kho na la rnam par gcod pa min pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur gyi gzhan la ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: The common is that which exists as the cause of doubt for some, but is not a reason for exclusion for others.

original: gang 'dir gnyis ka la brten pa zhes pa rjes su 'jug pa dang ldog pa dag la brten pa'o//
analyzed: gang 'dir gnyis ka la brten pa zhes pa rjes su 'jug pa dang ldog pa dag la brten pa'o//
translated: Here, ‚Äúbased on both‚Äù means based on the forward and reverse pervasions.

original: the tshom gyi rgyu nyid du mtshungs na yang 'di ni khyad par te /
analyzed: the tshom gyi rgyu nyid du mtshungs na yang 'di ni khyad par te /
translated: Even though they are similar in being causes of doubt, they are distinguished as follows.

original: 'di rnams la gang gnyis ka la brten pa de ni bsgrub par bya ba 'ga' zhig la nges pa'i rgyu yang yin te /
analyzed: 'di rnams la gang gnyis ka la brten pa de ni bsgrub par bya ba 'ga' zhig la nges pa'i rgyu yang yin te /
translated: When they are based on both, they are causes of certainty with regard to some object to be established,

original: the tshom gyi rgyu kho na ni ma yin no //
analyzed: the tshom gyi rgyu kho na ni ma yin no //
translated: and they are not merely causes of doubt.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is that? It is said:

original: gzhan las ldog pa'i phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: gzhan las ldog pa'i phyir zhes pa /
translated: Because they are the opposite of the other.

original: mi mthun phyogs las ldog pa'i phyir zhes pa'i don te //
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs las ldog pa'i phyir zhes pa'i don te //
translated: The meaning is that they are the opposite of the discordant side.

original: dper na rtsol ma thag tu byung ba bsgrub par bya ba la /
analyzed: dper na rtsol ma thag tu byung ba bsgrub par bya ba la /
translated: For example, with regard to the object to be established, which arises immediately after effort,

original: mi rtag pa nyid the tshom gyi gtan tshigs kyi zhing /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid the tshom gyi gtan tshigs kyi zhing /
translated: impermanence is the field of the reason of doubt,

original: byas pa nyid la nges pa'i gtan tshigs yin pa bzhin te /
analyzed: byas pa nyid la nges pa'i gtan tshigs yin pa bzhin te /
translated: but being produced is a reason for certainty.

original: ma byas pa las ldog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma byas pa las ldog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is the opposite of the unproduced.

original: de bzhin du reg par bya ba ma yin pa ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag la the tshom gyi rgyu ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du reg par bya ba ma yin pa ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag la the tshom gyi rgyu ste /
translated: Similarly, the imperceivable is a cause of doubt with regard to the permanent and the impermanent.

original: bya ba med pa nyid la ni bya ba dang bcas pa las ldog pa'i phyir nges pa'i gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: bya ba med pa nyid la ni bya ba dang bcas pa las ldog pa'i phyir nges pa'i gtan tshigs so //
translated: In the absence of activity, the reason is ascertained because of the reversal of activity.

original: gang gnyi ga la brten par mi 'gyur ba dper na mnyan bya nyid dang gzhan bya nyid lta bu ni bsgrub par bya ba gzhan la yang nges pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gnyi ga la brten par mi 'gyur ba dper na mnyan bya nyid dang gzhan bya nyid lta bu ni bsgrub par bya ba gzhan la yang nges pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: That which does not depend on both, for example, the state of being heard and the state of being other, is not a reason that ascertains another probandum,

original: gzhan las ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: gzhan las ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro /
translated: because there is no reversal from another.

original: @171a * // yang mnyan par bya ba nyid ci ltar na gnyi ga brten par mi 'gyur te /üîΩdngos po'i chos su gyur pa des ni gdon mi za bar 'ga' zhig tu 'jug par bya ba 'am /
analyzed: @171a * // yang mnyan par bya ba nyid ci ltar na gnyi ga brten par mi 'gyur te / dngos po'i chos su gyur pa des ni gdon mi za bar 'ga' zhig tu 'jug par bya ba 'am /
translated: Moreover, how is the state of being heard not dependent on both?

original: 'ga' zhig las ldog par bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig las ldog par bya'o zhe na /
translated: Since it is a quality of an existent, it must engage in something or it must be reversed from something.

original: 'jug pa dang ldog pa dag ma nges pa nyid kyi phyir de skad du bshad do zhes pas skyon med de /
analyzed: 'jug pa dang ldog pa dag ma nges pa nyid kyi phyir de skad du bshad do zhes pas skyon med de /
translated: We explain that it is because engagement and reversal are not ascertained.

original: yod na yang de dag ni ji srid du nges par ma byas pa de srid du med pa dang mtshungs pa dag ste /
analyzed: yod na yang de dag ni ji srid du nges par ma byas pa de srid du med pa dang mtshungs pa dag ste /
translated: There is no error, because even if they exist, as long as they are not ascertained, they are the same as nonexistents.

original: rjes su dpog pa la yan lag ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpog pa la yan lag ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not a part of the inference.

original: 'o na mnyan par bya ba nyid ni rna bas gzung bar bya ba nyid de /
analyzed: 'o na mnyan par bya ba nyid ni rna bas gzung bar bya ba nyid de /
translated: If it is argued that ‚Äúthe quality of being audible is the quality of being apprehended by the ear,

original: rang gi rnam pa can gyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid kyi mtshan nyid can yin zhing /
analyzed: rang gi rnam pa can gyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid kyi mtshan nyid can yin zhing /
translated: which is defined as the cause of the ear consciousness that has that as its aspect,

original: de yang me rtag pa kho nar rigs kyi rtag pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang me rtag pa kho nar rigs kyi rtag pa ni ma yin te /
translated: and that is only tenable if it is permanent, not impermanent,

original: rnam pa thams cad du don byed nus pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du don byed nus pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is untenable that it can perform a function in every way,‚Äù

original: don byed nus pa'i mtshan nyid can yang dngos po zhes pa 'di ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: don byed nus pa'i mtshan nyid can yang dngos po zhes pa 'di ni bshad zin to //
translated: we have already explained that ‚Äúthing‚Äù is defined as the capacity to perform a function.

original: des na mnyan par bya ba nyid mi rtag pa kho na la 'jug go zhes pa 'di ni the tshom med de /
analyzed: des na mnyan par bya ba nyid mi rtag pa kho na la 'jug go zhes pa 'di ni the tshom med de /
translated: Therefore there is no doubt that the quality of being audible applies only to the impermanent.

original: des na ci ltar rjes su 'jug pa dang ldog pa dag ma nges pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: des na ci ltar rjes su 'jug pa dang ldog pa dag ma nges pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod ce na /
translated: So how can it be said that because the forward and reverse pervasion are not definite?

original: skyon 'di med de /
analyzed: skyon 'di med de /
translated: This fault does not exist.

original: pha rol po'i rtag pa yang dngos por khas len te /
analyzed: pha rol po'i rtag pa yang dngos por khas len te /
translated: The opponent accepts that permanence is a thing.

original: des na de'i 'dod pa la ltos pas de skad bshad do //
analyzed: des na de'i 'dod pa la ltos pas de skad bshad do //
translated: Therefore, it is explained in that way in dependence on the assertion of the other party.

original: rang gi lugs kyis ni mnyan bya nyid mi rtag pa nyid la gtan tshigs kho na'o //üîΩkha cig ni gnyis ka la mi bsten pa'i gzhal bya nyid kyang 'dus ma byas la skur ba 'debs pa las med pa la rjes su 'gro ba mi rigs pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba mi 'khrul ba can mthun phyogs kho na la yod do zhes pas rjes
analyzed: rang gi lugs kyis ni mnyan bya nyid mi rtag pa nyid la gtan tshigs kho na'o // kha cig ni gnyis ka la mi bsten pa'i gzhal bya nyid kyang 'dus ma byas la skur ba 'debs pa las med pa la rjes su 'gro ba mi rigs pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba mi 'khrul ba can mthun phyogs kho na la yod do zhes pas rjes
translated: But according to our own system, the fact that it is audible is the reason for impermanence.üîΩSome say that the object of comprehension is not based on either, because it is not correct that the non-associated impermanent is the object of comprehension of the non-associated permanent.

original: su 'gro ba can kho na'i gtan tshigs su smra'o //
analyzed: su 'gro ba can kho na'i gtan tshigs su smra'o //
translated: Therefore, the correct reason is that which has invariable concomitance only with the similar class.

original: de mi rigs te ci ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa med pa 'am /
analyzed: de mi rigs te ci ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa med pa 'am /
translated: That is incorrect. How is it that it is not absent from the dissimilar class?

original: ci ltar mthun pa'i phyogs kho nal yod pa yin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ci ltar mthun pa'i phyogs kho nal yod pa yin zhes pa'o //
translated: Or how is it that it exists only in the similar class?

original: gal te mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa nyid rnam par mi gcod na nges par gzung ba 'di'i 'bras bu ci yin rnam par gcod na'ang ci ltar mi ldog sta /
analyzed: gal te mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa nyid rnam par mi gcod na nges par gzung ba 'di'i 'bras bu ci yin rnam par gcod na'ang ci ltar mi ldog sta /
translated: If the existence in the similar class is not excluded, then what is the point of this ascertainment? If it is excluded, then how is it not reversed?

original: ldog pa ni yod pa rnam par gcod pa las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldog pa ni yod pa rnam par gcod pa las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the opposite is nothing other than the exclusion of existence.

original: rjes su 'gro ba yang ma yin zhing ldog pa yang ma yin zhes pa 'di ni 'gal ba ste /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba yang ma yin zhing ldog pa yang ma yin zhes pa 'di ni 'gal ba ste /
translated: Nor is it a positive concomitance and a negative concomitance, because this is contradictory.

original: gang med do zhes rjes su 'gro ba bkag pa de nyid ldog pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang med do zhes rjes su 'gro ba bkag pa de nyid ldog pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which is a negative concomitance, in the sense of the exclusion of existence, is itself a positive concomitance.

original: de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba can zhes bya ba'i gtan @171b tshigs ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba can zhes bya ba'i gtan @171b tshigs ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no such thing as a positive concomitance.

original: gzhal bya nyid mi mthun phyogs la rjes su 'gro ba dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhal bya nyid mi mthun phyogs la rjes su 'gro ba dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is the object of comprehension not a positive concomitance with the discordant side,

original: gang gi phyir chos rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: because there are three kinds of phenomena:

original: dngos po'i chos skye ba la sogs pa rnams dang / dngos po med pa'i chos skye ba med pa la sogs pa rnams dang / gnyi ga'i chos gzhal bya nyid la sogs pa rnams yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i chos skye ba la sogs pa rnams dang / dngos po med pa'i chos skye ba med pa la sogs pa rnams dang / gnyi ga'i chos gzhal bya nyid la sogs pa rnams yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the phenomena of things, such as arising, the phenomena of nonthings, such as nonarising, and the phenomena of both, such as the object of comprehension.

original: med pa ni chos 'ga' yang ma yin pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: med pa ni chos 'ga' yang ma yin pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But a nonthing is not a phenomenon at all!

original: chos thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'di kho na de'i chos ma yin nam /
analyzed: chos thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'di kho na de'i chos ma yin nam /
translated: Is this not the very property of all phenomena, namely, being devoid of all phenomena?

original: blos sprul pa ni med pa la yang mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blos sprul pa ni med pa la yang mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not contradictory for the mind to conjure up a non-existent object.

original: rang bzhin thams cad dang bral ba dngos po med pa'o zhes nye par skye ba'i blo ni dngos po thams cad dang bral ba ni de'i chos bzhin du nye bar ston te /
analyzed: rang bzhin thams cad dang bral ba dngos po med pa'o zhes nye par skye ba'i blo ni dngos po thams cad dang bral ba ni de'i chos bzhin du nye bar ston te /
translated: The mind that arises in proximity to the non-existence that is devoid of all intrinsic reality reveals the absence of all things as if it were the property of that.

original: de'i phyir de'i bsam pa'i ngor dngos med la yang chos su rnam par gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i bsam pa'i ngor dngos med la yang chos su rnam par gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, from the perspective of that thought, non-existence should be posited as a property.

original: 'o na gang gi tshe zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'o na gang gi tshe zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, when sound is heard, etc.

original: 'di ni thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir na the tshom gyi rgyu'o zhes bshad zin la gang gi tshe sgra nyid de mnyan bar bya ba nyid rtag par khas len par byed pa de'i tshe gang las 'di the tshom gyi rgyur 'gyur ba thun mong ma
analyzed: 'di ni thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir na the tshom gyi rgyu'o zhes bshad zin la gang gi tshe sgra nyid de mnyan bar bya ba nyid rtag par khas len par byed pa de'i tshe gang las 'di the tshom gyi rgyur 'gyur ba thun mong ma
translated: Since this is not shared, it is the cause of doubt. It has already been explained. When sound itself is accepted as permanent, what is the cause of this doubt?

original: yin pa nyid ci ltar yin de'i tshe 'di zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: yin pa nyid ci ltar yin de'i tshe 'di zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: How could it be so?

original: gnyis ka ma yin pa bsten pa nyid kyi gnas skabs la ni thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir the tshom gyi rgyu nyid du bshad la /
analyzed: gnyis ka ma yin pa bsten pa nyid kyi gnas skabs la ni thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir the tshom gyi rgyu nyid du bshad la /
translated: When one relies on neither, because it is not shared, it is explained to be the cause of doubt.

original: gang gi tshe sgra nyid kyang mnyan byar khas len pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sgra nyid kyang mnyan byar khas len pa de'i tshe /
translated: When one accepts that sound itself is audible,

original: 'di gnyis ka bsten pa kho nar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: 'di gnyis ka bsten pa kho nar 'gyur zhing /
translated: then it is only relied on by both.

original: 'di de'i tshe thun mong ma yin pa nyid du 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di de'i tshe thun mong ma yin pa nyid du 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And at that time, it is not asserted to be not shared.

original: de'i phyir de'i tshe 'di gtan tshigs kho na 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i tshe 'di gtan tshigs kho na 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, at that time, it is only a reason,

original: mi rtag pa las ldog pa'i phyir dang / de rnam par gcod pas rtag pa nyid go bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa las ldog pa'i phyir dang / de rnam par gcod pas rtag pa nyid go bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the opposite of impermanent and because it is understood to be permanent by excluding that.

original: gal te 'di la mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyang bye brag pas ston par mi byed pa de'i tshe gtan tshigs nyid du yang 'gyur zhes sbrel bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te 'di la mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyang bye brag pas ston par mi byed pa de'i tshe gtan tshigs nyid du yang 'gyur zhes sbrel bar bya'o //
translated: If the Vaise~ika does not teach the reason of impermanence here, then it is a reason.

original: 'gal ba don gcig pa mi srid pa'i phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: 'gal ba don gcig pa mi srid pa'i phyir zhes pa /
translated: Because it is impossible for contradictories to have the same meaning.

original: 'gal ba dag ste rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid dag chos can gcig la mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba dag ste rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid dag chos can gcig la mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible for contradictories, such as permanence and impermanence, to be in one basis.

original: 'gal ba nyid kyang de dag phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba nyid kyang de dag phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: And because contradictories are characterized by the mutual exclusion of one by the other.

original: 'gal ba'i gcig gi don gyi mi srid pa nyid kyi phyir zhes gzhan rnams so //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i gcig gi don gyi mi srid pa nyid kyi phyir zhes gzhan rnams so //
translated: The others say: Because it is impossible for a single contradictory to have two meanings.

original: gcig min pa ni 'gal ba srid pa ste /
analyzed: gcig min pa ni 'gal ba srid pa ste /
translated: It is possible for contradictories to exist,

original: dper na nam mkha' rtag go bum pa mi rtag @172a * //üîΩgo zhes pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na nam mkha' rtag go bum pa mi rtag @172a * // go zhes pa lta bu ste /
translated: for example, ‚ÄúSpace is permanent, a pot is impermanent.‚Äù

original: gcig la ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gcig la ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: But not for a single thing.

original: de'i phyir the tshom du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir the tshom du 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, there is doubt,

original: 'gal ba'i don mngon par brjod pa'i gtam gnyis bzhin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i don mngon par brjod pa'i gtam gnyis bzhin no //
translated: like the two statements expressing contradictory meanings.

original: gal te the tshom gyi rgyu yin na ci las 'di la nges par 'byung bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: gal te the tshom gyi rgyu yin na ci las 'di la nges par 'byung bar bya zhe na /
translated: If it is the cause of doubt, how can one be certain about this?

original: 'dir yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Here he says, ‚ÄúIn this case, etc.‚Äù

original: 'dir gyi sgras ni 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can gyi yul spyir ston gyi 'di gcig bu ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gyi sgras ni 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can gyi yul spyir ston gyi 'di gcig bu ni ma yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúhere‚Äù indicates that the object of the nonerroneous contradiction is in general, and not just this one.

original: mngon sum gyis mi slu ba'i lung ni mngon sum gyi lung ste /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis mi slu ba'i lung ni mngon sum gyi lung ste /
translated: A scripture that is nondeceptive by way of direct perception is a scripture of direct perception.

original: bar gyi tshig phyis pa las lo ma'i rgyal po bzhin dang / rdo rje'i sor gdub bzhin no //
analyzed: bar gyi tshig phyis pa las lo ma'i rgyal po bzhin dang / rdo rje'i sor gdub bzhin no //
translated: The middle word is elided, as in the case of ‚Äúking of the leaves‚Äù and ‚Äúring of the vajra.‚Äù

original: mngon sum smos pa ni tshad ma mtshon pa'i don du sta /
analyzed: mngon sum smos pa ni tshad ma mtshon pa'i don du sta /
translated: The mention of direct perception is for the purpose of illustrating valid knowledge.

original: tshad mas mi slu ba'i lung ni stobs dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: tshad mas mi slu ba'i lung ni stobs dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that a scripture that is nondeceptive by way of valid knowledge is powerful.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being shown.

original: lung gis grub pa'i rtags kyi dbang du byas nas 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba brjod cing /
analyzed: lung gis grub pa'i rtags kyi dbang du byas nas 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba brjod cing /
translated: Taking as the basis a reason that is established by scripture, a nonerroneous contradiction is stated.

original: de ni 'di rnams kho nas kyang lung stobs dang ldan par khas blangs la /
analyzed: de ni 'di rnams kho nas kyang lung stobs dang ldan par khas blangs la /
translated: And that is accepted as powerful scripture by these very [Buddhists].

original: stobs dang ldan pa ni yang de tshad mas rjes su gzung ba las 'gyur te /
analyzed: stobs dang ldan pa ni yang de tshad mas rjes su gzung ba las 'gyur te /
translated: And power is due to being upheld by valid knowledge.

original: de de'i phyir tshad ma de las nges pa btsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: de de'i phyir tshad ma de las nges pa btsal bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, certainty should be sought from that valid knowledge.

original: de'i tshig gis yon tan du gyur kyang tshad ma la snyegs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshig gis yon tan du gyur kyang tshad ma la snyegs pa'o //
translated: Even if it is a good quality, it is still based on a valid cognition.

original: yang na de kho na las te tshad mas mi slu ba'i lung las nges pa btsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang na de kho na las te tshad mas mi slu ba'i lung las nges pa btsal bar bya'o //
translated: Or, certainty should be sought from that itself, from a valid cognition or from a non-deceptive scripture.

original: de skad brjod pas kyang tshad ma kho na las nges pa btsal bar bya'o zhes don gyis brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de skad brjod pas kyang tshad ma kho na las nges pa btsal bar bya'o zhes don gyis brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: By saying this, it is implicitly stated that certainty should be sought from a valid cognition alone.

original: bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad par gang rnams kyi dang gang rnams kyi zhes 'dir gcig lhag blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad par gang rnams kyi dang gang rnams kyi zhes 'dir gcig lhag blta bar bya ste /
translated: In the verse of summary, the words ‚Äúwhose‚Äù and ‚Äúof which‚Äù should be seen as having one more syllable each.

original: grangs mnyam pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: grangs mnyam pa'i don du'o //
translated: They have the same meaning.

original: thun mong min pa ni thams cad the tshom gyi rgyu'o //
analyzed: thun mong min pa ni thams cad the tshom gyi rgyu'o //
translated: The uncommon reason is the cause of doubt for all.

original: spyi ni rtag pa la sogs pa gang rnams kyi chos so //
analyzed: spyi ni rtag pa la sogs pa gang rnams kyi chos so //
translated: The general is the quality of which is permanent, etc.

original: 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can yang gang rnam pa  kyi zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can yang gang rnam pa  kyi zhes pa'o //
translated: The non-erroneous contradictory is also of which kind.

original: gzhan rnams ni gcig lhag ma byas pa kho nar ji ltar rigs par sbyor bar byed do //
analyzed: gzhan rnams ni gcig lhag ma byas pa kho nar ji ltar rigs par sbyor bar byed do //
translated: The others are applied as appropriate, with one more syllable added.

original: 'dir phyogs chos gnyis dag kho na gtan tshigs ltar snang bar bshad de /
analyzed: 'dir phyogs chos gnyis dag kho na gtan tshigs ltar snang bar bshad de /
translated: Here, only the property of the subject and the pervasion are explained as the two fallacies of a reason.

original: the tshom gyi rgyu dang phyin ci log gi rgyu'o //
analyzed: the tshom gyi rgyu dang phyin ci log gi rgyu'o //
translated: The cause of doubt and the cause of error.

original: gzhan rnams kyis ni 'khrul pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa rnams kyang bshad do //
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyis ni 'khrul pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa rnams kyang bshad do //
translated: Others explain that the other two are error and so on.

original: de rnams ni ma brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ma lus pa yin pa brjod pa nyid du dogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams ni ma brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ma lus pa yin pa brjod pa nyid du dogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since they are not mentioned, it is suspected that they are not included.

original: des na de bsal ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: des na de bsal ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, in order to eliminate that, he says,

original: phyogs chos mthong ba las zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs chos mthong ba las zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom seeing the property of the subject‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: phyogs chos mthong ba las @172b shes par 'dod pa po'i 'dod pa ma grub pa na /
analyzed: phyogs chos mthong ba las @172b shes par 'dod pa po'i 'dod pa ma grub pa na /
translated: When the desire of the one who wishes to know is not established from seeing the property of the subject,

original: gang las phyin ci log thob pa'am /
analyzed: gang las phyin ci log thob pa'am /
translated: from where is error obtained or

original: the tshom thob bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: the tshom thob bar 'gyur te /
translated: doubt obtained?

original: dang gi sgra ni nges par gzung ba'i don can te rim pa tha dad pa yang ngo //
analyzed: dang gi sgra ni nges par gzung ba'i don can te rim pa tha dad pa yang ngo //
translated: The word ‚Äúor‚Äù has the meaning of exclusion; it is also a different order.

original: zlog pa dang the tshom thob pa kho na ste /
analyzed: zlog pa dang the tshom thob pa kho na ste /
translated: Only error and doubt are obtained,

original: rnam pa gzhan med do //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan med do //
translated: there is no other form.

original: de la gal te 'khrul pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa rnams the tshom skyed par byed nam nges pa kho na'i nang du 'du zhing /
analyzed: de la gal te 'khrul pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa rnams the tshom skyed par byed nam nges pa kho na'i nang du 'du zhing /
translated: If the fallacious reason and so on generate doubt, then they are included in the certain reason.

original: ci ste zlog pa yin na /
analyzed: ci ste zlog pa yin na /
translated: But if they are the opposite of that,

original: de las zlog pa'i gtan tshigs su'o //
analyzed: de las zlog pa'i gtan tshigs su'o //
translated: then they are the opposite of the reason.

original: ci ste gnyis ka mi skye na gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid du de rnams mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ci ste gnyis ka mi skye na gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid du de rnams mi 'gyur te /
translated: But if neither of the two arises, then they are not fallacious reasons,

original: yang dag pa'i shes pa'i rtags bzhin no //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i shes pa'i rtags bzhin no //
translated: like the sign of a correct consciousness.

original: da'i phyir 'gal ba dang ma nges pa dag las gzhan pa'i phyogs chos can gyi gtan tshigs ltar snang ba med do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: da'i phyir 'gal ba dang ma nges pa dag las gzhan pa'i phyogs chos can gyi gtan tshigs ltar snang ba med do zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, there is no fallacious reason that is a property of the subject other than the contradictory and the uncertain.

original: 'o na gang zhes pa /
analyzed: 'o na gang zhes pa /
translated: Now, what is this?

original: gal te phyogs chos can gyi gtan tshigs ltar snang pa gnyis kho na yin na /
analyzed: gal te phyogs chos can gyi gtan tshigs ltar snang pa gnyis kho na yin na /
translated: If there are only two fallacious reasons that are properties of the subject,

original: gang 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa'i 'gal bar 'dod pa de ci ltar brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gang 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa'i 'gal bar 'dod pa de ci ltar brjod par bya ste /
translated: then how should one describe that which is asserted to be a contradictory reason that invalidates the thesis?

original: ci bzlog pa'i gtan tshigs sam /
analyzed: ci bzlog pa'i gtan tshigs sam /
translated: Is it a contradictory reason or

original: 'on te the tshom gyi gtan tshigs yin zhes par ro //
analyzed: 'on te the tshom gyi gtan tshigs yin zhes par ro //
translated: is it an uncertain reason?

original: rnam pa gnyis kar brjod par mi nus so zhes pa bsam pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis kar brjod par mi nus so zhes pa bsam pa'o //
translated: It is not possible to express it in either way.

original: gal te de ltar gnas na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gal te de ltar gnas na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: If it were so, etc.

original: gal te 'di bzlog pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur na ni zlog pa grub par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te 'di bzlog pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur na ni zlog pa grub par 'gyur na /
translated: If this were to be a reason for the reversal, then the reversal would be established.

original: 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: But it is not.

original: de'i phyir 'di bzlog pa'i gtan tshigs ma yin na zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di bzlog pa'i gtan tshigs ma yin na zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, this is not a reason for the reversal.

original: 'dir smras pa tsam kho na bsgrub bya'o zhes gang sems par byed pa des re zhig lan smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa tsam kho na bsgrub bya'o zhes gang sems par byed pa des re zhig lan smras pa /
translated: Here, one who thinks that only the statement is to be established, first gives the answer:

original: gzhan gyi don gyi gtan tshigs yod pa'i phyir zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don gyi gtan tshigs yod pa'i phyir zhes pa ste /
translated: Because there is a reason for the benefit of others.

original: dper na zhes pa la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa'i ched du dpe'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes pa la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa'i ched du dpe'o //
translated: For example, etc. is for the purpose of clarification.

original: mi 'dra ba nye bar bkod pa ste zhes pa /
analyzed: mi 'dra ba nye bar bkod pa ste zhes pa /
translated: The example is cited as dissimilar.

original: nye bar bkod pa ni dpe ste /
analyzed: nye bar bkod pa ni dpe ste /
translated: The example is the citation.

original: nye bar 'god par byed cing dpe can nye bar 'jog par byed do zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: nye bar 'god par byed cing dpe can nye bar 'jog par byed do zhes byas nas so //
translated: Having cited, it is placed as the example.

original: mi 'dra ba nyid ni de dpe can dang mi mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'dra ba nyid ni de dpe can dang mi mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Dissimilarity is because it is not the same as the example.

original: de ston pa /
analyzed: de ston pa /
translated: That is taught.

original: de la ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: That is taught by In that case, etc.

original: rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs dang lhan cig pa ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes sbrel lo //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs dang lhan cig pa ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes sbrel lo //
translated: The reason because of the desire to express the number one is connected with it would not be a proof.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na smras pa gcig 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes pa ste /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na smras pa gcig 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes pa ste /
translated: Why is it so? It is said: because of the desire to express the number one.

original: grangs gcig brjod par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir gcig kho na sgrub par byed pa nyid du gzung ba'o //
analyzed: grangs gcig brjod par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir gcig kho na sgrub par byed pa nyid du gzung ba'o //
translated: Because of the desire to express the number one, only one is taken to be the probandum.

original: gtan tshigs gnyis po 'di dag ni phan tshun 'gal bdag ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs gnyis po 'di dag ni phan tshun 'gal bdag ste /
translated: These two reasons are mutually contradictory.

original: de la @173a * //
analyzed: de la @173a * //
translated: In that case,

original: sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa nyid du rigs pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa nyid du rigs pa'o //
translated: it is reasonable that it is not a proof.

original: 'dir ni 'gal zla dang bral ba gcig kho na ci'i phyir sgrub par mi byed /
analyzed: 'dir ni 'gal zla dang bral ba gcig kho na ci'i phyir sgrub par mi byed /
translated: Here, why is only the absence of the contradictory not established?

original: 'di lta na 'o na zhes pa mi 'dra ba nyid yongs su spong bar byed de //
analyzed: 'di lta na 'o na zhes pa mi 'dra ba nyid yongs su spong bar byed de //
translated: In this case, in that case rejects the difference.

original: bsgrub bya'i bye brag las zhes pa gnyis nyid kyi grangs rtogs pa la rgyu bshad pa'o//
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i bye brag las zhes pa gnyis nyid kyi grangs rtogs pa la rgyu bshad pa'o//
translated: The cause of understanding the number two is explained by because of the difference in the probandum.

original: bsgrub bya'i khyad par ni gzhan gyi don nyid dang gzhan gyi don min pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can du sems par byed do //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i khyad par ni gzhan gyi don nyid dang gzhan gyi don min pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can du sems par byed do //
translated: The difference in the probandum is that it is characterized by being for the sake of others and not for one‚Äôs own sake.

original: dper na mig gis gzung bya ma yin pa nyid dang mngon sum pa nyid dag bzhin du gcig po nyid ces pa ni /
analyzed: dper na mig gis gzung bya ma yin pa nyid dang mngon sum pa nyid dag bzhin du gcig po nyid ces pa ni /
translated: For example, it is like the two, not being perceptible by the eye and being directly perceptible.

original: ji ltar 'di dag gis bsgrub par bya bar gtogs pa'i grangs brtags pa yin pa de ltar 'dus pa nyid kyi bsgrub par bya bar gtogs pa'i grangs brtags par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar 'di dag gis bsgrub par bya bar gtogs pa'i grangs brtags pa yin pa de ltar 'dus pa nyid kyi bsgrub par bya bar gtogs pa'i grangs brtags par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Just as they are imputed to be the number of the probandum, in the same way, the collection is imputed to be the number of the probandum.

original: 'di tsam gyis dpe'i chos mthun pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di tsam gyis dpe'i chos mthun pa nyid do //
translated: This much is the similarity of the example.

original: tha dad med par 'gyur ro zhes pa de'i mtshan nyid can gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad med par 'gyur ro zhes pa de'i mtshan nyid can gyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it has the characteristic of being nondifferent.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi tha mi dad par 'dod pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi tha mi dad par 'dod pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúThat is so, but we assert that it is nondifferent,‚Äù

original: bshad pa / ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa / ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: we respond: ‚ÄúNo!‚Äù and so on.

original: de ltar smras pa tsam bsgrub par bya bar smra ba bsal ba la /
analyzed: de ltar smras pa tsam bsgrub par bya bar smra ba bsal ba la /
translated: In order to eliminate the assertion that mere speech is the probandum,

original: slob dpon gyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis gsungs pa /
translated: the master said:

original: de lta na 'o na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta na 'o na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In that case, etc.

original: khyad par med pa'i smras pa tsam gzhan gyi don nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te de la rtsod pa med pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i smras pa tsam gzhan gyi don nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te de la rtsod pa med pa'i phyir ro//
translated: The mere statement of non-distinction is not the probandum, because there is no dispute about that.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: khyad par can 'dus pa ma yin pa gzhan gyi don nyid do //
analyzed: khyad par can 'dus pa ma yin pa gzhan gyi don nyid do //
translated: The distinction is the probandum.

original: de'i phyir de las bzlog pa 'dus pa gzhan gyi don nyid sgrub par byed pa'i phyir 'gal ba nyid do //üîΩde nyid ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir de las bzlog pa 'dus pa gzhan gyi don nyid sgrub par byed pa'i phyir 'gal ba nyid do // de nyid ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, since the opposite of that, the distinction, is the probandum, there is contradiction.

original: de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: To show just that, he says, In that case, etc.üîΩ Here, the statement in that case is to be supplied with the word distinction.

original: gcig gi rang bzhin du rnam par gnas ba nyid 'dir 'dus pa ma yin pa'i sgras brjod par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: gcig gi rang bzhin du rnam par gnas ba nyid 'dir 'dus pa ma yin pa'i sgras brjod par 'dod pa'o //
translated: The nature of one thing is the probandum, and the word non-distinction is intended to express that.

original: 'o na mal cha dang stan la sogs pa rnams kyang 'dus pa ma yin pa gzhan bdag gi don byed de /üîΩde'i phyir 'gal ba bsgrub par bya ba la dpe bsgrub byas dman pa'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na mal cha dang stan la sogs pa rnams kyang 'dus pa ma yin pa gzhan bdag gi don byed de / de'i phyir 'gal ba bsgrub par bya ba la dpe bsgrub byas dman pa'o zhes gsungs pa /
translated: But beds, seats, etc. also serve one's own purpose, being non-distinctions.

original: de ni ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, in the proof of contradiction, the example is inferior to the probandum, he says, That is not so, etc.üîΩ Here, that refers to the example.

original: ci ltar na grub pa ma yin zhen gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar na grub pa ma yin zhen gsungs pa /
translated: How is it not established?

original: de yod par ma grub pa'i phyir zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de yod par ma grub pa'i phyir zhes pa ste /
translated: It is said: ‚ÄúBecause its existence is not established.‚Äù

original: de yod pa nyid du grub na ni dpe bsgrub par bya ba dang bral ba nyid du 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de yod pa nyid du grub na ni dpe bsgrub par bya ba dang bral ba nyid du 'gyur mod /
translated: If its existence were established, then the example would be devoid of the probandum.

original: de yang ma grub bo //
analyzed: de yang ma grub bo //
translated: But that is not established.

original: 'gal ba gzhan las zhes pa /
analyzed: 'gal ba gzhan las zhes pa /
translated: From another contradiction.

original: chos dang chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo zlog pa sgrub par byed pa las /
analyzed: chos dang chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo zlog pa sgrub par byed pa las /
translated: From the proof of the opposite of the nature of the property and the subject.

original: @173b ma smras pa'i chos dang chos can gyi khyad par las zlog pa sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi khyad par gyi tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: @173b ma smras pa'i chos dang chos can gyi khyad par las zlog pa sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi khyad par gyi tha dad pa yin no //
translated: From the proof of the opposite of the unstated property and subject distinction, there is a difference in the distinction.

original: 'gal ba'i ma nges pa las zhes pa /
analyzed: 'gal ba'i ma nges pa las zhes pa /
translated: From another uncertain contradiction.

original: 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba las te /
analyzed: 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba las te /
translated: From an unmistaken contradiction.

original: de ni 'gal ba'i don la mi 'khrul ba'i phyir 'gal ba yin zhing the tshom gyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir ma nges pa'o //
analyzed: de ni 'gal ba'i don la mi 'khrul ba'i phyir 'gal ba yin zhing the tshom gyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir ma nges pa'o //
translated: That is a contradiction because it is unmistaken about the meaning of contradiction, and because it is the cause of doubt, it is uncertain.

original: 'o na de las mtshan nyid kyi bye brag las kyang tha dad pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na de las mtshan nyid kyi bye brag las kyang tha dad pa ma yin nam /
translated: Well, isn‚Äôt it also different from the particular characteristic?

original: des na 'di kho nas kyang zhes brjod pa 'di ci zhe na /
analyzed: des na 'di kho nas kyang zhes brjod pa 'di ci zhe na /
translated: Therefore, what is the meaning of the expression ‚Äúthis alone‚Äù?

original: 'di skyon ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di skyon ma yin te /
translated: This is not a fault.

original: kyang gi sgra ni de nyid sdud pa'i don can no //
analyzed: kyang gi sgra ni de nyid sdud pa'i don can no //
translated: The word ‚Äúalone‚Äù has the sense of ‚Äújust that.‚Äù

original: de bzhin du zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩji ltar chos kyi rang gi ngo bo las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa 'di 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa'i 'gal bar brjod pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes pa la sogs pa ste / ji ltar chos kyi rang gi ngo bo las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa 'di 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa'i 'gal bar brjod pa de bzhin du /
translated: ‚ÄúIn the same way‚Äù and so on.

original: tshad ma gzhan gyis mthong bas gnod na chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang khyad par dang 'gal ba sgrub par byed pa'i phyir 'gal bar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: tshad ma gzhan gyis mthong bas gnod na chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang khyad par dang 'gal ba sgrub par byed pa'i phyir 'gal bar brjod par bya'o //
translated: Just as the proof of the opposite of the intrinsic reality of the thing is stated to be contradictory to what is accepted, in the same way, if the intrinsic reality of the subject is contradicted by the perception of another valid cognition, the proof is stated to be contradictory.

original: ci ltar ji ltar mthong ba'i chos gzhan gyis gnod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar ji ltar mthong ba'i chos gzhan gyis gnod pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that the intrinsic reality of the thing is contradicted by the perception of another valid cognition?

original: gsungs pa / dper na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / dper na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúFor example, because it occurs immediately upon effort.‚Äù

original: sgra'i rang gi ngo bo ni mngon sum gyis grub pa ste /
analyzed: sgra'i rang gi ngo bo ni mngon sum gyis grub pa ste /
translated: The intrinsic reality of sound is established by perception.

original: des na sgra'i rang gi ngo bo med pa'i dam bca'i don bsal ba'o //
analyzed: des na sgra'i rang gi ngo bo med pa'i dam bca'i don bsal ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the thesis ‚ÄúThe nature of sound does not exist‚Äù is refuted.

original: mnyan bya med do zhes pa 'dir ni mnyan bya'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba nyid 'di la med do zhes pa dam bca' ba'i don te /
analyzed: mnyan bya med do zhes pa 'dir ni mnyan bya'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba nyid 'di la med do zhes pa dam bca' ba'i don te /
translated: In the case of ‚ÄúThe object of hearing does not exist,‚Äù the meaning of the thesis is that the object of hearing, the sound, does not exist here.

original: de yang grags pa zhes bya ba'i rjes su dpag pas bsal bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yang grags pa zhes bya ba'i rjes su dpag pas bsal bar bya ba'o //
translated: This is refuted by the inference called ‚Äúthe famous one.‚Äù

original: bzlog pas gnod pa ni gnyis po 'di dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: bzlog pas gnod pa ni gnyis po 'di dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The contradiction of the opposite should be applied to these two.

original: ci'i phyir chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i dper brjod nye bar dgod pa ma byas she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i dper brjod nye bar dgod pa ma byas she na /
translated: Why is the example of the proof of the opposite of the nature of the subject not presented?

original: mtshan nyid las ni sngar nye bar bkod cing /
analyzed: mtshan nyid las ni sngar nye bar bkod cing /
translated: The characteristic was presented earlier.

original: dper brjod pa'i phyogs kyis kyang mtshon bya rtogs pa'i phyir 'dir dper brjod ma bkod do //
analyzed: dper brjod pa'i phyogs kyis kyang mtshon bya rtogs pa'i phyir 'dir dper brjod ma bkod do //
translated: And since the meaning of the example is also understood, the example is not presented here.

original: de la 'di ni chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang 'gal ba'i dper brjod pa ste /
analyzed: de la 'di ni chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang 'gal ba'i dper brjod pa ste /
translated: Here is the example of the contradiction of the nature of the subject:

original: nam mkha' la sogs pa ni rtag pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' la sogs pa ni rtag pa ste /
translated: Space and so on are permanent.

original: mi rtag pa'i chos med pa'i phyir ro zhes byas pa na'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i chos med pa'i phyir ro zhes byas pa na'o //
translated: Because the attribute of impermanence does not exist.

original: gtan tshigs 'di ni chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'di ni chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa ste /
translated: This reason refutes the intrinsic reality of the subject.

original: de ltar ni don bya ba nus pa yang mi rtag pa'i chos yin zhing /
analyzed: de ltar ni don bya ba nus pa yang mi rtag pa'i chos yin zhing /
translated: Thus, the capacity to perform a function is the attribute of impermanence.

original: de yang gal te nam mkha' la sogs pa la med na /
analyzed: de yang gal te nam mkha' la sogs pa la med na /
translated: And if that does not exist in space and so on,

original: de ni dngos por gyur pa nyid du mi 'gyur te /üîΩdngos po ni don bya ba nus pa'i mtshan nyid can nyid kyi @174a * //
analyzed: de ni dngos por gyur pa nyid du mi 'gyur te / dngos po ni don bya ba nus pa'i mtshan nyid can nyid kyi @174a * //
translated: then they would not become things.üîΩBecause a thing is defined as that which has the capacity to perform a function.

original: phyir ro // 'o na chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo ser bar byed na /
analyzed: phyir ro // 'o na chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo ser bar byed na /
translated: But if the intrinsic reality of the subject is refuted,

original: rten ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: rten ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then the reason would not be established.

original: 'di 'dod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di 'dod pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not accepted.

original: 'dir ni rnam par gcod pa tsam gtan tshigs nyid du nye bar blangs shing /
analyzed: 'dir ni rnam par gcod pa tsam gtan tshigs nyid du nye bar blangs shing /
translated: Here, the mere exclusion is taken as the reason,

original: de'i rten du dngos por ma gyur ba yang 'gal ba med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i rten du dngos por ma gyur ba yang 'gal ba med pa kho na'o //
translated: and there is no contradiction in that having a basis that is not a thing.

original: thams cad du yang 'di kho na chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo las zlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i yul te /
analyzed: thams cad du yang 'di kho na chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo las zlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i yul te /
translated: In all cases, this is the object of the proof of the opposite of the intrinsic reality of the subject.

original: gang du dngos por gyur pa'i chos can nye bar blangs shing /
analyzed: gang du dngos por gyur pa'i chos can nye bar blangs shing /
translated: Wherever the subject that is a thing is accepted,

original: gtan tshigs ni rnam par gcod pa tsam gyi chos yin pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ni rnam par gcod pa tsam gyi chos yin pa'o //
translated: the reason is a phenomenon that is a mere elimination.

original: des na 'di brtsad par mi bya ba kho na'o //
analyzed: des na 'di brtsad par mi bya ba kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, this should not be disputed.

original: chos can gyi khyad par dang 'gal ba dper brjod pa ni mig la sogs pa rnams gzhan gyi don yin te /
analyzed: chos can gyi khyad par dang 'gal ba dper brjod pa ni mig la sogs pa rnams gzhan gyi don yin te /
translated: The example of the contradiction with the specific property of the subject is as follows: The eyes, etc. are for the sake of another,

original: 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes 'di sngar kho nar bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes 'di sngar kho nar bshad zin to //
translated: because they are a collection. This was explained earlier.

original: ci'i phyir yang skabs su ma bab pa'i chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang khyad par zlog pa sgrub par byed pa na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir yang skabs su ma bab pa'i chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang khyad par zlog pa sgrub par byed pa na /
translated: Why is it that when the intrinsic reality and the specific property of the subject that are not appropriate to the context are being proven to be reversed,

original: 'gal ba nyid du brjod par bya zhen gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'gal ba nyid du brjod par bya zhen gsungs pa /
translated: it is said that they are contradictory?

original: gnyis ka ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúBoth‚Äù and so on.

original: chos kho na ma shes pa nyid kyi phyir bsgrub par bya ba 'dir 'gyur mod /
analyzed: chos kho na ma shes pa nyid kyi phyir bsgrub par bya ba 'dir 'gyur mod /
translated: Since only the phenomenon is not understood, this is indeed the probandum.

original: des ci'i phyir chos can bsgrub bya nyid yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: des ci'i phyir chos can bsgrub bya nyid yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is the subject to be established? It is said:

original: chos kyi khyad par du byas pa'i chos can bsgrub bya nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi khyad par du byas pa'i chos can bsgrub bya nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Because the subject is qualified by the property.

original: 'dis 'di bsal bar byed de /
analyzed: 'dis 'di bsal bar byed de /
translated: This is what is being explained.

original: tshogs pa kho na bsgrub bya yin zhing /
analyzed: tshogs pa kho na bsgrub bya yin zhing /
translated: The collection itself is to be established.

original: des na de las zlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir 'gal ba gcig kho na ste /
analyzed: des na de las zlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir 'gal ba gcig kho na ste /
translated: Therefore, because it is the opposite of that, there is only one contradiction.

original: de ni chos la sogs pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir rab tu dbye bas rnam par gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de ni chos la sogs pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir rab tu dbye bas rnam par gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Because it is just the engagement in terms of the property and so on, it should be presented by way of its divisions.

original: gang 'gal ba'i khyad bar mtshan nyid kyis ma bsdus ba de bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang 'gal ba'i khyad bar mtshan nyid kyis ma bsdus ba de bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: In order to show that which is not included by the characteristic of the contradiction, it is said:

original: brjod pa thams cad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: brjod pa thams cad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: All statements and so on.

original: 'dir dam bca'i ngag las gzhan pa bh'a ra ta la sogs pa'i ngag ni chos can yin zhing /
analyzed: 'dir dam bca'i ngag las gzhan pa bh'a ra ta la sogs pa'i ngag ni chos can yin zhing /
translated: Here, the statements other than the thesis are the subject.

original: de ni mi bden pa'i don can nyid ni chos te bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni mi bden pa'i don can nyid ni chos te bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: The property to be proven is that they have a meaning that is not true.

original: rmi lam gyi lus kyi rnam par rig byed la ci ltar don rtogs par byed pa dang / bden pa'i don can yin zhe na /
analyzed: rmi lam gyi lus kyi rnam par rig byed la ci ltar don rtogs par byed pa dang / bden pa'i don can yin zhe na /
translated: How does one understand the meaning of the dream body‚Äôs expression, and how does it have a true meaning?

original: gang gi phyir rmi lam na yang mgo sgril ba la sogs pa nye bar dmigs pas ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rmi lam na yang mgo sgril ba la sogs pa nye bar dmigs pas ni /
translated: Because even in a dream, one perceives the tying up of one‚Äôs head, etc.,

original: med pa nyid la sogs pa'i don gyi yul can gyi rtogs pa skyed par byed cing /
analyzed: med pa nyid la sogs pa'i don gyi yul can gyi rtogs pa skyed par byed cing /
translated: one generates a cognition whose object is a nonexistent, etc.

original: rtogs par bya ba'i don de rmi lam na yod pa yang ma yin no zhes pas mi bden pa'i don @174b can nyid do //
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba'i don de rmi lam na yod pa yang ma yin no zhes pas mi bden pa'i don @174b can nyid do //
translated: And the object to be cognized does not exist in a dream, so it has a false meaning.

original: de ltar sgrub par byed pas byas pa na /
analyzed: de ltar sgrub par byed pas byas pa na /
translated: When one establishes it in this way,

original: gang gi rjes su rjod par byed pa'i ngag gi dbang gis gtan tshigs 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi rjes su rjod par byed pa'i ngag gi dbang gis gtan tshigs 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: the reason becomes contradictory due to the power of the statement that expresses it.

original: de ston pa gsungs pa gang 'di zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ston pa gsungs pa gang 'di zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The statement that teaches this is ‚ÄúWhatever . . .‚Äù and so on.

original: yang gi sgra ni chos dang chos can gyi khyad par rjes su brjod pa'i ngag bsdu ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni chos dang chos can gyi khyad par rjes su brjod pa'i ngag bsdu ba'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù has the meaning of including the statement that expresses the distinction between the property and the subject.

original: gal te rnam pa thams cad la skur ba 'debs na zhes chos kyi rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas sam /
analyzed: gal te rnam pa thams cad la skur ba 'debs na zhes chos kyi rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas sam /
translated: If one denies everything,

original: chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas gal te skur ba 'debs na'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas gal te skur ba 'debs na'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: means if one denies by way of the intrinsic reality of the phenomenon or by way of the intrinsic reality of the subject.

original: 'o na rnam pa thams cad du zhes pa'i tshig las /
analyzed: 'o na rnam pa thams cad du zhes pa'i tshig las /
translated: Well then, from the words ‚Äúin every way,‚Äù

original: de'i khyad par gyi sgo nas kyang zhes pa'i don rigs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: de'i khyad par gyi sgo nas kyang zhes pa'i don rigs pa ma yin nam /
translated: isn‚Äôt the meaning ‚Äúby way of its distinction‚Äù also reasonable?

original: de'i sgo nas 'jug pa ni khyad par dang 'gal ba nyid kyis tshig las ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i sgo nas 'jug pa ni khyad par dang 'gal ba nyid kyis tshig las ma yin no //
translated: Engaging by way of that is not from the words, because it is contradictory to its distinction.

original: des na rang gi ngo bo dang 'gal ba zhes pa ste /
analyzed: des na rang gi ngo bo dang 'gal ba zhes pa ste /
translated: Therefore, it is said ‚Äúcontradictory to its intrinsic reality,‚Äù

original: de'i sgo nas zhugs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i sgo nas zhugs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because engaging by way of that is itself the reason.

original: de ltar re zhig dngos su nye bar blangs pa dang / rjes su brjod pa'i ngag gi stobs kyis gnyis ka'i rang gi ngo bo dang 'gal ba bshad do //
analyzed: de ltar re zhig dngos su nye bar blangs pa dang / rjes su brjod pa'i ngag gi stobs kyis gnyis ka'i rang gi ngo bo dang 'gal ba bshad do //
translated: Thus, by the power of the words ‚Äúin every way‚Äù and ‚Äúdirectly,‚Äù the contradiction to the intrinsic reality of both is explained.

original: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa yang gi sgras gang bsdus pa rjes su yi rang ba'i ngag ste /
analyzed: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa yang gi sgras gang bsdus pa rjes su yi rang ba'i ngag ste /
translated: The words ‚Äúif one says‚Äù and so on include the words of rejoicing.

original: de'i stobs kyis gnyis ka'i khyad par dang 'gal ba ston te /üîΩrjod par byed pa nyid kyis dang zhes pa /
analyzed: de'i stobs kyis gnyis ka'i khyad par dang 'gal ba ston te / rjod par byed pa nyid kyis dang zhes pa /
translated: By the power of that, it shows the contradiction with the distinction of both.üîΩ‚ÄúBy the very fact of its being an expression‚Äù means

original: smra bar byed pa nyid kyis dang zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: smra bar byed pa nyid kyis dang zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚Äúby the very fact of its being a statement.‚Äù

original: brjod pa'i sgra snga ma ni dngos po sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: brjod pa'i sgra snga ma ni dngos po sgrub pa ste /
translated: The previous term ‚Äúexpression‚Äù is the establishment of the thing.

original: 'di ni byed pa po grub pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byed pa po grub pa'o //
translated: This is the establishment of the agent.

original: mi bden pa'i don nyid kyis zhes pa mi bden pa'i don ni mi bden don te /
analyzed: mi bden pa'i don nyid kyis zhes pa mi bden pa'i don ni mi bden don te /
translated: ‚ÄúBy the very fact of its having a false object‚Äù means ‚Äúby the very fact of its having a false object.‚Äù

original: de'i dngos po ni mi bden don nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni mi bden don nyid do //
translated: The thing of that is ‚Äúthe very fact of its having a false object.‚Äù

original: snga ma ni mi bden pa'i don 'di'i yin pa zhes 'bru mang po pa la brten pa ste /
analyzed: snga ma ni mi bden pa'i don 'di'i yin pa zhes 'bru mang po pa la brten pa ste /
translated: The previous one is based on the many syllables of ‚Äúthis is of that false object.‚Äù

original: gnyis ka la gsum pa 'di ni rgyu la'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka la gsum pa 'di ni rgyu la'o //
translated: This third one is for both causes.

original: tshogs pa la skur pa 'debs ba zhes pa 'dir yang 'jug go //
analyzed: tshogs pa la skur pa 'debs ba zhes pa 'dir yang 'jug go //
translated: It also applies here to ‚Äúdenies the object of the collection.‚Äù

original: des na don 'dir 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na don 'dir 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, this is the meaning here.

original: ci ste rjod par byed pa nyid dang / mi bden pa'i don nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyis tshogs pa'i don la skur ba 'debs par 'gyur na /
analyzed: ci ste rjod par byed pa nyid dang / mi bden pa'i don nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyis tshogs pa'i don la skur ba 'debs par 'gyur na /
translated: If, by the very fact of its being an expression and by the very fact of its having a false object as the reason, it comes to deny the object of the collection,üîΩthen

original: de'i sgo nas de gnyis ka la gnod pa na /
analyzed: de'i sgo nas de gnyis ka la gnod pa na /
translated: When it is damaged in both ways,

original: tshogs pa'i don la skur pa 'debs te /
analyzed: tshogs pa'i don la skur pa 'debs te /
translated: then it deprecates the meaning of the collection.

original: de'i phyir khyad par dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is contradictory to the distinction.

original: yang 'di ci ltar 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: yang 'di ci ltar 'gal ba yin te /
translated: Moreover, how is this contradictory?

original: 'di la 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid srid pa ma yin pas so zhe na /
analyzed: 'di la 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid srid pa ma yin pas so zhe na /
translated: Since the characteristic of contradiction is not possible here.

original: ji ltar 'gal pa yin pa de ltar brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: ji ltar 'gal pa yin pa de ltar brjod par bya ste /
translated: It should be said that it is contradictory in the way that it is.

original: mngon par bsgo ba'i dag kyang brdzun pa'i don can nyid yin na /üîΩbh'a ra ta @175a * //
analyzed: mngon par bsgo ba'i dag kyang brdzun pa'i don can nyid yin na / bh'a ra ta @175a * //
translated: If the words of the injunction are also of false meaning,

original: la sogs pa'i ngag thams cad brjod pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa dang / ji lta ba'i don can du 'byung ste /
analyzed: la sogs pa'i ngag thams cad brjod pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa dang / ji lta ba'i don can du 'byung ste /
translated: then all statements such as the BhƒÅrata are not of the nature of expression and they occur with the meaning of reality.

original: gang yang de'i khyad par rjod par byed pa nyid la sogs pa dang de'i chos kyi mi bden pa'i don can nyid la sogs pa de yang rnam pa gzhan du 'byung ngo zhes pas 'di ltar 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang yang de'i khyad par rjod par byed pa nyid la sogs pa dang de'i chos kyi mi bden pa'i don can nyid la sogs pa de yang rnam pa gzhan du 'byung ngo zhes pas 'di ltar 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And also that which expresses its distinction, such as its quality, is of false meaning, and that also occurs in another way. Thus it is contradictory.

original: 'o na bh'a ra ta la sogs pa'i ngag rnams ni mnyan par bya bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir mngon sum kho na rnams te /
analyzed: 'o na bh'a ra ta la sogs pa'i ngag rnams ni mnyan par bya bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir mngon sum kho na rnams te /
translated: But the words of the Bharata and so on are directly perceived because they are being heard.

original: de rnams brjod pa ma yin pa nyid du ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: de rnams brjod pa ma yin pa nyid du ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: How could they not be expressed?

original: mi bden pa'i don can gyin gag 'ga' zhig rnams kyang dmigs te /
analyzed: mi bden pa'i don can gyin gag 'ga' zhig rnams kyang dmigs te /
translated: Some words with false meanings are also observed.

original: des na ngag thams cad ji lta ba bzhin gyi don can du 'byung ngo zhes bshad pa 'di mi rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: des na ngag thams cad ji lta ba bzhin gyi don can du 'byung ngo zhes bshad pa 'di mi rigs so zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is illogical to say that all words arise with a meaning that is just as it is.

original: 'di 'di ltar ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di 'di ltar ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.

original: ngag 'di'i don 'di lta bu 'di ltar du brjod par bya ba na /
analyzed: ngag 'di'i don 'di lta bu 'di ltar du brjod par bya ba na /
translated: When the meaning of this statement is expressed in this way,

original: thal bar 'gyur ro zhes sgra'i don gyi dbang las 'di 'di lta bur 'byung gi dngos po'i dbang las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur ro zhes sgra'i don gyi dbang las 'di 'di lta bur 'byung gi dngos po'i dbang las ni ma yin no //
translated: it arises in this way due to the power of the meaning of the word, not due to the power of the thing.

original: brjod pa'i skyon ni gzhan don rjes su dpag par dbang du bya ba'o zhes bshad la de'i phyir mngon sum la sogs pa dang 'gal ba yod na yang /
analyzed: brjod pa'i skyon ni gzhan don rjes su dpag par dbang du bya ba'o zhes bshad la de'i phyir mngon sum la sogs pa dang 'gal ba yod na yang /
translated: The fault of expression is to be understood in terms of inferring the meaning for others. Therefore, even if there is a contradiction with direct perception and so on,

original: de la ma ltos par 'gal ba nyid brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de la ma ltos par 'gal ba nyid brjod par bya'o //
translated: But if it is not so, then the contradiction should be stated.

original: gal te rjes su bsgo ba'i ngag mi bden pa'i don can nyid du grub na /
analyzed: gal te rjes su bsgo ba'i ngag mi bden pa'i don can nyid du grub na /
translated: If it is established that the words of the one who is to be instructed are not true,

original: 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur mong /
analyzed: 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur mong /
translated: then there would be a contradiction.

original: de nyid ni 'grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid ni 'grub pa ma yin te /
translated: But that is not established,

original: don rtogs par byed pa thams cad ni mi bden pa'i don can nyid du 'byung bar bya'o zhes pa'i nges pa 'di med de /
analyzed: don rtogs par byed pa thams cad ni mi bden pa'i don can nyid du 'byung bar bya'o zhes pa'i nges pa 'di med de /
translated: because there is no certainty that all that causes the understanding of an object must be untrue.

original: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because there is no connection.

original: 'di bden mod /
analyzed: 'di bden mod /
translated: This is true,

original: 'on kyang skyon gzhan 'dir ltos par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang skyon gzhan 'dir ltos par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: but still, this other fault should not be considered,

original: dper na grangs can la brtag pa na gzhi ma grub pa nyid la sogs pa bzhin no //üîΩdon rtogs par byed pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po khas blangs nas ni /
analyzed: dper na grangs can la brtag pa na gzhi ma grub pa nyid la sogs pa bzhin no // don rtogs par byed pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po khas blangs nas ni /
translated: just as in the case of the SƒÅ·πÉkhya, where the reason is not established.üîΩHaving accepted that the words that cause the understanding of an object are the means of affirmation,

original: des rtogs par byas pa'i mi bden pa'i don can gyi ngag gi stobs kyis rang gi ngo bo dang khyad par bsal ba'i phyir gtan tshigs 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des rtogs par byas pa'i mi bden pa'i don can gyi ngag gi stobs kyis rang gi ngo bo dang khyad par bsal ba'i phyir gtan tshigs 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: because they clarify the nature and the attributes that are understood by those words, which are untrue, the reason is contradictory.

original: des na 'di ni 'gal ba gzhan kho na'o //
analyzed: des na 'di ni 'gal ba gzhan kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, this is only another contradiction.

original: de'i phyir 'di la ji skad bshad pa'i 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid btsal bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di la ji skad bshad pa'i 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid btsal bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the definition of contradiction should not be sought in this way, as has been explained.

original: yang ci'i phyir 'di'i mtshan nyid kyi mdo log par ma mdzad ce na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir 'di'i mtshan nyid kyi mdo log par ma mdzad ce na /
