translated: Why, then, did he not set forth the definition of contradiction in the scripture?

original: gtso bo ma yin par shes pa'i don du ste /
analyzed: gtso bo ma yin par shes pa'i don du ste /
translated: In order to show that it is not primary.

original: lung la brten pa'i rjes su dpag pa bzhin no //
analyzed: lung la brten pa'i rjes su dpag pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like inference based on scripture.

original: gtso bo ma yin pa nyid ni dngos po las mi 'gal ba nyid @175b kyi phyir ro /
analyzed: gtso bo ma yin pa nyid ni dngos po las mi 'gal ba nyid @175b kyi phyir ro /
translated: It is not primary because it is not contradictory to reality.

original: smras pa yang zhes pa ste /üîΩchos dang chos can dang / chos chos can dag ste /
analyzed: smras pa yang zhes pa ste / chos dang chos can dang / chos chos can dag ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù meansüîΩthe property, the subject, and the property-possessor.

original: de rnams ni chos dang chos can rnams so //üîΩde rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo 'am /
analyzed: de rnams ni chos dang chos can rnams so // de rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo 'am /
translated: These are the property, the subject, and the property-possessor.üîΩThe intrinsic nature of those

original: de'i khyad par gyi zhes pa /
analyzed: de'i khyad par gyi zhes pa /
translated: or its distinction.

original: chos dang chos can ngag gi khyad par gyi /üîΩphyin ci log tu nyer byed phyir //
analyzed: chos dang chos can ngag gi khyad par gyi / phyin ci log tu nyer byed phyir //
translated: The distinction of the property and the subjectüîΩis the cause of error.

original: zhes pa 'gal ba sgrub par byed pa'i phyir zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa 'gal ba sgrub par byed pa'i phyir zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúbecause of establishing contradiction‚Äù is the cause of establishing contradiction.

original: de lta na 'o na sgra mnyan par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na sgra mnyan par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: In that case, it would be contradictory to say, Sound is not to be heard,

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i phyir ro zhes pa 'ang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i phyir ro zhes pa 'ang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: because it arises immediately upon exertion.

original: gnod pa yod na zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gnod pa yod na zhes pa'o //
translated: To that, the response is, If there is harm.

original: 'dus pa nyid 'ba' zhig pa ni 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur mod /
analyzed: 'dus pa nyid 'ba' zhig pa ni 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur mod /
translated: If it is only the collection that is contradictory,

original: gang gi tshe gang dogs pa bsu nas slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gang dogs pa bsu nas slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis /
translated: when the master Vasubandhu anticipates an objection and explains,

original: da ltar 'dus rnams nang ma yin //
analyzed: da ltar 'dus rnams nang ma yin //
translated: The present is not the collection,

original: de bzhin gzhan don can mi 'gyur //üîΩzhes bshad pa nang nyid dang / lhan cig pa rab tu sbyor ba de'i tshe de ci ltar 'gal ba nyid yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gzhan don can mi 'gyur // zhes bshad pa nang nyid dang / lhan cig pa rab tu sbyor ba de'i tshe de ci ltar 'gal ba nyid yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: and likewise, it would not be for the sake of another.

original: gang slob dpon gyis gsungs pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang slob dpon gyis gsungs pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: When he applies the term collection and together, how is that contradictory? To that, the response is, Whatever the master said.

original: grangs can pas brjod pa /
analyzed: grangs can pas brjod pa /
translated: The SƒÅ·πÉkhya states,

original: mig la sogs pa rnams ni gzhan gyi don yin te 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa rnams ni gzhan gyi don yin te 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The eyes and so on are for the sake of another because they are a collection.

original: 'dir mal cha dang stan dang shing rta la sogs pa'i 'dus pa rnams gzhan gyi don du mthong zhing /
analyzed: 'dir mal cha dang stan dang shing rta la sogs pa'i 'dus pa rnams gzhan gyi don du mthong zhing /
translated: Here, the collections of bedding, seats, chariots, and so on are seen to be for the sake of others.

original: nag pa la sogs pa'i rnam 'gyur skyes bu'i don rnams ni bdag nyid kyi don ma yin la /
analyzed: nag pa la sogs pa'i rnam 'gyur skyes bu'i don rnams ni bdag nyid kyi don ma yin la /
translated: The expressions of the body, such as the face, and so on, are for the sake of the person.

original: phan tshun gyi don ma yin zhing /
analyzed: phan tshun gyi don ma yin zhing /
translated: They are not for the sake of each other.

original: don med can ma yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: don med can ma yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: They are not for the sake of the nonexistent.

original: mig la sogs pa'i 'dus pa rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i 'dus pa rnams kyang ngo //
translated: In the same way, the collections of eyes and so on are also like that.

original: de'i phyir gzhan gyi don 'di rnams kyis 'byung bar bya ba /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan gyi don 'di rnams kyis 'byung bar bya ba /
translated: Therefore, these collections arise for the sake of others.

original: gang gi don du 'di rnams yin pa de ni bdag ste /
analyzed: gang gi don du 'di rnams yin pa de ni bdag ste /
translated: That for whose sake these are is the self.

original: de'i phyir bdag yod do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag yod do zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore the self exists.

original: 'di la slob dpon gyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di la slob dpon gyis gsungs pa /
translated: Here, the master responds:

original: bdag gzhan yin na de ma grub bo //
analyzed: bdag gzhan yin na de ma grub bo //
translated: If it is other, it is not established.

original: gal te gzhan gyi sgras bdag bstan par bya ba yin na mal cha dang stan la sogs pa'i 'dus pa rnams gzhan gyi don du mthong go zhes pas /
analyzed: gal te gzhan gyi sgras bdag bstan par bya ba yin na mal cha dang stan la sogs pa'i 'dus pa rnams gzhan gyi don du mthong go zhes pas /
translated: If the term other is to be explained as the self, then the statement ‚ÄúThe collections of bedding, seats, and so on are seen to be for the sake of others‚Äù

original: 'dir bdag ma grub bo //
analyzed: 'dir bdag ma grub bo //
translated: is not established here.

original: dpe bsgrub par bya ba dang bral ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dpe bsgrub par bya ba dang bral ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the example lacks the probandum.

original: 'dis ni 'gal ba nyid du bshad de /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'gal ba nyid du bshad de /
translated: This explains the contradiction.

original: 'dus pa rnams ni gal te de'i don yin na'o //üîΩci ste mig la sogs pa 'dus pa yin zhing /
analyzed: 'dus pa rnams ni gal te de'i don yin na'o // ci ste mig la sogs pa 'dus pa yin zhing /
translated: If the collection is the meaning of ‚Äúit,‚Äù

original: nag pa la sogs pa gzhan gyi sgras mtshon pa yin na /üîΩgang gi don du mal cha dang stan la sogs pa rnams yin zhing /
analyzed: nag pa la sogs pa gzhan gyi sgras mtshon pa yin na / gang gi don du mal cha dang stan la sogs pa rnams yin zhing /
translated: then what is the meaning of ‚Äúit‚Äù in the statement ‚ÄúThe collection of the eye and so on is the self‚Äù?

original: mig la sogs pa rnams kyang yin pa de'i @176a * //üîΩdon can rnams su 'grub ste /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa rnams kyang yin pa de'i @176a * // don can rnams su 'grub ste /
translated: If the collection of the eye and so on is the self,üîΩthen what is the meaning of ‚Äúit‚Äù in the statement ‚ÄúThe collection of the eye and so on is the self‚Äù?

original: 'dus pa'i don rnams su zhes pa'i don to //üîΩ'dis ni 'dus pa rnams de'i don nyid du grub cing /
analyzed: 'dus pa'i don rnams su zhes pa'i don to // 'dis ni 'dus pa rnams de'i don nyid du grub cing /
translated: The meaning is that the collection is established as the meaning of ‚Äúit.‚Äù

original: pha rol pos kyang mig la sogs pa rnams sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs kyi don nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir grub pa bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol pos kyang mig la sogs pa rnams sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs kyi don nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir grub pa bsgrub pa'o //
translated: This proves the thesis, because the collection is established as the meaning of ‚Äúit‚Äù and because the opponent accepts that the eye and so on are the meaning of the collection of mind and mental factors.

original: 'dir grangs can pa gzhan gyi sgra bdag gi rjod byed do zhes pa'i phyogs 'di la gang skyon brjod pa de spong bar 'dod pas nang nyid du yod pa na zhes rtags kyi khyad par 'ga' zhig gi tshe nye bar len par byed ces dogs par byas te
analyzed: 'dir grangs can pa gzhan gyi sgra bdag gi rjod byed do zhes pa'i phyogs 'di la gang skyon brjod pa de spong bar 'dod pas nang nyid du yod pa na zhes rtags kyi khyad par 'ga' zhig gi tshe nye bar len par byed ces dogs par byas te
translated: Here, the SƒÅ·πÉkhya, wishing to refute the statement that sound is the expression of the self, at some point adds the qualification ‚Äúinternal‚Äù to the reason, thinking, ‚ÄúWhen it is internal, it is appropriated.‚Äù

original: / de ltar 'dus pa nang rnams yin //
analyzed: / de ltar 'dus pa nang rnams yin //
translated: Thus, the internal collections are the self.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: He says this and so on.

original: 'dis ji ltar 'gal ba nyid du brjod pa de ltar bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa de la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ji ltar 'gal ba nyid du brjod pa de ltar bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa de la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In order to show how this is contradictory, he says ‚Äúin that regard‚Äù and so on.

original: ci ltar na gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar na gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that the reason is not endowed with the characteristics of a reason?

original: de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: He says ‚Äúin that way‚Äù and so on.

original: 'dis ni 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan par ston pa nyid kyi phyir na gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang mi ldan par ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan par ston pa nyid kyi phyir na gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang mi ldan par ston to //
translated: This shows that the reason is not endowed with the characteristics of a reason because it is endowed with the characteristics of a contradictory reason.

original: gnyis ka zhes pa nang gi nyid dang 'dus pa nyid kyang /
analyzed: gnyis ka zhes pa nang gi nyid dang 'dus pa nyid kyang /
translated: ‚ÄúBoth‚Äù refers to being internal and being a collection.

original: mthun phyogs la ste bdag gi don 'ga' zhig la rigs pas grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mthun phyogs la ste bdag gi don 'ga' zhig la rigs pas grub pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not established by reasoning in the case of the self, that is, in the case of some object of one‚Äôs own.

original: bdag phul du byung ba byar med pa la phan gdags par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag phul du byung ba byar med pa la phan gdags par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not possible to benefit the self, which is not a product and is not excellent.

original: phan tshun gyi don can dang / don ma yin pa rnams la grub ste /
analyzed: phan tshun gyi don can dang / don ma yin pa rnams la grub ste /
translated: It is established in the case of mutual objects and non-objects.

original: de ltar ni bstan bcos su phan tshun gyi don nyid bshad de /
analyzed: de ltar ni bstan bcos su phan tshun gyi don nyid bshad de /
translated: Thus, the treatise explains mutual objects:üîΩ‚ÄúWhich faculty is the cause of which object?üîΩWhich faculty is the cause of which object?üîΩWhich faculty is the cause of which object?

original: dbang po gang zhig dbang po gang zhig la yul ston pa byed /üîΩdag par byed /üîΩso slar 'du byed /üîΩnye bar 'dzin par byed pa de ni rgyu yin zhing cig shos ni 'bras bu'o zhes so //
analyzed: dbang po gang zhig dbang po gang zhig la yul ston pa byed / dag par byed / so slar 'du byed / nye bar 'dzin par byed pa de ni rgyu yin zhing cig shos ni 'bras bu'o zhes so //
translated: Which faculty is the cause of which object?üîΩWhich faculty is the cause of which object?üîΩWhich faculty is the cause of which object?üîΩWhich faculty is the cause of which object?

original: phan tshun du gdags par bya ba nyid kyis na 'bras bu dang dngos po bshad do //üîΩdon med pa nyid ni mngal du nges par 'chi ba rnams kyi sgra ste /
analyzed: phan tshun du gdags par bya ba nyid kyis na 'bras bu dang dngos po bshad do // don med pa nyid ni mngal du nges par 'chi ba rnams kyi sgra ste /
