original: sgra la sogs pa longs spyad pa ma byas pa kho nar 'gag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa longs spyad pa ma byas pa kho nar 'gag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Which faculty is the cause of which object?üîΩWhich faculty is the cause of which

original: snga ma nyid du zhes pa rang gi ngo bo sel bar byed par ro //
analyzed: snga ma nyid du zhes pa rang gi ngo bo sel bar byed par ro //
translated: The former itself is the negation of its own nature.

original: 'di la khyab pa med pa 'am 'gal bar grub par dogs par bya ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di la khyab pa med pa 'am 'gal bar grub par dogs par bya ba yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not to be doubted that there is no pervasion or that there is a contradiction,

original: gang gi phyir mig la sogs pa rnams gal te don byed na bdag med pa mi rtag pa kho na'i ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mig la sogs pa rnams gal te don byed na bdag med pa mi rtag pa kho na'i ste /
translated: because if the eyes, etc. perform a function, they are only without self and impermanent.

original: yang na ni byed pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: yang na ni byed pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: Or else, they do not perform a function at all.

original: bdag ni rnam par mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir 'di rnams la de'i @176b don nyid srid pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: bdag ni rnam par mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir 'di rnams la de'i @176b don nyid srid pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: The self is not subject to change, so it is not at all possible for it to be the referent of these.

original: de'i phyir nang gi 'dus pa rnams ni bdag med pa'i don can nyid kyis khyab bo zhes pas 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir nang gi 'dus pa rnams ni bdag med pa'i don can nyid kyis khyab bo zhes pas 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the internal aggregates are pervaded by the referent of ‚Äúwithout self.‚Äù Thus, there is a contradiction.

original: slar yang don 'di nyid ces pa /
analyzed: slar yang don 'di nyid ces pa /
translated: Again, this very point is explained extensively

original: gang 'di mthun phyogs yod med dang // zhes pa la sogs pas rgya cher bshad pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di mthun phyogs yod med dang // zhes pa la sogs pas rgya cher bshad pa'o //
translated: with ‚ÄúIf there is no existence of the concordant class . . .‚Äù and so forth.

original: ci'i don du zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i don du zhe na /
translated: For what purpose?

original: gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa nyid 'di kho na gsal bar byed pa'i ched du'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa nyid 'di kho na gsal bar byed pa'i ched du'o //
translated: This is just to clarify the reasonings of contradiction and inconclusiveness.

original: gang gi phyir rnam pa gzhan gyis brjod par byas pas don de kho na dri ma med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam pa gzhan gyis brjod par byas pas don de kho na dri ma med par 'gyur te /
translated: Because it is expressed in another way, that very object becomes stainless,

original: kun du rmongs pa'i lhag ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun du rmongs pa'i lhag ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is free from the remainder of confusion.

original: gsum po kho na ste zhes pa /
analyzed: gsum po kho na ste zhes pa /
translated: The three alone are the object of inferential cognition.

original: cha shas gsum rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: cha shas gsum rtogs pa ste /
translated: The realization of the three parts is

original: rab tu dbye ba zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rab tu dbye ba zhes pa'i don to //
translated: the meaning of ‚Äúdivision.‚Äù

original: spyi yang gzhal bya nyid de rjes su 'gro ba can gyi gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: spyi yang gzhal bya nyid de rjes su 'gro ba can gyi gtan tshigs so //
translated: The universal is also the object of cognition, because it is the reason that is concomitant.

original: khyad par yang srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid do //
analyzed: khyad par yang srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid do //
translated: The particular is the possession of life, etc.

original: ldog pa can zhes kha cig 'dod de /
analyzed: ldog pa can zhes kha cig 'dod de /
translated: Some assert that it is the reason that is contradictory.

original: de'i phyir de sel ba'i ched du nges par 'dzin par byed pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir de sel ba'i ched du nges par 'dzin par byed pa /
translated: Therefore, in order to eliminate that, it is specified:

original: der dang po gnyis the tshom ched ces pa'o //
analyzed: der dang po gnyis the tshom ched ces pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe first two are for the sake of doubt.‚Äù

original: 'o na mnyan par bya ba nyid the tshom gyi rgyu kho na zhes pa 'di mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'o na mnyan par bya ba nyid the tshom gyi rgyu kho na zhes pa 'di mi rigs te /
translated: But it is not reasonable to say that the mere object of hearing is the cause of doubt,

original: de ltar ni de bsgrub par bya ba gzhan 'ga' zhig la nges par byed pa'i gtan tshigs kyang yin pas so //
analyzed: de ltar ni de bsgrub par bya ba gzhan 'ga' zhig la nges par byed pa'i gtan tshigs kyang yin pas so //
translated: because in that case, it would also be the reason that ascertains something else to be established in that way.

original: dper na yi ge'i bdag nyid kyi sgra ni mi rtag pa ste /
analyzed: dper na yi ge'i bdag nyid kyi sgra ni mi rtag pa ste /
translated: For example, the sound that has the nature of a letter is impermanent,

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir gling bu la sogs pa'i sgra bzhin zhes pa lta bu'o zhe na /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir gling bu la sogs pa'i sgra bzhin zhes pa lta bu'o zhe na /
translated: because it is audible, like the sound of a flute, etc.

original: 'dir 'di'i thun mong ma yin pa nyid med do zhes pas skyon min no //
analyzed: 'dir 'di'i thun mong ma yin pa nyid med do zhes pas skyon min no //
translated: Here, there is no fault, because there is no such thing as its being unique.

original: rang gi bye brag tha dad pa rnams la zhes pa /
analyzed: rang gi bye brag tha dad pa rnams la zhes pa /
translated: With regard to those that are different in their own particulars,

original: gang zhig khyad par ji snyed kyis dngos po thams cad bsdus pa de ni de rnams la mtha' gcig tu 'di dag the tshom gyi rgyu dag go //
analyzed: gang zhig khyad par ji snyed kyis dngos po thams cad bsdus pa de ni de rnams la mtha' gcig tu 'di dag the tshom gyi rgyu dag go //
translated: whatever is included in all things by however many distinctions, those are the causes of doubt for them.

original: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i yul bstan pa ni dper brjod tsam mo //
analyzed: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i yul bstan pa ni dper brjod tsam mo //
translated: The presentation of a permanent and impermanent object is merely an example.

original: sgra thams cad kyang 'dir bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa na 'jug go zhes rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sgra thams cad kyang 'dir bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa na 'jug go zhes rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that all sounds are also accepted as the thesis here.

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid la ltos pa zhes pa /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid la ltos pa zhes pa /
translated: With regard to the dependence on the thesis,

original: dper na byas pa nyid rtag pa dag la yang dag pa dang log pa sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs ji ltar rigs par yin pa dang / brtsal ba dang ma brtsal ba'i de ma thag tu byung ba nyid dag la gang the tshom gyi rgyu kho na ste /
analyzed: dper na byas pa nyid rtag pa dag la yang dag pa dang log pa sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs ji ltar rigs par yin pa dang / brtsal ba dang ma brtsal ba'i de ma thag tu byung ba nyid dag la gang the tshom gyi rgyu kho na ste /
translated: And in the case of ‚Äúarising immediately after the search or non-search,‚Äù the reason that proves the correct and incorrect is, respectively, as follows: ‚Äúbecause of being the cause of doubt‚Äù and ‚Äúbecause of not being the cause of doubt.‚Äù

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang snga ma'i rjes su 'brang bas brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang snga ma'i rjes su 'brang bas brtag par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should investigate the other [reasons] by following the previous [reasoning].üîΩWhy?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa /
translated: [The opponent] asks, ‚ÄúWhy is it that the reason that proves the existence of a self in the body is not accepted as a reason that proves the existence of a self in the body?‚Äù

original: rtag pa nyid la skur ba 'debs pa po'i spyi gzhal @177a * //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid la skur ba 'debs pa po'i spyi gzhal @177a * //
translated: [The reason] is not accepted because it is not established.

original: bya nyid dang lus bdag dang bcas par bsgrub par bya la /üîΩsrog la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi /
analyzed: bya nyid dang lus bdag dang bcas par bsgrub par bya la / srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi /
translated: [The opponent] asks, ‚ÄúWhy is it that the reason that proves the existence of a self in the body is not accepted as a reason that proves the existence of a self in the body?‚ÄùüîΩ[The reason] is not accepted because it is not established.üîΩ[The opponent] asks, ‚ÄúWhy is it that the reason that proves the existence of a self in the body is not accepted as a reason that proves the existence of a self in the body?‚ÄùüîΩ[The reason] is not accepted because it is not established.

original: khyad par yang yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs su rigs so zhes log par rtogs pa'i dri ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par yang yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs su rigs so zhes log par rtogs pa'i dri ba'o //
translated: [The opponent] asks, ‚ÄúWhy is it that the reason that proves the existence of a self in the body is not accepted as a reason that proves the existence of a self in the body?‚Äù

original: rjes 'jug phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rjes 'jug phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: [The reason] is not accepted because it is not established.üîΩ[The opponent] asks, ‚ÄúWhy is it that the reason that proves the existence of a self in the body is not accepted as a reason that proves the existence of a self in the body?‚Äù

original: gzhal bya nyid ni thams cad la rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhal bya nyid ni thams cad la rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir /
translated: [The reason] is not accepted because it is not established.üîΩ[The opponent] asks, ‚ÄúWhy is it that the reason that proves the existence of a self in the body is not accepted as a reason that proves the existence of a self in the body?‚Äù

original: ldog pa bzod ma yin /
analyzed: ldog pa bzod ma yin /
translated: [The reason] is not accepted because it is not established.üîΩ[The opponent] asks, ‚ÄúWhy is it that the reason that proves the existence of a self in the body is not accepted as a reason that proves the existence of a self in the body?‚ÄùüîΩ[The reason] is not accepted because it is not established.üîΩ[The opponent] asks, ‚ÄúWhy

original: ldog pa mi rung zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ldog pa mi rung zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not suitable to be reversed.

original: dngos po med pa yang gzhal bya yin pas te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa yang gzhal bya yin pas te /
translated: Also, a non-thing is an object of comprehension,

original: gzhan du na mu stegs byed gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i tshig gi don med pa tshad ma'i yul du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na mu stegs byed gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i tshig gi don med pa tshad ma'i yul du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: otherwise, the non-thing that is imagined by other tƒ´rthikas would not be the object of valid knowledge.

original: de las kyang de 'gyur pa'i tha snyad chad pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang de 'gyur pa'i tha snyad chad pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: And from that, the convention of its existence would be completely severed.

original: de'i phyir de med pa la yang gzhal bya nyid 'jug go //
analyzed: de'i phyir de med pa la yang gzhal bya nyid 'jug go //
translated: Therefore, even in regard to non-existence, the state of being an object of comprehension is applicable.

original: khyad par mnyan bya nyid la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: khyad par mnyan bya nyid la sogs pa ni /
translated: As for the specific attributes of being audible and so on,

original: thams cad la mi 'jug pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba bzod ma yin /
analyzed: thams cad la mi 'jug pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba bzod ma yin /
translated: they are not accepted as being applicable to everything.

original: yang ci ltar dngos po'i chos su gyur pa ni thams cad la mi 'jug par rigs /
analyzed: yang ci ltar dngos po'i chos su gyur pa ni thams cad la mi 'jug par rigs /
translated: How is it reasonable that the state of being a property of an entity is not applicable to everything?

original: dngos po'i chos yin pa nyid kho na ni thams cad las ldog pa las 'gyur ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po'i chos yin pa nyid kho na ni thams cad las ldog pa las 'gyur ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: The state of being a property of an entity is not something that is reversed from everything.

original: 'di bden mod kyi gzhan gyi 'dod pa'i ngor de skad bshad pa ste /
analyzed: 'di bden mod kyi gzhan gyi 'dod pa'i ngor de skad bshad pa ste /
translated: This is true, but it is explained in that way from the perspective of the assertions of others.

original: pha rol po ni ma mthong ba tsam kho nas ldog par 'dod de /
analyzed: pha rol po ni ma mthong ba tsam kho nas ldog par 'dod de /
translated: The opponent asserts that it is reversed merely by the non-observation of it.

original: dper na bdag med pa bum pa la sogs pa rnams las srog la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na bdag med pa bum pa la sogs pa rnams las srog la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, life force and so on are not established in the absence of a self.

original: de'i phyir de'i rmongs pa bsal ba'i don du 'di skad bshad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i rmongs pa bsal ba'i don du 'di skad bshad do //
translated: Therefore, in order to dispel the confusion of others, this is explained.

original: gal te ma mthong ba tsam las ldog pa 'grub na /
analyzed: gal te ma mthong ba tsam las ldog pa 'grub na /
translated: If the mere nonobservation of something establishes its absence,

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa thams cad las ldog par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa thams cad las ldog par 'gyur zhing /
translated: then the quality of being audible would be the opposite of all permanent and impermanent things,

original: de las kyang dngos po'i chos ma yin pa nyid kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang dngos po'i chos ma yin pa nyid kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: and it would also be the opposite of being a quality of a thing.

original: 'di rigs pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di rigs pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: This is also illogical.

original: de'i phyir srog la sogs pa yang ma mthong ba tsam gyis ldog pa 'grub pa ma yin no zhes pas ldog pa can go bar byed pa nyid du 'dod par bya ba ma yin na /
analyzed: de'i phyir srog la sogs pa yang ma mthong ba tsam gyis ldog pa 'grub pa ma yin no zhes pas ldog pa can go bar byed pa nyid du 'dod par bya ba ma yin na /
translated: Therefore, life force and so on are not established as absent by the mere nonobservation of them.

original: de yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las zhes pa /
analyzed: de yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las zhes pa /
translated: This is also stated in the line ‚ÄúFrom the presence and absence of the forward and reverse entailments.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir ldog pas rtag pa las rnam par gcad par bya zhing /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ldog pas rtag pa las rnam par gcad par bya zhing /
translated: The reason is that the reverse entailment is the exclusion of permanence,

original: rjes 'gros ni mi rtag pa la bsgrub par bya ba ste /
analyzed: rjes 'gros ni mi rtag pa la bsgrub par bya ba ste /
translated: and the forward entailment is the affirmation of impermanence.

original: 'di dag kyang yan lag gcig ma tshang ba'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag kyang yan lag gcig ma tshang ba'o zhes pa'o //
translated: This is also a deficiency in one part.

original: yang ci ltar yan lag gcig ma tshang ba nyid du brjod ce na /
analyzed: yang ci ltar yan lag gcig ma tshang ba nyid du brjod ce na /
translated: And how is it said to be a deficiency in one part?

original: ji tsam gyis mthun phyogs kho na la yod pa rjes su 'gro ste /
analyzed: ji tsam gyis mthun phyogs kho na la yod pa rjes su 'gro ste /
translated: To the extent that there is concomitance only in the similar class,

original: de yang ldog pa med par ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang ldog pa med par ma yin no //
translated: and that is not without the exclusion.

original: mi mthun phyogs la med @177b pa kho na ni ldog pa ste /
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs la med @177b pa kho na ni ldog pa ste /
translated: And the mere absence in the dissimilar class is the exclusion,

original: de yang rjes 'gro med par ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang rjes 'gro med par ma yin no //
translated: and that is not without the concomitance.

original: rang gi lugs so //
analyzed: rang gi lugs so //
translated: This is our own position.

original: pha rol po ni yod par gyur pa tsam ni rjes su 'gro bar sems shing /
analyzed: pha rol po ni yod par gyur pa tsam ni rjes su 'gro bar sems shing /
translated: The opponent thinks that mere existence is the concomitance,

original: ma mthong ba tsam gyis kyang ldog par ro //
analyzed: ma mthong ba tsam gyis kyang ldog par ro //
translated: and mere non-observation is the exclusion.

original: 'di gnyis kyang gzhal bya nyid dang mnyan bya nyid dag la yod do zhes pas yan lag gcig ma tshang ba nyid du pha rol po'i 'dod pas brjod do //
analyzed: 'di gnyis kyang gzhal bya nyid dang mnyan bya nyid dag la yod do zhes pas yan lag gcig ma tshang ba nyid du pha rol po'i 'dod pas brjod do //
translated: And these two exist in the object of cognition and the object of hearing, so it is said that the opponent's assertion is deficient in one part.

original: de ltar na 'o na zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar na 'o na zhes pa ste /
translated: In that case, then, it is said.

original: gal te gang gi gtan tshigs ldog pas gcig las gcod cing /
analyzed: gal te gang gi gtan tshigs ldog pas gcig las gcod cing /
translated: If the reason is the exclusion of one from another,

original: rjes 'gro cig shos la sgrub par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: rjes 'gro cig shos la sgrub par byed pa yin na /
translated: If the other is the forward pervasion, it is the proof.

original: 'o na rjes su 'gro ba kho na 'ba' zhig pa ste /
analyzed: 'o na rjes su 'gro ba kho na 'ba' zhig pa ste /
translated: If it is only the forward pervasion,

original: thams cad la sgrub par byed cing rjes su 'jug pa'i shes pa'i rgyu kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad la sgrub par byed cing rjes su 'jug pa'i shes pa'i rgyu kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: it is the cause of the cognition that engages in proving everything.

original: rang gi rten la rtag pa yin zhing 'di mi rtag pa yang ngo zhes par ro //
analyzed: rang gi rten la rtag pa yin zhing 'di mi rtag pa yang ngo zhes par ro //
translated: It is permanent with respect to its own basis and impermanent with respect to this.

original: gang gi yang ldog pa kho na rjes 'gro med pa des thams cad las gcod par byed cing /
analyzed: gang gi yang ldog pa kho na rjes 'gro med pa des thams cad las gcod par byed cing /
translated: If it is only the counter pervasion, it is the proof of everything.

original: ldog pa'i shes pa'i gtan tshigs kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ldog pa'i shes pa'i gtan tshigs kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: It is the reason for the cognition of the counter pervasion.

original: rtag pa ma yin zhing mi rtag pa ma yin zhes par ro //
analyzed: rtag pa ma yin zhing mi rtag pa ma yin zhes par ro //
translated: It is not permanent and it is not impermanent.

original: dper na gnyis ka la brten pa zhes pa /
analyzed: dper na gnyis ka la brten pa zhes pa /
translated: For example, ‚Äúbased on both‚Äù

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa la brten pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa la brten pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa ste /
translated: is based on the forward pervasion and the counter pervasion.

original: byas pa nyid ni rtag pa las ldog go zhes pas rang gi rten la rtag pa rnam par gcod pa'i shes pa'i gtan tshigs yin zhing /
analyzed: byas pa nyid ni rtag pa las ldog go zhes pas rang gi rten la rtag pa rnam par gcod pa'i shes pa'i gtan tshigs yin zhing /
translated: ‚ÄúProduced‚Äù is the reason for the cognition that eliminates permanence with respect to its own basis.

original: mi rtag pa bum pa la sogs pa la yang 'jug go zhes pas mi rtag pa nyid kyi shes pa'i rgyu yang ngo //
analyzed: mi rtag pa bum pa la sogs pa la yang 'jug go zhes pas mi rtag pa nyid kyi shes pa'i rgyu yang ngo //
translated: Impermanence also applies to impermanent things such as pots.

original: kun la yod pa yang ma yin //
analyzed: kun la yod pa yang ma yin //
translated: It is not present in everything.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: And so on.

original: yang gi sgra ni nges par gzung ba la'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni nges par gzung ba la'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is used for emphasis.

original: rtag dang mi rtag pa dag ni phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi phyir /
analyzed: rtag dang mi rtag pa dag ni phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi phyir /
translated: Because permanence and impermanence have the characteristic of being mutually exclusive,

original: dngos po gcig gnyis ka'i ngo bo ma yin la /
analyzed: dngos po gcig gnyis ka'i ngo bo ma yin la /
translated: one thing cannot have the nature of both.

original: de gnyis ka rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo yang mi srid do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de gnyis ka rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo yang mi srid do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: And it is impossible for something to have the nature of the exclusion of both.

original: gzhan yang gcig thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid na /
analyzed: gzhan yang gcig thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid na /
translated: Moreover, if one thing were the nature of everything,

original: dngos po gcig gi 'gal ba du ma'i rang bzhin du 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: dngos po gcig gi 'gal ba du ma'i rang bzhin du 'gyur zhing /
translated: the many contradictions in one thing would be its nature.

original: thams cad la yin pa nyid na yang /
analyzed: thams cad la yin pa nyid na yang /
translated: And if it were everything,

original: thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i phyir de dngos po nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no //üîΩ'o na ci ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i phyir de dngos po nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no //üîΩ'o na ci ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: because it would be devoid of the nature of everything, it would not become a thing.üîΩMoreover, if one thing were the nature of everything,üîΩthen everything would be in one thing.

original: 'gal ba'i don la 'jug pa nyid ni byas pa nyid dang gzhal bya nyid la mtshungs te /
analyzed: 'gal ba'i don la 'jug pa nyid ni byas pa nyid dang gzhal bya nyid la mtshungs te /
translated: The meaning of contradiction is the same as that of being produced and being an object of knowledge.

original: de gal te gzhal bya nyid sgra la the tshom gyi rgyu yin na /üîΩci ltar gnyis ka la brten pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa phan chun du 'gal ba rtsol ma thag tu @178a * //
analyzed: de gal te gzhal bya nyid sgra la the tshom gyi rgyu yin na / ci ltar gnyis ka la brten pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa phan chun du 'gal ba rtsol ma thag tu @178a * //
translated: If being an object of knowledge is the cause of doubt about sound,

original: byung ba dang / rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba la 'jug bzhin pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'i shes pa'i gtan tshigs ci ltar yin /
analyzed: byung ba dang / rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba la 'jug bzhin pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'i shes pa'i gtan tshigs ci ltar yin /
translated: how is it that being produced, etc., which are mutually contradictory, are the reason for the subsequent cognition that arises immediately after the effort, and that does not arise immediately after the effort?

original: de las ni glog dang bum pa la sogs pa la mi rtag ces nges pa rjes su 'jug pa'i shes pa skye'o //
analyzed: de las ni glog dang bum pa la sogs pa la mi rtag ces nges pa rjes su 'jug pa'i shes pa skye'o //
translated: From that, the subsequent cognition arises that definitely ascertains that lightning, a pot, etc. are impermanent.

original: 'di yang ni yang dag par rtogs par byed pa'i gtan tshigs gsal bar byed pa'i ched du nye bar bkod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang ni yang dag par rtogs par byed pa'i gtan tshigs gsal bar byed pa'i ched du nye bar bkod pa'o //
translated: This is also stated in order to clarify the reason that causes correct understanding.

original: don gzhan rnam par gcod pa'i sgo nas zhes pa ste /
analyzed: don gzhan rnam par gcod pa'i sgo nas zhes pa ste /
translated: By the method of the exclusion of other objects.

original: 'dis ldog pa yod par gyur pa ni gnyis ka brten pa'i khyad par du gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dis ldog pa yod par gyur pa ni gnyis ka brten pa'i khyad par du gsal bar byed do //
translated: This clarifies that the existence of the contrapositive is the difference that is based on both.

original: de ltar ni ldog pa gtso bo nyid las /
analyzed: de ltar ni ldog pa gtso bo nyid las /
translated: In that way, the reason is understood by way of the exclusion of the principal

original: don gzhan rnam par gcod par byed pa'i sgo nas gtan tshigs go bar byed pa'o zhes brjod kyi /
analyzed: don gzhan rnam par gcod par byed pa'i sgo nas gtan tshigs go bar byed pa'o zhes brjod kyi /
translated: negation, not by way of apprehending its distinction.

original: de'i khyad par 'dzin pas ni ma yin no zhes pas glog dang bum pa la sogs pa khyad par gyi sgo nas ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i khyad par 'dzin pas ni ma yin no zhes pas glog dang bum pa la sogs pa khyad par gyi sgo nas ma yin te /
translated: Thus, it is not by way of the distinction of lightning, pot, and so on,

original: mthong ba bzhin du sgrub pa'i sgo nas ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mthong ba bzhin du sgrub pa'i sgo nas ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: but by way of the establishment as seen.

original: rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo nyid ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bshad do //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo nyid ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bshad do //
translated: It is explained that the reason is not the principal positive concomitance.

original: ci'i phyir ldog pa'i sgo nas go bar byed kyi rjes 'gro'i sgo nas ni ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ldog pa'i sgo nas go bar byed kyi rjes 'gro'i sgo nas ni ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it that the reason is understood by way of the exclusion, but not by way of the positive concomitance?

original: gsungs pa / de ltar ni de zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / de ltar ni de zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúIn that way, that . . .‚Äù and so on.

original: gang la med la ste /
analyzed: gang la med la ste /
translated: That which does not exist is

original: mi mthun phyogs la /
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs la /
translated: the discordant class.

original: de rnams gcod de /
analyzed: de rnams gcod de /
translated: Those are excluded,

original: de sel ba /
analyzed: de sel ba /
translated: that is, eliminated.

original: de grub don du ji bzhin gyi don shes pa'i rgyu zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de grub don du ji bzhin gyi don shes pa'i rgyu zhes pa'i don to //
translated: That is established as the purpose, the cause of knowing the meaning as it is.

original: khyad par rtogs pa'i don du ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par rtogs pa'i don du ma yin te /
translated: It is not for the purpose of realizing the distinction.

original: de la 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of error in regard to that.

original: rdzas su yod pa'i spyi rtogs pa'i don du ma yin te de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzas su yod pa'i spyi rtogs pa'i don du ma yin te de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not for the purpose of understanding a universal that exists as a substance, because that does not exist.

original: gang la med pa de rnam par gcod pa'i sgo nas don ji lta ba bzhin shes pa'i gtan tshigs su brjod do zhes 'brel lo //
analyzed: gang la med pa de rnam par gcod pa'i sgo nas don ji lta ba bzhin shes pa'i gtan tshigs su brjod do zhes 'brel lo //
translated: That which does not exist is stated to be the reason for understanding the object as it is through the process of exclusion.

original: mtha' dag la zhes pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: mtha' dag la zhes pa la sogs pas /
translated: With ‚Äúin its entirety,‚Äù etc.,

original: rnam gnyis 'jug ces pa 'di'i don 'chad do //
analyzed: rnam gnyis 'jug ces pa 'di'i don 'chad do //
translated: he explains the meaning of ‚Äúoperating in two ways.‚Äù

original: 'dis kyang rjes 'gro gtso bo nyid ma yin par gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis kyang rjes 'gro gtso bo nyid ma yin par gsungs so //
translated: This also states that the positive concomitance is not the principal factor.

original: dper na zhes pa la sogs pas rnam gnyis su 'jug pa de ston to //
analyzed: dper na zhes pa la sogs pas rnam gnyis su 'jug pa de ston to //
translated: With ‚Äúfor example,‚Äù etc., he shows that operation in two ways.

original: de ltar byas nas zhes pa /
analyzed: de ltar byas nas zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúHaving done that,‚Äù etc.

original: gang gi phyir rnam par gcod pa'i sgo nas gtan tshigs go byed yin pa de'i phyir dri zhim pa'i gtan tshigs gcig las autpala dri nyid la sogs pa rnams 'grub ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam par gcod pa'i sgo nas gtan tshigs go byed yin pa de'i phyir dri zhim pa'i gtan tshigs gcig las autpala dri nyid la sogs pa rnams 'grub ste /
translated: Because the reason is understood through the process of exclusion, therefore, from the single reason ‚Äúhaving a sweet smell,‚Äù the properties ‚Äúbeing a lotus,‚Äù ‚Äúhaving a sweet smell,‚Äù etc., are established.

original: dri zhim pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dri zhim pa nyid ni /
translated: ‚ÄúHaving a sweet smell‚Äù is the reason.

original: gang na dri nyid la sogs pa can de na yod pa'i phyir dang / de med pa na med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang na dri nyid la sogs pa can de na yod pa'i phyir dang / de med pa na med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it exists where there is smell, etc. and it does not exist where that does not exist.

original: 'o na dri zhim pa ni dri nyid la sogs pa rnams la mthong ba'i phyir mthong ba'i sgo @178b nyid nas dri la sogs pa rnams 'grub bo zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na dri zhim pa ni dri nyid la sogs pa rnams la mthong ba'i phyir mthong ba'i sgo @178b nyid nas dri la sogs pa rnams 'grub bo zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that since pleasant smell, etc. are seen in smell, etc., smell, etc. are established by the door of seeing?

original: gsungs pa / gzhan du na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / gzhan du na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said: Otherwise, etc.

original: gal te ji ltar mthong ba de ltar rtogs kyi rnam par gcod pa'i sgo nas ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te ji ltar mthong ba de ltar rtogs kyi rnam par gcod pa'i sgo nas ma yin na /
translated: If it is understood as it is seen and not by the door of exclusion,

original: rim pa ji lta bar dkar po nyid kyis gzugs nyid dang yon tan nyid dang brten pa nyid gsum rnams rtogs par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: rim pa ji lta bar dkar po nyid kyis gzugs nyid dang yon tan nyid dang brten pa nyid gsum rnams rtogs par 'gyur zhing /
translated: then, in order, the three, form, quality, and support, would be understood by whiteness.

original: gzugs nyid las yon tan dang brten pa nyid gnyis dag dang / yon tan nyid la brten pa nyid gcig pu yang ngo //
analyzed: gzugs nyid las yon tan dang brten pa nyid gnyis dag dang / yon tan nyid la brten pa nyid gcig pu yang ngo //
translated: From form, the two, quality and support, and from quality, the one, support, would be understood.

original: de bzhin du lugs las bzlog pas kyang ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du lugs las bzlog pas kyang ste /
translated: Likewise, in reverse order also.

original: brten pa nyid kyi phyir yon tan nyid dang gzugs nyid dang dkar po nyid de gsum po rnams 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: brten pa nyid kyi phyir yon tan nyid dang gzugs nyid dang dkar po nyid de gsum po rnams 'gyur zhing /
translated: Because of being supported, these three‚Äîquality, form, and white‚Äîare seen.

original: yon tan nyid kyi phyir gzugs nyid dang dkar po nyid de gnyis po dag dang / gzugs nyid kyi phyir dkar po gcig pu kho na yang ngo //
analyzed: yon tan nyid kyi phyir gzugs nyid dang dkar po nyid de gnyis po dag dang / gzugs nyid kyi phyir dkar po gcig pu kho na yang ngo //
translated: Because of being a quality, these two‚Äîform and white‚Äîare seen. Because of being form, only white is seen.

original: brten pa nyid la sogs pa rnams yon tan nyid la sogs pa rnams la mthong ba med pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: brten pa nyid la sogs pa rnams yon tan nyid la sogs pa rnams la mthong ba med pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that support and so on are not seen in quality and so on.

original: ci ste ji ltar brten pa nyid yon tan nyid la sogs pa rnams la mthong ba de ltar las la sogs pa rnams la yang ngo zhes pas the tshom du 'gyur na /
analyzed: ci ste ji ltar brten pa nyid yon tan nyid la sogs pa rnams la mthong ba de ltar las la sogs pa rnams la yang ngo zhes pas the tshom du 'gyur na /
translated: But if you think, ‚ÄúJust as support is seen in quality and so on, so too it is seen in action and so on,‚Äù then there would be doubt.

original: dkar po nyid kyang gzugs dang yon tan dang brten pa rnams la mthong ngo zhes pas /
analyzed: dkar po nyid kyang gzugs dang yon tan dang brten pa rnams la mthong ngo zhes pas /
translated: But because white is seen in form, quality, and support,

original: de'i phyir de rnams la thun mong ba'i phyir the tshom du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir de rnams la thun mong ba'i phyir the tshom du 'gyur ro //
translated: then because they are shared, there would be doubt.

original: ldog pa'i sgo nas rtogs pa la ni skyon med do //
analyzed: ldog pa'i sgo nas rtogs pa la ni skyon med do //
translated: But there is no fault in understanding through the reverse order.

original: dper na gzugs nyid med pa la med pa'i phyir dkar po nyid ni gzugs nyid la gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: dper na gzugs nyid med pa la med pa'i phyir dkar po nyid ni gzugs nyid la gtan tshigs so //
translated: For example, because of the non-existence of form itself, white itself is the reason for form itself.

original: de ltar yon tan nyid dang brten pa nyid dag la yang /
analyzed: de ltar yon tan nyid dang brten pa nyid dag la yang /
translated: In the same way, with regard to quality itself and the possessor of quality itself,

original: de dag med na med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de dag med na med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: because of the non-existence of those, there is no existence.

original: brten pa nyid ni yon tan nyid la sogs pa med pa la yang mthong ngo zhes pas yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brten pa nyid ni yon tan nyid la sogs pa med pa la yang mthong ngo zhes pas yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The possessor of quality itself is seen even in the absence of quality itself, and so on.

original: de'i phyir yon tan nyid la sogs pa'i nges par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir yon tan nyid la sogs pa'i nges par byed pa'o //
translated: Therefore, quality itself and so on are the determiners.

original: ci ste gcig smos pa ci'i don du yin gcig nyid ni gzugs gzhan ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste gcig smos pa ci'i don du yin gcig nyid ni gzugs gzhan ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But what is the point of mentioning one? One itself is not another form.

original: gsungs pa / gcig smos pa ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / gcig smos pa ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said: The mention of one, and so on.üîΩBut then,

original: 'o na / gcig gi tshig tu bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'o na / gcig gi tshig tu bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of the teaching of the word one,üîΩand so on.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩgang du med pa rnam gnyis 'jug / ces pa 'dir /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste / gang du med pa rnam gnyis 'jug / ces pa 'dir /
translated: Here,

original: gcig gi grangs su brjod par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig gi grangs su brjod par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of the desire to express the number one,

original: ji skad du sngar /
analyzed: ji skad du sngar /
translated: as was said before,

original: grangs gcig brjod par 'dod pa nyid //
analyzed: grangs gcig brjod par 'dod pa nyid //
translated: The desire to express the number one,üîΩand so on.

original: ces pa la sogs pa bshad pa bzhin no zhe na'o //üîΩma yin te 'gal ba med pa rnams la zhes pa @179a * //üîΩla sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ces pa la sogs pa bshad pa bzhin no zhe na'o // ma yin te 'gal ba med pa rnams la zhes pa @179a * // la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is as explained in the above passages.üîΩThis is not so.üîΩThere is no contradiction in the case of those that are not contradictory.

original: 'gal ba ste mi mthun pa'i zla bo'i gtan tshigs 'di rnams la med do zhes pa 'gal ba med pa rnams te /
analyzed: 'gal ba ste mi mthun pa'i zla bo'i gtan tshigs 'di rnams la med do zhes pa 'gal ba med pa rnams te /
translated: These reasons are not contradictory, i.e., incompatible.

original: dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i gtan tshigs rnams so //
analyzed: dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i gtan tshigs rnams so //
translated: They are reasons that operate by the power of fact.

original: de rnams la grangs gcig brjod par 'dod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de rnams la grangs gcig brjod par 'dod pa ma yin no //
translated: We do not assert that they are one in number.

original: de 'dis yongs su ba'i lhag ma yin pa'i phyir dngos po'i stobs kyis ma zhugs pa'i rtags kho na grangs gcig pa'i yul yin no zhes bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de 'dis yongs su ba'i lhag ma yin pa'i phyir dngos po'i stobs kyis ma zhugs pa'i rtags kho na grangs gcig pa'i yul yin no zhes bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since they are the remainder of that, they are the domain of the one that is not a reason that operates by the power of fact.

original: gal te 'o na 'gal ba med pa rnams la gcig nyid brjod par 'dod pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'o na 'gal ba med pa rnams la gcig nyid brjod par 'dod pa ma yin na /
translated: If one says that, since one does not assert that those that are not contradictory are one,

original: de rnams kyi dum rnams gcig la sbyor ba rjes su snang bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dum rnams gcig la sbyor ba rjes su snang bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: then the application of their parts to one thing will appear to be contradictory.

original: de las kyang du ma gcig la sbyor ba na gtan tshigs dang dpe lhag cing lhag pa zhes pas tshar gcad pa'i gnas su thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa yin no zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de las kyang du ma gcig la sbyor ba na gtan tshigs dang dpe lhag cing lhag pa zhes pas tshar gcad pa'i gnas su thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa yin no zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is what is said by the phrase and so on.

original: 'di ltar dgongs pa ste nges pa khas len pa na 'di skyon yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar dgongs pa ste nges pa khas len pa na 'di skyon yin te /
translated: The idea is this: When one accepts a thesis, this is a fault.

original: gang du sgrub par byed pa'i ngag gcig gi sbyor ba nges par sngon ma can rnam par dpyod par byed pa der lhag par brjod pa'o zhes pas tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no //
analyzed: gang du sgrub par byed pa'i ngag gcig gi sbyor ba nges par sngon ma can rnam par dpyod par byed pa der lhag par brjod pa'o zhes pas tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no //
translated: Where one analyzes the application of a single statement that proves something, there is a ground for defeat called redundant.

original: spros pa'i gtam la ni cung zad kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: spros pa'i gtam la ni cung zad kyang ma yin te /
translated: But not in the slightest way in a frivolous discussion,

original: nges pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: nges pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: because there is no certainty.

original: dper na 'greng ba nyid dang bya rog gi gnas dang ces pa'o //
analyzed: dper na 'greng ba nyid dang bya rog gi gnas dang ces pa'o //
translated: For example, standing and crow's abode.

original: mi 'gal bdag don gcig rtogs par byed pa'i gtan tshigs nyid du mthong ba ni 'di tsam gyis nye bar dpog pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'gal bdag don gcig rtogs par byed pa'i gtan tshigs nyid du mthong ba ni 'di tsam gyis nye bar dpog pa'o //
translated: One sees that the reason that is understood to be non-contradictory is just this much for the sake of inference.

original: 'di dag so so ba yang byas pa nyid la sogs pa bzhin du nus pa nyid mthong ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag so so ba yang byas pa nyid la sogs pa bzhin du nus pa nyid mthong ba ni ma yin no //
translated: These individual [reasons] are not seen to have the capacity, like being a product and so forth.

original: de ni bzlog pa la zhes pa la /
analyzed: de ni bzlog pa la zhes pa la /
translated: It is said, It is contradictory in the opposite.

original: ni'i sgra ni nges par 'dzin pa la'o//
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni nges par 'dzin pa la'o//
translated: The word ni is for ascertaining.

original: de kho na ste gang du bsgrub bya la yang dag pa'i shes pa'i rgyur 'dod pa de kho na ni de las bzlog pa bsgrub par bya ba la 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de kho na ste gang du bsgrub bya la yang dag pa'i shes pa'i rgyur 'dod pa de kho na ni de las bzlog pa bsgrub par bya ba la 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: That very [reason] which is asserted as the cause of correct knowledge in the probandum, that very [reason] becomes contradictory in the opposite probandum.

original: gang du rnam pa gnyis su 'jug pa de rnam par gcod par 'grub pa'i don gzhan la mi 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: gang du rnam pa gnyis su 'jug pa de rnam par gcod par 'grub pa'i don gzhan la mi 'jug pa ste /
translated: Where there is engagement in two aspects, that exclusion is established. The meaning of not engaging in another object is

original: mthun phyogs rtag pa la mi 'jug pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mthun phyogs rtag pa la mi 'jug pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: the meaning of not engaging in the similar class, permanence.

original: 'di la yang zhes pa ji ltar 'jig pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la 'di ni mi rtag pa kho na ste /
analyzed: 'di la yang zhes pa ji ltar 'jig pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la 'di ni mi rtag pa kho na ste /
translated: Here, the word also means that just as destruction is the probandum, this [reason] is indeed impermanent.

original: rtag par 'gyur pa ni ma yin no zhes de rtag pa bkag pa'i sgo nas sgrub par byed pa de ltar rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la yang de la bzlog pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rtag par 'gyur pa ni ma yin no zhes de rtag pa bkag pa'i sgo nas sgrub par byed pa de ltar rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la yang de la bzlog pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: In the same way, in proving that it is permanent, he refutes its impermanence.

original: 'dir 'o na ci @179b ltar zhes /
analyzed: 'dir 'o na ci @179b ltar zhes /
translated: Here, someone says: ‚ÄúIn this case, how is it?‚Äù

original: 'di la yang bzlog pa las rtag pa bkag pa'i sgo kho nas sgrub par byed do zhes smras pas /
analyzed: 'di la yang bzlog pa las rtag pa bkag pa'i sgo kho nas sgrub par byed do zhes smras pas /
translated: He says: ‚ÄúIn this case, he proves that it is permanent by refuting its impermanence.‚Äù

original: bsgrub bya bkag pa'i sgo kho nas 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes dam bcas te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya bkag pa'i sgo kho nas 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes dam bcas te /
translated: He asserts: ‚ÄúIt is contradictory to prove it by refuting only what is to be proven.‚Äù

original: de ltar gyur na 'di na grang pa'i reg pa ste me'i phyir ro zhes pa 'di la bsgrub par bya ba grang ba bkag pa tsam gyis dro bar 'grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na 'di na grang pa'i reg pa ste me'i phyir ro zhes pa 'di la bsgrub par bya ba grang ba bkag pa tsam gyis dro bar 'grub pa ma yin te /
translated: In this way, in this case, ‚Äúbecause of cold contact, there is no fire‚Äù is not proven by merely refuting the cold that is to be proven.

original: dro min grang min gyi phung po gsum pa yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dro min grang min gyi phung po gsum pa yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is a third alternative that is neither warm nor cold.

original: sgrub pas dro ba'i reg pa sgrub par byed pa la ni skyon 'di med de /
analyzed: sgrub pas dro ba'i reg pa sgrub par byed pa la ni skyon 'di med de /
translated: In proving that there is warm contact, this fault does not occur.

original: de'i phyir sgrub pa kho nas bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir 'gal bar rigs so zhes sems so //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgrub pa kho nas bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir 'gal bar rigs so zhes sems so //
translated: Therefore, since it is established by the mere proof of the probandum, it is reasonable that it is contradictory.

original: gal te yang dro ba mi sgrub kyi zhes pa ste /üîΩgal te yang zhes pa 'dis 'grub pa kho na ste /
analyzed: gal te yang dro ba mi sgrub kyi zhes pa ste / gal te yang zhes pa 'dis 'grub pa kho na ste /
translated: If heat is not established,

original: grang ba tsam bkag pas kyang dro bas te /
analyzed: grang ba tsam bkag pas kyang dro bas te /
translated: then by the mere negation of cold, heat is established.

original: des me la khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: des me la khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is pervaded by that.

original: dro min grang min ni 'jam pa nyid la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dro min grang min ni 'jam pa nyid la sogs pa ste /
translated: Neither heat nor cold is smoothness, etc.

original: de ni gang na dro ba'i reg pa can der srid pa kho na ste /
analyzed: de ni gang na dro ba'i reg pa can der srid pa kho na ste /
translated: That is only possible where there is the contact of heat,

original: 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no contradiction.

original: de yod na yang dro ba nyid 'grub pa'i phyir 'gal ba cung zad kyang med de /
analyzed: de yod na yang dro ba nyid 'grub pa'i phyir 'gal ba cung zad kyang med de /
translated: Even if that exists, there is no contradiction at all because heat is established.üîΩFor example, when sound is produced, impermanence is established because it is pervaded by that.

original: dper na sgra la rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid yod par gyur na yang byas pa nyid yod par gyur na yang byas pa nyid la mi rtag pa nyid 'grub ste /üîΩdes de la khyab pa nyid kyi phyir 'grub ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: dper na sgra la rtsol ma thag tu byung ba nyid yod par gyur na yang byas pa nyid yod par gyur na yang byas pa nyid la mi rtag pa nyid 'grub ste /üîΩdes de la khyab pa nyid kyi phyir 'grub ba de bzhin du /
translated: In the same way,

original: sa phyogs su 'jam pa nyid la sogs pa'i reg pa yod par gyur kyang me las dro ba nyid 'grub ste /
analyzed: sa phyogs su 'jam pa nyid la sogs pa'i reg pa yod par gyur kyang me las dro ba nyid 'grub ste /
translated: Even though the tangible object of smoothness, etc. exists in the place, heat is established from fire,

original: des de la khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: des de la khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it pervades that.

original: khas blangs nas kho bos lan brjod par bya'o zhes gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: khas blangs nas kho bos lan brjod par bya'o zhes gsal bar byed do //
translated: Having accepted that, we will state the reply.

original: grang ba ma yin pa ni 'grub bo zhes pa grang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: grang ba ma yin pa ni 'grub bo zhes pa grang ba med pa'o //
translated: It is established as not cold, i.e., as free from cold.

original: de lta na yang 'gal ba zhes pa /
analyzed: de lta na yang 'gal ba zhes pa /
translated: Even so, it is contradictory.

original: grang ba nyid med pa 'grub pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: grang ba nyid med pa 'grub pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the establishment of the absence of cold is the purpose.

original: sgrub pas dro ba nyid sgrub par byed pa na ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pas dro ba nyid sgrub par byed pa na ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the establishment of heat by the proof.

original: 'dir grang ba'i reg pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir grang ba'i reg pa ste /
translated: Here, the tangible object of cold

original: me'i phyir ro zhes byas pa na /
analyzed: me'i phyir ro zhes byas pa na /
translated: is from fire.

original: gang gi tshe grang ba med pa sgrub pa la gtan tshigs nyid du brjod de /
analyzed: gang gi tshe grang ba med pa sgrub pa la gtan tshigs nyid du brjod de /
translated: When the absence of cold is established, it is stated as the reason.

original: ji ltar gtan tshigs 'dis grang ba med pa kho na sgrub par byed pa ltar ro zhes ba lta bu yin pa de'i tshe 'gal bar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: ji ltar gtan tshigs 'dis grang ba med pa kho na sgrub par byed pa ltar ro zhes ba lta bu yin pa de'i tshe 'gal bar 'gyur mod /
translated: Just as this reason establishes the absence of cold, so it is contradictory.

original: gang gi tshe dro ba 'grub pa la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dro ba 'grub pa la /
translated: When heat is established,

original: me gtan tshigs su brjod pa de'i tshe ci ltar grang ba bkag pa'i sgo nas 'gal bar 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: me gtan tshigs su brjod pa de'i tshe ci ltar grang ba bkag pa'i sgo nas 'gal bar 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: When fire is stated as a reason, how does it become contradictory by the negation of cold?üîΩIt is said:

original: gang gi tshe zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: When, etc.

original: de'i tshe yang don gyis go bar grang ba nyid med par mes sgrub par byed @180a * //üîΩba kho na ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang don gyis go bar grang ba nyid med par mes sgrub par byed @180a * // ba kho na ste /
translated: Even then, by implication, it is fire that establishes the non-existence of cold.

original: gzhan du na dro ba kho na 'grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du na dro ba kho na 'grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Otherwise, it would not establish heat alone.

original: de'i phyir de'i tshe yang grang ba med pa grub pa kho na 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i tshe yang grang ba med pa grub pa kho na 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, even then, the establishment of the non-existence of cold would be contradictory.

original: lhag ma rnam gsum ltos pa yis //
analyzed: lhag ma rnam gsum ltos pa yis //
translated: The remaining three are by dependence.

original: zhes sngar bshad pa de la yang dag pa dang log pa sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs nyid kyis lhag ma gsal bar byas so //
analyzed: zhes sngar bshad pa de la yang dag pa dang log pa sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs nyid kyis lhag ma gsal bar byas so //
translated: As previously explained, the remaining two are clarified by the reason itself that establishes the correct and incorrect.

original: da ni the tshom gyi gtan tshigs nyid gsal bar byas pa'i ched du phyogs snga ma 'god la /
analyzed: da ni the tshom gyi gtan tshigs nyid gsal bar byas pa'i ched du phyogs snga ma 'god la /
translated: Now, in order to clarify the reason for doubt, the opponent's position is presented:

original: 'o na yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'o na yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: But, etc.

original: thams cad la 'jug bzhin pa zhes pa ngag gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: thams cad la 'jug bzhin pa zhes pa ngag gi lhag ma'o //
translated: Engaging in all is the remainder of the sentence.

original: ma yin dgag gi 'jug pas zhes pa /
analyzed: ma yin dgag gi 'jug pas zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúBy the engagement of an affirming negation‚Äù means

original: bsgrub pas te brtag pa dgag pa la mi ltos par zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub pas te brtag pa dgag pa la mi ltos par zhes pa'o //
translated: by the proof, without depending on the negation of the superimposition.

original: sgra mi rtag ste byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes byas pa na /
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ste byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes byas pa na /
translated: When it is said, ‚ÄúSound is impermanent because of being produced,‚Äù

original: rtag par mi 'gyur ro zhes rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag par mi 'gyur ro zhes rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: it is not understood that ‚Äúit does not become permanent.‚Äù

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: sgrub pa kho nas 'jig pa'o zhes par ro //
analyzed: sgrub pa kho nas 'jig pa'o zhes par ro //
translated: It is understood by the proof alone that ‚Äúit is perishable.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir rtag pa bkag pa'i sgo nas rtogs so zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir rtag pa bkag pa'i sgo nas rtogs so zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is understood by way of the negation of permanence.

original: 'di de ltar 'gyur na zhas pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di de ltar 'gyur na zhas pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: If it were like that, etc.

original: gal te byas pa la sogs pa gang zhig bum pa la sogs pa gang la 'jug pa de de'i khyad par mchog tu 'dzin pas khyad par gzung bas nges par bya bar nus par gyur na sgrub pa'i sgo nas rtogs par byed pa nyid rigs na /
analyzed: gal te byas pa la sogs pa gang zhig bum pa la sogs pa gang la 'jug pa de de'i khyad par mchog tu 'dzin pas khyad par gzung bas nges par bya bar nus par gyur na sgrub pa'i sgo nas rtogs par byed pa nyid rigs na /
translated: If that which is produced, etc., were to engage that which is a pot, etc., then it would be possible to ascertain it by apprehending its distinction by way of holding its distinction to be supreme.

original: de yang med de /
analyzed: de yang med de /
translated: But that is not the case.

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: gang la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: If it were the case that, etc.

original: 'o na de lta zhes pa ni /
analyzed: 'o na de lta zhes pa ni /
translated: Well then, if it is like that, etc.

original: gal te bum pa la sogs pa du ma la mthong ba'i phyir byas pa nyid the tshom gyi rgyu yin na bdag med pa nyid la sogs pa rnams la yang 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gal te bum pa la sogs pa du ma la mthong ba'i phyir byas pa nyid the tshom gyi rgyu yin na bdag med pa nyid la sogs pa rnams la yang 'gyur ba'o //
translated: If the fact that a pot, etc. is seen to be produced is the cause of doubt, then the fact that selflessness, etc. is seen to be produced is also the cause of doubt.

original: 'di de ltar 'gyur ro zhes pa /
analyzed: 'di de ltar 'gyur ro zhes pa /
translated: This is the way it is.

original: khyad par rnams la the tshom gyi rgyur brjod par bya na /
analyzed: khyad par rnams la the tshom gyi rgyur brjod par bya na /
translated: If you say that the fact that it is seen to be produced is the cause of doubt with regard to the particulars,

original: mi rtag pa dang bdag med pa la sogs pa rnams khyad par ma yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang bdag med pa la sogs pa rnams khyad par ma yin no //
translated: impermanence, selflessness, etc. are not particulars.

original: de ltar na ni de rnams zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar na ni de rnams zhes pa ste /
translated: In that case, they are those,

original: 'dis ni gang rnams phan tshun du ldog cing tha dad pa de rnams kho na 'dir khyad par du brjod par 'dod cing /
analyzed: 'dis ni gang rnams phan tshun du ldog cing tha dad pa de rnams kho na 'dir khyad par du brjod par 'dod cing /
translated: which means that those which are mutually exclusive and different are here asserted to be particulars.

original: mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa rnams phan tshun du ldog pa yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa rnams phan tshun du ldog pa yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: But impermanence, etc. do not exist as mutually exclusive,üîΩbecause they are not different in reality.

original: dngos por na tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes ston te //
analyzed: dngos por na tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes ston te //
translated: This is what is taught.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: This is so.

original: khyad par rnams la 'khrul pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa sgrub pa'i sgo nas rtogs par byed pa nyid de /
analyzed: khyad par rnams la 'khrul pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa sgrub pa'i sgo nas rtogs par byed pa nyid de /
translated: In particular, it is realized by way of proof that it has the nature of error with respect to the particulars.

original: spyi la ni 'khrul pa med do //
analyzed: spyi la ni 'khrul pa med do //
translated: But there is no error with respect to the universals.

original: de'i phyir sgrub las spyi dngos por gyur pa kho na rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgrub las spyi dngos por gyur pa kho na rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the universal, which is a real entity, is realized only from the proof.

original: de'i phyir gsungs @180b ba ma yin zhas pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs @180b ba ma yin zhas pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: To that, he says, ‚ÄúIt is not so,‚Äù and so on.

original: mi rtag pa nyid ni rtag pa nyid bkag pa las te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid ni rtag pa nyid bkag pa las te /
translated: Impermanence is from the negation of permanence.

original: rtag pa nyid bsal ba las gzhan gang sgrub pas brjod par bya ba don gzhan ma yin pa yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid bsal ba las gzhan gang sgrub pas brjod par bya ba don gzhan ma yin pa yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: There is no other thing to be expressed that is different from the thing that is the negation of permanence.

original: rigs pa yang zhes pas 'thad pa'i rigs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs pa yang zhes pas 'thad pa'i rigs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúReason‚Äù is a tenable reason.

original: de ci zhig ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ci zhig ce na gsungs pa /
translated: What is that? He says,

original: gang mi mthun phyogs las zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang mi mthun phyogs las zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThat which is from the opposite of the discordant class,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'dis ni ldog pa gtso bo nyid du ston cing /
analyzed: 'dis ni ldog pa gtso bo nyid du ston cing /
translated: This teaches that the exclusion is the principal thing.

original: ldog pa'i sgo nas rtogs pa'i rigs pa nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: ldog pa'i sgo nas rtogs pa'i rigs pa nyid du gsungs so //
translated: And it is said that the reason for the realization is by way of the exclusion.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi rjes su 'gro ba yang gtso bo nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi rjes su 'gro ba yang gtso bo nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Although that is so, because of the predominance of the positive concomitance,

original: mthong ba bzhin du sgrub pa'i ngo bos kyang rtogs par rigs so zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: mthong ba bzhin du sgrub pa'i ngo bos kyang rtogs par rigs so zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: it is reasonable to understand the nature of the probandum by means of the nature of the proof, just as it is seen.üîΩTo respond to that, it is said:

original: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is not the case, etc.

original: 'dis ni rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo nyid ma yin par ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo nyid ma yin par ston to //
translated: This shows that the positive concomitance is not predominant.

original: 'o na byas pa nyid ni mi rtag pa thams cad la yod pa'i phyir de sgrub pas rtogs par byed par rigs so zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na byas pa nyid ni mi rtag pa thams cad la yod pa'i phyir de sgrub pas rtogs par byed par rigs so zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Well, then, because being produced exists in all impermanent things, it is reasonable to understand the probandum by means of the proof.üîΩTo respond to that, it is said:

original: thams cad la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: All, etc.

original: 'o na ldog pa yang nges pa mi srid pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na ldog pa yang nges pa mi srid pa ma yin nam /
translated: Well, then, is it not the case that the negative concomitance is also impossible?

original: rigs mi mthun rnams mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun rnams mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because of the infinitude of heterogeneous instances.

original: 'di 'di ltar ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di 'di ltar ma yin te /
translated: This is not the case.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs mi mthun pa 'dzin pa las gtan tshigs kyi ldog pa gzung bar bya ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs mi mthun pa 'dzin pa las gtan tshigs kyi ldog pa gzung bar bya ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: The negative concomitance of the reason is not to be grasped from the apprehension of the heterogeneous instances of the probandum.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well, then, what is it?

original: gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub par bya ba bzlog pa la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma nye bar bstan pa las so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub par bya ba bzlog pa la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma nye bar bstan pa las so //
translated: It is from the demonstration of a valid cognition that contradicts the probandum of the reason.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: This is so,

original: 'brel pa'i stobs kyis rtogs par byed pa na /
analyzed: 'brel pa'i stobs kyis rtogs par byed pa na /
translated: but when it is understood by the power of the relation,

original: 'brel pa ni ldog pa gtso bo ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'brel pa ni ldog pa gtso bo ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: the relation is not the principal reversal,

original: de'i sgo nas go bar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i sgo nas go bar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: so it is understood by means of that.

original: des na mi 'dod pa 'dir ma gyur cig ces pas 'brel pa med pa kho nar gtan tshigs go par byed par 'gyur mod ce na /
analyzed: des na mi 'dod pa 'dir ma gyur cig ces pas 'brel pa med pa kho nar gtan tshigs go par byed par 'gyur mod ce na /
translated: Therefore, this undesirable is not the case. It is said that the reason is understood only without a relation.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, in order to explain that, it is said:

original: rtags ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rtags ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The reason, etc.

original: 'di lta na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lta na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: The idea is that it would be an absurd consequence in this way.

original: 'dir yang zhes pa the tshom gyi gtan tshigs la'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes pa the tshom gyi gtan tshigs la'o //
translated: Here also, the reason for doubt is

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: why? It is said:

original: de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Thus, etc.

original: ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyi sgra ni rtsol ma thag tu byung ba ste /
analyzed: ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyi sgra ni rtsol ma thag tu byung ba ste /
translated: The sound of verbal manifestor is immediately arisen from effort,

original: byas pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: byas pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because it is produced.

original: lus kyi rnam par rig byed bzhin no zhes pa glog la sogs pas ma nges pa ste /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par rig byed bzhin no zhes pa glog la sogs pas ma nges pa ste /
translated: like the informative action of the body.

original: rang kun nas slong bar byed pa rtogs par byed pa'i phyir zhes pa ni @181a * //
analyzed: rang kun nas slong bar byed pa rtogs par byed pa'i phyir zhes pa ni @181a * //
translated: The reply is that this is not a correct analogy, because the existence of the permanent sound that is the nature of speech is understood from the manifestation of its motivating cause.

original: sgra'i bdag nyid rtag pa gsal sgras so //
analyzed: sgra'i bdag nyid rtag pa gsal sgras so //
translated: The nature of sound is permanent and clear.

original: gnyis ka dag tshogs na ni nges pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyis ka dag tshogs na ni nges pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: If both are present, then sound is definitely permanent.

original: de la ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyi sgra ni yi ge'i bdag nyid kyi grag pa'o //
analyzed: de la ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyi sgra ni yi ge'i bdag nyid kyi grag pa'o //
translated: Speech is the sound of the informative action of speech, which is the sound of syllables.

original: lus kyi rnam par rig byed ni 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par rig byed ni 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The informative action of the body is the characteristic of going and so on.

original: gsal sgra ni tha mi dad pa ste gsal bar byed pa'i grag sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba las ngo bo tha dad pa bzhin du 'byung pa rtag pa rtsol ma thag tu byung ba min pa sgra'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: gsal sgra ni tha mi dad pa ste gsal bar byed pa'i grag sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba las ngo bo tha dad pa bzhin du 'byung pa rtag pa rtsol ma thag tu byung ba min pa sgra'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Clear sound is not different from that. It is permanent, like the nature of sound that is clear and arises from the manifestation of its motivating cause, but it is not sound that arises immediately after the effort to produce it.

original: 'di yang kun nas slong ba rtogs par byed do /
analyzed: 'di yang kun nas slong ba rtogs par byed do /
translated: This also is understood from the manifestation of its motivating cause.

original: shing la sogs pa'i sgra thos pa las de kun nas slong ba'i sems rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shing la sogs pa'i sgra thos pa las de kun nas slong ba'i sems rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the mind that motivates that sound is understood from hearing the sound of wood and so on.

original: kun nas slong bar byed pa ni de'i mngon par gsal ba ste /
analyzed: kun nas slong bar byed pa ni de'i mngon par gsal ba ste /
translated: The motivator is its manifestor.

original: gsal bar byed pa'i grag sgra kun nas slong ba'i phyir yang sems kyang rgyud pas de'i kun nas slong byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa'i grag sgra kun nas slong ba'i phyir yang sems kyang rgyud pas de'i kun nas slong byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it motivates the sound that manifests it, the mind is also its motivator.

original: sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kho na kun nas slong byed du brjod par 'dod kyi /
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kho na kun nas slong byed du brjod par 'dod kyi /
translated: Only minds and mental factors are asserted to be motivators.

original: rgyu tsam ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu tsam ni ma yin te /
translated: They are not mere causes.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na glog la sogs pa rnams kyang rang kun nas slong ba rtogs par byed pa'i phyir lhan cig pa dag kyang ma nges par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na glog la sogs pa rnams kyang rang kun nas slong ba rtogs par byed pa'i phyir lhan cig pa dag kyang ma nges par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, lightning and so on would be motivators because they are observed to motivate the arising of other things.

original: de lta na'o na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de lta na'o na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: If that is so, then what is the point of this statement?

original: gal te the tshom gyi gtan tshigs ni chos gzhan mthong ba las bsgrub bya nges par byed pa mthong zhes gcig smos pa rjes su 'jug pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te the tshom gyi gtan tshigs ni chos gzhan mthong ba las bsgrub bya nges par byed pa mthong zhes gcig smos pa rjes su 'jug pa yin na /
translated: If the reason for doubt is seeing the ascertainment of the object of affirmation from seeing another phenomenon, then the statement of one is applied to the other.

original: dang po dag la yang gcig smos bar bya'o //
analyzed: dang po dag la yang gcig smos bar bya'o //
translated: The first one should also be stated.

original: ci'i phyir zhen smras pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhen smras pa /
translated: Why? He says:

original: de la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de la yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIn that regard, also‚Äù and so on.

original: chos gzhan mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: chos gzhan mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of seeing another property‚Äù

original: byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos bstan ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos bstan ba'i phyir ro //
translated: means because of teaching the property of being produced and so on.

original: sgra mi rtag ste /
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ste /
translated: Sound is impermanent

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir zhing byas pa nyid kyi phyir bum pa bzhin zhes byas pa na /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir zhing byas pa nyid kyi phyir bum pa bzhin zhes byas pa na /
translated: because of being audible and because of being produced, like a pot.

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid yod pa na yang mi rtag pa nyid nges par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid yod pa na yang mi rtag pa nyid nges par 'gyur ro //
translated: When being audible exists, impermanence is ascertained.

original: de bzhin du mi rtag pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du mi rtag pa ste /
translated: Similarly, it is impermanent

original: gzhal bya nyid kyi phyir zhing byas pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: gzhal bya nyid kyi phyir zhing byas pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because of being an object of comprehension and because of being produced,

original: bum pa bzhin zhes pa 'di la yang nges par mthong ngo //
analyzed: bum pa bzhin zhes pa 'di la yang nges par mthong ngo //
translated: like a pot. In this case, ascertainment is seen.

original: de kho na la zhes pa /
analyzed: de kho na la zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúIn that very way‚Äù

original: gang bstan pa las nges pa mthong ba'o //
analyzed: gang bstan pa las nges pa mthong ba'o //
translated: means in that which is taught, ascertainment is seen.

original: rnam par gcod byed kyi gtan tshigs min pa'i phyir zhes pa /

original: phul du phyung bas zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: phul du phyung bas zhes pa dgongs pa'o //

original: gzhan du na gnyis ka la brten pa yang rnam par gcod byed kyi gtan tshigs nyid ma yin pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: gzhan du na gnyis ka la brten pa yang rnam par gcod byed kyi gtan tshigs nyid ma yin pa'i phyir na /

original: de las gzhan ba'i chos dang bcas pa nyid na /

original: mi mthun phyogs las rnam par bcad nas so //
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs las rnam par bcad nas so //

original: 'dis ni dang po dag las gnyis ka la brten pa rnam par gcod pa'i gtan tshigs nyid du khyad par gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni dang po dag las gnyis ka la brten pa rnam par gcod pa'i gtan tshigs nyid du khyad par gsungs so //
translated: This states the difference between the first two and the reason that depends on both that excludes.

original: ji ltar gnyis la brten pa the tshom gyi rgyu yin yang chos gzhan dang lhan cig pa ni nges pa la gtan tshigs so zhes slar yang nges par gzung bar bya ba ci'i phyir zhe na bshad pa /
analyzed: ji ltar gnyis la brten pa the tshom gyi rgyu yin yang chos gzhan dang lhan cig pa ni nges pa la gtan tshigs so zhes slar yang nges par gzung bar bya ba ci'i phyir zhe na bshad pa /
translated: Why is it that, although that which depends on both is the cause of doubt, that which has a property that is different from that is a reason for certainty?

original: de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: the tshom gyi gtan tshigs ni /

translated: That is taught by ‚ÄúFor example,‚Äù and so on.

analyzed: de'i phyir de la ltos nas kyang ci'i phyir the tshom skyed par mi byed ce na /

analyzed: gsungs pa / gang gi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

original: gang gi phyir byas pa nyid ni nam mkha' la sogs pa las rnams ldog bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir byas pa nyid ni nam mkha' la sogs pa las rnams ldog bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir /

analyzed: rang gi rten rtag pa las rnam par bcad nas de la mi rtag pa nyid du nges par byas pa na / rtsol ba las skyes pa @182a * //
translated: Having eliminated its basis as permanent, one ascertains it as impermanent.üîΩThen, the cause of doubt is

original: nyid du the tshom gyi rgyu ste /
analyzed: nyid du the tshom gyi rgyu ste /

original: de'i phyir nam mkha' la sogs pa rnams rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba nyid du yod na yang /
analyzed: de'i phyir nam mkha' la sogs pa rnams rtsol ma thag tu ma byung ba nyid du yod na yang /

analyzed: de la ltos nas byas pa nyid the tshom gyi gtan tshigs ma yin no //

original: gang las rnam par gcod par byed pa de la ltos nas the tshom byed do zhes pas rigs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang las rnam par gcod par byed pa de la ltos nas the tshom byed do zhes pas rigs pa ni ma yin no //

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /

original: 'di ni rnam par gcod pa'i gtan tshigs kho na ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par gcod pa'i gtan tshigs kho na ma yin te /

original: des na ci'i phyir nam mkha' la sogs pa rnams las rnam par gcod par byed ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: des na ci'i phyir nam mkha' la sogs pa rnams las rnam par gcod par byed ce na gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, why is it eliminated from space and so on?üîΩIt is said:

original: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúNo, because . . .‚Äù

original: gang rnam par gcod par byed kyi gtan tshigs ma yin pa 'dis ni yongs su gzhal ba'i don la the tshom byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang rnam par gcod par byed kyi gtan tshigs ma yin pa 'dis ni yongs su gzhal ba'i don la the tshom byed pa ma yin te /
